Text

[Harry]112-harry sprinted up to [[the boys]448-the boys ’ dormitory]449-the boys ’ dormitory to fetch the Invisibility Cloak and the Marauder ’s Map from [his]112-harry trunk ; [he]112-harry was so quick that [he]112-harry and [Ron]113-ron were ready to leave at least five minutes before [Hermione]114-hermione hurried back down from [[the girls]450-the girls ’ dormitories]451-the girls ’ dormitories , wearing scarf , gloves , and one of [her]114-hermione own knobbly elf hats .

“ Well , it ’s cold out there ! ”[114-hermione] [she]114-hermione said defensively , as [Ron]113-ron clicked [his]113-ron tongue impatiently .

[They]452-they crept through the portrait hole and covered [themselves]452-they hastily in the Cloak — [Ron]113-ron had grown so much [he]113-ron now needed to crouch to prevent [his]113-ron feet showing — then , moving slowly and cautiously , [they]452-they proceeded down the many staircases , pausing at intervals to check the map for signs of [Filch]172-filch or [Mrs. Norris]202-mrs. norris . [They]452-they were lucky ; [they]452-they saw [nobody]453-nobody but [Nearly Headless Nick]115-nick , who was gliding along absentmindedly humming something that sounded horribly like “ Weasley Is [[Our]3084-our King]3085-our king . ”[452-they] [They]452-they crept across [the entrance hall]454-the entrance hall and then out into [the silent , snowy grounds]455-the silent , snowy grounds . With a great leap of [his]113-ron heart , [Harry]112-harry saw little golden squares of light ahead and smoke coiling up from [Hagrid]116-hagrid ’s chimney . [He]112-harry set off at a quick march , the other two jostling and bumping along behind [him]112-harry , and [they]452-they crunched excitedly through the thickening snow until at last [they]452-they reached the wooden front door ; when [Harry]112-harry raised [his]112-harry fist and knocked three times , a dog started barking frantically inside .

“ [Hagrid]116-hagrid , it ’s [us]452-they ! ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry called through the keyhole .

“ Shoulda known ! ”[116-hagrid] said a gruff voice .

[They]452-they beamed at [one another under the Cloak]456-one another under the cloak ; [they]452-they could tell that [Hagrid]116-hagrid ’s voice was pleased . “ [Bin]3086-bin [home]3087-home three seconds ... Out the way , [Fang]117-fang ... Out the way , [yeh]117-fang dozy dog ... ”[116-hagrid]

The bolt was drawn back , the door creaked open , and [Hagrid]116-hagrid ’s head appeared in the gap .

[Hermione]114-hermione screamed .

“ [Merlin]118-merlin ’s beard , keep it down ! ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid hastily , staring wildly over [their]452-they heads . “ Under that Cloak , are [yeh]452-they ? Well , get in , get in ! ”[116-hagrid]

“ [I]114-hermione ’m sorry ! ”[114-hermione] [Hermione]114-hermione gasped , as [the three of [them]457-the three of them]457-the three of them squeezed past [Hagrid]116-hagrid into [the house]458-the house and pulled the Cloak off [themselves]457-the three of them so [he]116-hagrid could see [them]457-the three of them . “ [I]116-hagrid just — oh , [Hagrid]116-hagrid ! ”[116-hagrid]

“ It ’s nuthin’ , it ’s nuthin’ ! ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid hastily , shutting the door behind [them]452-they and hurrying to close all the curtains , but [Hermione]114-hermione continued to gaze up at [him]116-hagrid in horror .

[Hagrid]116-hagrid ’s hair was matted with congealed blood , and [his]116-hagrid left eye had been reduced to a puffy slit amid a mass of purple - and - black bruises . There were many cuts on [his]116-hagrid face and hands , some of them still bleeding , and [he]116-hagrid was moving gingerly , which made [Harry]112-harry suspect broken ribs . It was obvious that [he]116-hagrid had only just got [home]3087-home ; a thick black traveling cloak lay over the back of a chair and a haversack large enough to carry [several small children]460-several small children leaned against the wall inside the door . [Hagrid]116-hagrid [himself]116-hagrid , twice the size of [a normal man and three times as broad]461-a normal man and three times as broad , was now limping over to the fire and placing a copper kettle over it .

“ What happened to [you]452-they ? ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry demanded , while [Fang]117-fang danced around [them]452-they all , trying to lick [their]452-they faces .

“ Told [yeh]452-they , nuthin’ , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid firmly . “ Want a cuppa ? ”[116-hagrid]

“ Come off it , ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron , “ [you]452-they ’re in a right state ! ”[113-ron]

“ [I]116-hagrid ’m tellin ’ [yeh]452-they , [I]116-hagrid ’m fine , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid , straightening up and turning to beam at [them]452-they all , but wincing . “ [Blimey]119-blimey , it ’s good ter see [you]452-they three again — had good summers , did [yeh]452-they ? ”[116-hagrid]

“ [Hagrid]116-hagrid , [you]116-hagrid ’ve been attacked ! ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron .

“ Fer the las ’ time , it ’s nuthin’ ! ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid firmly .

“ Would [you]116-hagrid say it was nothing if one of [us]452-they turned up with a pound of mince instead of a face ? ”[113-ron] [Ron]113-ron demanded .

“ [You]116-hagrid ought to go and see [Madam Pomfrey]120-madam pomfrey , [Hagrid]116-hagrid , ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione anxiously . “ Some of those cuts look nasty . ”[114-hermione]

“ [I]116-hagrid ’m dealin ’ with it , all righ ’ ? ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid repressively .

[He]116-hagrid walked across to the enormous wooden table that stood in the middle of [[his]116-hagrid cabin]462-his cabin and twitched aside a tea towel that had been lying on it . Underneath was a raw , bloody , green - tinged steak slightly larger than the average car tire .

“ [You]116-hagrid ’re not going to eat that , are [you]116-hagrid , [Hagrid]116-hagrid ? ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron , leaning in for a closer look . “ It looks poisonous . ”[113-ron]

“ [It]3088-it ’s s’posed ter look like that , it ’s dragon meat , ”[116-hagrid] [Hagrid]116-hagrid said . “ An ’ [I]116-hagrid didn ’ get it ter eat . ”[116-hagrid]

[He]116-hagrid picked up the steak and slapped it over the left side of [his]116-hagrid face . Greenish blood trickled down into [his]116-hagrid beard as [he]116-hagrid gave a soft moan of satisfaction .

“ Tha ’s better . It helps with the stingin ’ , [yeh]116-hagrid know . ”[116-hagrid]

“ So are [you]116-hagrid going to tell [us]3089-us what ’s happened to [you]116-hagrid ? ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry asked .

“ Can ’ , [Harry]112-harry . Top secret . More’n [me]112-harry job ’s worth ter tell [yeh]116-hagrid that . ”[112-harry]

“ Did [the giants]3090-the giants beat [you]116-hagrid up , [Hagrid]116-hagrid ? ”[114-hermione] asked [Hermione]114-hermione quietly .

[Hagrid]116-hagrid ’s fingers slipped on the dragon steak , and it slid squelchily onto [his]116-hagrid chest .

“ [Giants]3091-giants ? ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid , catching the steak before it reached [his]116-hagrid belt and slapping it back over [his]116-hagrid face . “ Who said anythin ’ abou ’ giants ? Who [yeh]116-hagrid bin talkin ’ to ? Who ’s told [yeh]116-hagrid what [I]116-hagrid ’ve — who ’s said [I]116-hagrid ’ve bin — eh ? ”[116-hagrid]

“ [We]463-them guessed , ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione apologetically .

“ Oh , [yeh]116-hagrid did , did [yeh]116-hagrid ? ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid , fixing [her]114-hermione sternly with the eye that was not hidden by the steak .

“ It was kind of ... obvious , ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron . [Harry]112-harry nodded .

[Hagrid]116-hagrid glared at [them]463-them , then snorted , threw the steak onto the table again and strode back to the kettle , which was now whistling .

“ Never known [kids]3092-kids like [you]463-them three fer knowin ’ more’n [yeh]116-hagrid oughta , ”[116-hagrid] [he]116-hagrid muttered , splashing boiling water into three of [his]116-hagrid bucket - shaped mugs . “ An ’ [I]116-hagrid ’m not complimentin ’ yeh , neither . [Nosy]3093-nosy , some’d call it . Interferin ’ . ”[116-hagrid]

But [his]116-hagrid beard twitched .

“ So [you]116-hagrid have been to look for [giants]3091-giants ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry , grinning as [he]112-harry sat down at the table .

[Hagrid]116-hagrid set tea in front of each of [them]463-them , sat down , picked up [his]116-hagrid steak again , and slapped it back over [his]116-hagrid face .

“ Yeah , all righ ’ , ”[116-hagrid] [he]116-hagrid grunted , “ [I]116-hagrid have . ”[116-hagrid]

“ And [you]116-hagrid found [them]3091-giants ? ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione in a hushed voice .

“ Well , they ’re not that difficult [ter]3095-ter find , ter be honest , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid . “ Pretty big , see . ”[116-hagrid]

“ Where are [they]3091-giants ? ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron .

“ Mountains , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid unhelpfully .

“ So why do n’t [Muggles]121-muggles — ? ”[116-hagrid]

“ [They]121-muggles do , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid darkly . “ O’ny [their]121-muggles deaths are always put down ter mountaineerin ’ accidents , aren ’ [they]121-muggles ? ”[116-hagrid]

[He]116-hagrid adjusted the steak a little so that it covered the worst of the bruising .

“ Come on , [Hagrid]116-hagrid , tell [us]3096-us what [you]116-hagrid ’ve been up to ! ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron . “ Tell [us]3096-us about being attacked by [the giants]3090-the giants and [Harry]112-harry can tell [you]116-hagrid about being attacked by [the dementors]3098-the dementors — ”[113-ron]

[Hagrid]116-hagrid choked in [his]116-hagrid mug and dropped [his]116-hagrid steak at the same time ; a large quantity of spit , tea , and dragon blood was sprayed over the table as [Hagrid]116-hagrid coughed and spluttered and the steak slid , with a soft splat , onto the floor .

“ Whadda [yeh]3099-yeh mean , attacked by [dementors]3100-dementors ? ”[116-hagrid] growled [Hagrid]116-hagrid .

“ Did n’t [you]116-hagrid know ? ”[116-hagrid] [Hermione]114-hermione asked [him]116-hagrid , wide - eyed .

“ [I]116-hagrid don ’ know anything that ’s been happenin ’ since [I]116-hagrid left . [I]116-hagrid was on a secret mission , wasn ’ [I]116-hagrid , didn ’ wan ’ owls followin ’ [me]116-hagrid all over [the place]3101-the place — [ruddy dementors]122-ruddy dementors ! [Yeh’re]3099-yeh not serious ? ”[116-hagrid]

“ Yeah , [I]116-hagrid am , [they]3098-the dementors turned up in [Little Whinging]123-little whinging and attacked [[my]116-hagrid cousin]3102-my cousin and [me]116-hagrid , and then [the Ministry of Magic]3103-the ministry of magic expelled [me]116-hagrid — ”[116-hagrid]

“ WHAT ? ”[116-hagrid]

“ — and [I]116-hagrid had to go to a hearing and everything , but tell [us]3104-we about the giants first . ”[116-hagrid]

“ [You]116-hagrid were expelled ? ”[116-hagrid]

“ Tell [us]3104-we about [your]116-hagrid summer and [I]116-hagrid ’ll tell [you]112-harry about [mine]116-hagrid . ”[116-hagrid]

[Hagrid]116-hagrid glared at [him]116-hagrid through [his]116-hagrid one open eye . [Harry]112-harry looked right back , an expression of innocent determination on [his]112-harry face .

“ Oh , all righ ’ , ”[116-hagrid] [Hagrid]116-hagrid said in a resigned voice .

[He]116-hagrid bent down and tugged the dragon steak out of [Fang]117-fang ’s mouth .

“ Oh , [Hagrid]116-hagrid , do n’t , it ’s not hygien — ”[114-hermione] [Hermione]114-hermione began , but [Hagrid]116-hagrid had already slapped the meat back over [his]116-hagrid swollen eye . “ [Madame Maxime]124-madame maxime went with [you]116-hagrid , then ? ”[114-hermione] [Hermione]114-hermione interjected .

“ Yeah , tha ’s right , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid , and a softened expression appeared on the few inches of face that were not obscured by beard or green steak . “ Yeah , it was jus ’ [the pair of [us]3104-we]3106-the pair of us . “ [You]116-hagrid knew where [you]116-hagrid were going ? ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry asked . “ [You]116-hagrid knew where [the giants]3090-the giants were ? ”[112-harry]

“ Oh , don ’ [you]114-hermione worry abou ’ that , [I]116-hagrid ’ve got a great load o ’ lessons planned , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid enthusiastically , scooping up [his]116-hagrid dragon steak from the table and slapping it over [his]116-hagrid eye again . “ [I]116-hagrid ’ve bin keepin ’ a couple o ’ creatures saved fer [yer]114-hermione O.W.L. year , [you]114-hermione wait , [they]3282-they ’re somethin’ really special . ”[116-hagrid]

“ Erm ... special in what way ? ”[114-hermione] asked [Hermione]114-hermione tentatively .

“ [I]116-hagrid ’m not sayin ’ , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid happily . “ [I]116-hagrid don ’ want ter spoil the surprise . ”[116-hagrid]

“ Look , [Hagrid]116-hagrid , ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione urgently , dropping all pretense , “ [Professor Umbridge]3283-professor umbridge wo n’t be at all happy if [you]116-hagrid bring anything to class that ’s too dangerous — ”[114-hermione]

“ [Hagrid]116-hagrid , [you]116-hagrid ’ve got to pass [Umbridge]144-umbridge ’s inspection , and to do that it would really be better if [she]144-umbridge saw [you]116-hagrid teaching [us]3284-us how to look after porlocks , how to tell the difference between knarls and hedgehogs , stuff like that ! ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione earnestly .

“ [Hagrid]116-hagrid ... please ... ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione , a note of real desperation in [her]114-hermione voice . “ [Umbridge]144-umbridge is looking for any excuse to get rid of [[teachers]3285-teachers [she]144-umbridge thinks are too close to [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore]3286-teachers she thinks are too close to dumbledore . “ [Lis’en]148-lis’en , it ’s bin a long day an ’ it ’s late , ”[116-hagrid] [he]116-hagrid said , patting [Hermione]114-hermione gently on the shoulder , so that [her]114-hermione knees gave way and hit the floor with a thud . “ Oh — sorry — ”[116-hagrid] [He]116-hagrid pulled [her]114-hermione back up by the neck of [her]114-hermione robes . “ Look , don ’ [you]114-hermione go worryin ’ abou ’ [me]116-hagrid , [I]116-hagrid promise [yeh]114-hermione [I]116-hagrid ’ve got really good stuff planned fer [yer]114-hermione lessons now [I]116-hagrid ’m back ... [Hermione]114-hermione plowed [her]114-hermione way back to [[Hagrid]116-hagrid ’s cabin]480-hagrid ’s cabin through two feet of snow on Sunday morning . [Hagrid]116-hagrid ’s reappearance at the staff table at breakfast next day was not greeted by enthusiasm from [all students]486-all students . It was with a certain amount of apprehension that [Harry]112-harry , [Ron]113-ron , and [Hermione]114-hermione headed down to [Hagrid]116-hagrid ’s on Tuesday , heavily muffled against the cold . [Harry]112-harry was worried , not only about what [Hagrid]116-hagrid might have decided to teach [them]486-all students , but also about how [the rest of [the class]493-the class , particularly [Malfoy]155-malfoy and [[his]155-malfoy cronies]494-his cronies]492-the rest of the class , particularly malfoy and his cronies , would behave if [Umbridge]144-umbridge was watching [them]486-all students .

[He]116-hagrid did not present a reassuring sight ; the bruises that had been purple on Saturday night were now tinged with green and yellow and some of [his]116-hagrid cuts still seemed to be bleeding . [Harry]112-harry could not understand this : Had [Hagrid]116-hagrid perhaps been attacked by some creature whose venom prevented the wounds it inflicted from healing ? “ [We]486-all students ’re workin ’ in [here]3296-here today ! ”[116-hagrid] [Hagrid]116-hagrid called happily to [the approaching students]498-the approaching students , jerking [his]116-hagrid head back at the dark trees behind [him]116-hagrid . “ Bit more sheltered ! [He]116-hagrid turned and strode straight into [the forest]3290-the forest . [Nobody]453-nobody seemed much disposed to follow . [Harry]112-harry glanced at [Ron]113-ron and [Hermione]114-hermione , who sighed but nodded , and [the three of [them]457-the three of them]457-the three of them set off after [Hagrid]116-hagrid , leading [the rest of [the class]493-the class]504-the rest of the class .

[They]457-the three of them walked for about ten minutes until [they]457-the three of them reached a place where the trees stood so closely together that it was as dark as twilight and there was no snow on the ground at all . [Hagrid]116-hagrid deposited [his]116-hagrid half a cow with a grunt on the ground , stepped back , and turned to face [[his]116-hagrid class]506-his class again , most of whom were creeping toward [him]116-hagrid from tree to [tree , peering around nervously as though expecting to be set upon at any moment]507-tree , peering around nervously as though expecting to be set upon at any moment .

“ Gather roun ’ , gather roun ’ , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid encouragingly . “ Now , [they]506-his class ’ll be attracted by the smell o ’ the meat but [I]116-hagrid ’m goin’ ter give [’em]506-his class a call anyway , ’cause [they]506-his class ’ll like ter know it ’s [me]116-hagrid ... ”[116-hagrid]

[He]116-hagrid turned , shook [his]116-hagrid shaggy head to get the hair out of [his]116-hagrid face , and gave an odd , shrieking cry that echoed through the dark trees like the call of some monstrous bird . [Nobody]160-nobody laughed ; [most of [them]506-his class]508-most of them looked too scared to make a sound .

[Hagrid]116-hagrid gave the shrieking cry again . A minute passed in which [the class]493-the class continued to peer nervously over [their]493-the class shoulders and around trees for a first glimpse of whatever it was that was coming . And then , as [Hagrid]116-hagrid shook [his]116-hagrid hair back for a third time and expanded [his]116-hagrid enormous chest , [Harry]112-harry nudged [Ron]113-ron and pointed into the black space between two gnarled yew trees .

A pair of blank , white , shining eyes were growing larger through the gloom and a moment later the dragonish face , neck , and then skeletal body of a great , black , winged horse emerged from the darkness . [It]510-it looked around at [the class]493-the class for a few seconds , swishing its long black tail , then bowed [its]510-it head and began to tear flesh from the dead cow with its pointed fangs .

A great wave of relief broke over [Harry]112-harry . Here at last was proof that [he]112-harry had not imagined [these creatures]512-these creatures , that [they]512-these creatures were real : [Hagrid]116-hagrid knew about [them]512-these creatures too . [Most of [the rest of [the class]493-the class]504-the rest of the class]513-most of the rest of the class were wearing expressions as confused and nervously expectant as [Ron]113-ron ’s and were still gazing everywhere but at the horse standing feet from [them]513-most of the rest of the class . [Immensely]162-immensely pleased to feel that [he]116-hagrid was at last going to understand the mystery of these horses , [Harry]112-harry raised [his]112-harry hand . [Hagrid]116-hagrid nodded at [him]112-harry .

[The whole class]518-the whole class stared at it for a few seconds , then [several people]519-several people gasped and [Parvati]153-parvati squealed . [Harry]112-harry understood why : Bits of flesh stripping [themselves]520-themselves away from the bones and vanishing into thin air had to look very odd indeed .

“ What ’s doing it ? ”[153-parvati] [Parvati]153-parvati demanded in a terrified voice , retreating behind the nearest tree . “ What ’s eating it ? ”[153-parvati]

“ [Thestrals]163-thestrals , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid proudly and [Hermione]114-hermione gave a soft “ oh ! ”[153-parvati] of comprehension at [Harry]112-harry ’s shoulder . “ [Hogwarts]18-hogwarts has got a whole herd of ’em in here . Now , who knows — ? ”[153-parvati]

[Two more horses]521-two more horses came quietly out of the trees , one of [them]521-two more horses passing very close to [Parvati]153-parvati , who shivered and pressed [herself]153-parvati closer to the tree , saying , “ [I]153-parvati think [I]153-parvati felt something , [I]153-parvati think it ’s near [me]153-parvati ! ”[153-parvati]

“ Don ’ worry , it won ’ hurt [yeh]3307-yeh , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid patiently . “ [Righ]165-righ ’ , now , who can tell [me]116-hagrid why some o ’ [you]3307-yeh can see [them]521-two more horses an ’ some ca n’t ? ”[116-hagrid]

[Hermione]114-hermione raised [her]114-hermione hand .

“ [The only people who can see thestrals]3308-the only people who can see thestrals , ”[114-hermione] [she]114-hermione said , “ are [people who have seen death]3309-people who have seen death . ”[114-hermione]

“ Hem , hem . ”[114-hermione]

[Professor Umbridge]144-umbridge had arrived . [She]144-umbridge was standing a few feet away from [Harry]112-harry , wearing [her]144-umbridge green hat and cloak again , [her]144-umbridge clipboard at the ready . [Hagrid]116-hagrid , who had never heard [Umbridge]144-umbridge ’s fake cough before , was gazing in some concern at the closest thestral , evidently under the impression that it had made the sound .

“ Hem , hem . ”[144-umbridge]

“ Oh hello ! ”[116-hagrid] [Hagrid]116-hagrid said , smiling , having located the source of the noise .

“ [You]144-umbridge received the note [I]144-umbridge sent to [[your]144-umbridge cabin]3262-your cabin this morning ? ”[144-umbridge] said [Umbridge]144-umbridge , in the same loud , slow voice [she]144-umbridge had used with [him]112-harry earlier , as though [she]144-umbridge was addressing [somebody both foreign and very slow]522-somebody both foreign and very slow . “ Telling [you]144-umbridge that [I]144-umbridge would be inspecting [your]144-umbridge lesson ? ”[144-umbridge]

“ Oh yeah , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid brightly . “ Glad [yeh]144-umbridge found [the place]3101-the place all righ ’ ! Well , as [you]144-umbridge can see — or , [I]116-hagrid dunno — can [you]144-umbridge ? [We]3312-we ’re doin’ thestrals today — ”[116-hagrid]

[Hagrid]116-hagrid looked a little confused .

[He]116-hagrid flapped [his]116-hagrid gigantic arms hopefully . “ Well ... anyway ... ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid , turning back to [the class]493-the class and looking slightly flustered . “ Erm ... what was [I]116-hagrid sayin ’ ? ”[116-hagrid]

“ ‘ Appears ... to ... have ... poor ... short ... term ... memory ... ’ ”[144-umbridge] muttered [Umbridge]144-umbridge , loudly enough for [everyone]524-everyone to hear [her]144-umbridge . “ Oh yeah , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid , throwing an uneasy glance at [Umbridge]144-umbridge ’s clipboard , but plowing on valiantly . “ Yeah , [I]116-hagrid was gon na tell [yeh]144-umbridge how come [we]3313-we got a herd . “ Are [you]116-hagrid aware , ”[144-umbridge] [Umbridge]144-umbridge said loudly , interrupting [him]116-hagrid , “ that [the Ministry of Magic]3103-the ministry of magic has classified thestrals as ‘ dangerous ’ ? ”[144-umbridge]

[Harry]112-harry ’s heart sank like a stone , but [Hagrid]116-hagrid merely chuckled .

“ [Thestrals]163-thestrals aren ’ dangerous ! All righ ’ , [they]163-thestrals might take a bite outta [you]116-hagrid if [yeh]116-hagrid really annoy [them]163-thestrals — ”[116-hagrid]

“ ‘ Shows ... signs ... of ... pleasure ... at ... idea ... of ... violence ... ’ ”[144-umbridge] muttered [Umbridge]144-umbridge , scribbling on [her]144-umbridge clipboard again .

“ No — come on ! ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid , looking a little anxious now . “ [I]116-hagrid mean , a dog’ll bite if [yeh]116-hagrid bait it , won ’ it — but [thestrals]3319-thestrals have jus ’ got a bad reputation because o ’ the death thing — [people]3280-people used ter think [they]3280-people were [bad omens]3321-bad omens , didn ’ [they]3280-people ? Jus ’ didn ’ understand , did [they]3280-people ? ”[116-hagrid]

[Umbridge]144-umbridge did not answer ; [she]144-umbridge finished writing [her]144-umbridge last note , then looked up at [Hagrid]116-hagrid and said , again very loudly and slowly , “ Please continue teaching as usual . [Hagrid]116-hagrid stared at [her]144-umbridge , clearly at a complete loss to understand why [she]144-umbridge was acting as though [he]116-hagrid did not understand normal English . [Hermione]114-hermione had tears of fury in [her]114-hermione eyes now .

“ [[You]116-hagrid hag]3323-you hag , [[you]116-hagrid evil hag]3324-you evil hag ! ”[114-hermione] [she]114-hermione whispered , as [Umbridge]144-umbridge walked toward [Pansy Parkinson]169-pansy parkinson . “ [I]114-hermione know what [you]116-hagrid ’re doing , [you]116-hagrid awful , twisted , vicious — ”[114-hermione]

December arrived , bringing with it more snow and a positive avalanche of homework for the fifth years . “ All those poor elves [I]114-hermione have n’t set free yet , having to stay over during Christmas because there are n’t enough hats ! ”[114-hermione]

[Harry]112-harry , who had not had the heart to tell [her]114-hermione that [Dobby]173-dobby was taking everything [she]114-hermione made , bent lower over [his]112-harry History of Magic essay . Between [his]112-harry Quidditch ban and worry about whether or not [Hagrid]116-hagrid was going to be put on probation , [he]112-harry felt highly resentful toward [the place]3101-the place at the moment . [Hermione]114-hermione rolled [her]114-hermione eyes , but [Harry]112-harry ’s spirits soared : The thought of Christmas at [the Burrow]542-the burrow was truly wonderful , only slightly marred by [Harry]112-harry ’s guilty feeling that [he]112-harry would not be able to spend the holiday with [Sirius]142-sirius . [Harry]112-harry arrived early in [the Room of [Requirement]177-requirement for the last D.A. meeting before the holidays]547-the room of requirement for the last d.a. meeting before the holidays and was very glad [he]112-harry had , because when the lamps burst into light [he]112-harry saw that [Dobby]173-dobby had taken it upon [himself]173-dobby to decorate [the place]3101-the place for Christmas . [He]112-harry could tell [the elf]549-the elf had done it , because [nobody else]550-nobody else would have strung a hundred golden baubles from the ceiling , each showing a picture of [Harry]112-harry ’s face and bearing the legend HAVE A VERY HARRY CHRISTMAS !

[Harry]112-harry had only just managed to get the last of [them]551-them down before the door creaked open and [Luna Lovegood]178-luna entered , looking dreamy as always .

“ [We]556-we ’re all really sorry [Harry]112-harry did n’t tell [you]556-we , then , ”[149-fred] said [Fred]149-fred loudly .

[Several people]519-several people sniggered . [Harry]112-harry saw [Cho]187-cho laughing and felt the familiar swooping sensation in [his]112-harry stomach , as though [he]112-harry had missed a step going [downstairs]559-downstairs .

“ [We]556-we can practice in pairs , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry . “ [We]556-we ’ll start with the Impediment Jinx , just for ten minutes , then [we]556-we can get out the cushions and try Stunning again . ”[112-harry]

[They]519-several people all divided up obediently ; [Harry]112-harry partnered [Neville]161-neville as usual . [The room]469-the room was soon full of intermittent cries of “ Impedimenta ! ”[3280-people] [People]3280-people froze for a minute or so , during which [[their]3280-people partners]562-their partners would stare aimlessly around [the room]469-the room watching [other pairs at work]564-other pairs at work , then would unfreeze and take [their]3280-people turn at the jinx .

[Neville]161-neville had improved beyond all recognition . After a while , when [Harry]112-harry had unfrozen three times in a row , [he]112-harry had [Neville]161-neville join [Ron]113-ron and [Hermione]114-hermione again so that [he]161-neville could walk around [the room]469-the room and watch [the others]3151-the others . When [he]161-neville passed [Cho]187-cho [she]187-cho beamed at [him]161-neville ; [he]161-neville resisted the temptation to walk past [her]187-cho several more times .

After ten minutes on the Impediment Jinx , [they]567-them laid out cushions all over the floor and started practicing Stunning again . Space was really too confined to allow [them]567-them all to work this spell at once ; [half the group]568-half the group observed [the others]3151-the others for a while , then swapped over . [Harry]112-harry felt [himself]112-harry positively swelling with pride as [he]112-harry watched [them]567-them all . True , [Neville]161-neville did Stun [Padma Patil]188-padma patil rather than [Dean]189-dean , at whom [he]161-neville had been aiming , but it was a much closer miss than usual , and [everybody else]570-everybody else had made enormous progress .

At the end of an hour , [Harry]112-harry called a halt .

“ [You]567-them ’re getting really good , ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry said , beaming around at [them]567-them . “ When [we]3350-we get back from the holidays [we]3350-we can start doing some of the big stuff — maybe even [Patronuses]3351-patronuses . ”[112-harry]

There was a murmur of excitement . [The room]469-the room began to clear in the usual twos and threes ; [most people]572-most people wished [Harry]112-harry a Happy Christmas as [they]572-most people went . Feeling cheerful , [he]112-harry collected up the cushions with [Ron]113-ron and [Hermione]114-hermione and stacked them neatly away . [Ron]113-ron and [Hermione]114-hermione left before [he]112-harry did ; [he]112-harry hung back a little , because [Cho]187-cho was still there and [he]112-harry was hoping to receive a Merry Christmas from [her]187-cho .

“ No , [you]112-harry go on , ”[187-cho] [he]112-harry heard [her]187-cho say to [[her]187-cho friend]573-her friend [Marietta]190-marietta , and [his]112-harry heart gave a jolt that seemed to take it into the region of [his]112-harry Adam ’s apple .

[He]112-harry pretended to be straightening the cushion pile . [He]112-harry was quite sure [they]574-they were alone now and waited for [her]187-cho to speak . Instead , [he]112-harry heard a hearty sniff .

[He]112-harry turned and saw [Cho]187-cho standing in the middle of [the room]469-the room , tears pouring down [her]187-cho face .

“ Wha — ? ”[187-cho]

[He]112-harry did n’t know what to do . [She]187-cho was simply standing there , crying silently .

“ What ’s up ? ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry said feebly .

[She]187-cho shook [her]187-cho head and wiped [her]187-cho eyes on [her]187-cho sleeve . “ [I]187-cho ’m — sorry , ”[187-cho] [she]187-cho said thickly . “ [I]187-cho suppose ... it ’s just ... learning all this stuff ... It just makes [me]187-cho ... wonder whether ... if [he]191-cedric ’d known it all ... [he]191-cedric ’d still be alive ... ”[187-cho]

[Harry]112-harry ’s heart sank right back past its usual spot and settled somewhere around [his]112-harry navel . [He]112-harry ought to have known . [She]187-cho wanted to talk about [Cedric]191-cedric .

“ [He]191-cedric did know this stuff , ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry said heavily . “ [He]191-cedric was really good at it , or [he]191-cedric could never have got to the middle of [that maze]3352-that maze . But if [Voldemort]192-voldemort really wants to kill [you]112-harry , [you]112-harry do n’t stand a chance . ”[112-harry]

[She]187-cho hiccuped at the sound of [Voldemort]192-voldemort ’s name , but stared at [Harry]112-harry without flinching .

“ [You]112-harry survived when [you]112-harry were just [a baby]3353-a baby , ”[187-cho] [she]187-cho said quietly .

“ Yeah , well , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry wearily , moving toward the door , “ [I]112-harry dunno why , nor does [anyone else]3354-anyone else , so it ’s nothing to be proud of . ”[112-harry]

“ Oh do n’t go ! ”[187-cho] said [Cho]187-cho , sounding tearful again . “ [I]187-cho ’m really sorry to get all upset like this ... [I]187-cho did n’t mean to ... ”[187-cho]

[She]187-cho hiccuped again . [She]187-cho was very pretty even when [her]187-cho eyes were red and puffy . [Harry]112-harry felt thoroughly miserable . [He]112-harry ’d have been so pleased just with a Merry Christmas ...

“ [I]187-cho know it must be horrible for [you]112-harry , ”[187-cho] [she]187-cho said , mopping [her]187-cho eyes on [her]187-cho sleeve again . “ [Me]187-cho mentioning [Cedric]191-cedric , when [you]112-harry saw [him]191-cedric die ... [I]187-cho suppose [you]112-harry just want to forget about it ... ”[187-cho]

[Harry]112-harry did not say anything to this ; it was quite true , but [he]112-harry felt heartless saying it .

“ [You]112-harry ’re [a r - really good teacher]3355-a r - really good teacher , [you]112-harry know , ”[187-cho] said [Cho]187-cho , with a watery smile . “ [I]187-cho ’ve never been able to Stun anything before . ”[187-cho]

“ Thanks , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry awkwardly .

[They]576-they looked at [each other]3141-each other for a long moment . [Harry]112-harry felt a burning desire to run from [the room]469-the room and , at the same time , a complete inability to move [his]112-harry feet .

“ Mistletoe , ”[187-cho] said [Cho]187-cho quietly , pointing at the ceiling over [his]112-harry head .

“ Yeah , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry . [His]112-harry mouth was very dry . “ It ’s probably full of nargles , though . ”[112-harry]

“ What are nargles ? ”[187-cho]

“ No idea , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry . [She]187-cho had moved closer . [His]112-harry brain seemed to have been Stunned . “ [You]187-cho ’d have to ask [Loony]193-loony . [Luna]178-luna , [I]187-cho mean . ”[187-cho]

[Cho]187-cho made a funny noise halfway between a sob and a laugh . [She]187-cho was even nearer [him]112-harry now . [He]112-harry could have counted the freckles on [her]187-cho nose .

“ [I]187-cho really like [you]112-harry , [Harry]112-harry . ”[187-cho]

[He]112-harry could not think . A tingling sensation was spreading throughout [him]112-harry , paralyzing [his]112-harry arms , legs , and brain .

[She]187-cho was much too close . [He]112-harry could see every tear clinging to [her]187-cho eyelashes ...

[He]112-harry returned to [the common room]481-the common room half an hour later to find [Hermione]114-hermione and [Ron]113-ron in the best seats by the fire ; nearly [everybody else]570-everybody else had gone to bed . [Hermione]114-hermione was writing a very long letter ; [she]114-hermione had already filled half a roll of parchment , which was dangling from the edge of the table . [Ron]113-ron was lying on the hearthrug , trying to finish [his]113-ron Transfiguration homework .

“ What kept [you]112-harry ? ”[113-ron] [he]113-ron asked , as [Harry]112-harry sank into the armchair next to [[Hermione]114-hermione ’s]581-hermione ’s .

[Harry]112-harry did not answer . [He]112-harry was in a state of shock . [Half of [him]112-harry]582-half of him wanted to tell [Ron]113-ron and [Hermione]114-hermione what had just happened , but the other half wanted to take the secret with [him]112-harry to the grave .

“ Are [you]112-harry all right , [Harry]112-harry ? ”[114-hermione] [Hermione]114-hermione asked , peering at [him]112-harry over the tip of [her]114-hermione quill .

[Harry]112-harry gave a halfhearted shrug . In truth , [he]112-harry did n’t know whether [he]112-harry was all right or not .

“ What ’s up ? ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron , hoisting [himself]113-ron up on [his]113-ron elbow to get a clearer view of [Harry]112-harry . “ What ’s happened ? ”[113-ron]

[Harry]112-harry did n’t quite know how to set about telling [them]583-them , and still was n’t sure whether [he]112-harry wanted to . Just as [he]112-harry had decided not to say anything , [Hermione]114-hermione took matters out of [his]112-harry hands .

“ So — er — what did [she]114-hermione want ? ”[113-ron] [he]113-ron asked in a mock casual voice .

“ [She]114-hermione — ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry began , rather hoarsely ; [he]112-harry cleared [his]112-harry throat and tried again . “ [She]114-hermione — er — ”[112-harry]

[Ron]113-ron sat up so fast that [he]113-ron sent [his]113-ron ink bottle flying all over the rug . Disregarding this completely [he]113-ron stared avidly at [Harry]112-harry .

“ HA ! ”[112-harry]

[The man]599-the man was yelling in pain ... then [he]599-the man fell silent ... [He]599-the man slumped backward against the wall ... Blood was splattering onto the floor ...

[Harry]112-harry was so relieved that [she]200-professor mcgonagall was taking [him]112-harry seriously that [he]112-harry did not hesitate , but jumped out of bed at once , pulled on [his]112-harry dressing gown , and pushed [his]112-harry glasses back onto [his]112-harry nose .

[Harry]112-harry and [the others]3151-the others gathered around [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore ’s desk .

“ [You]667-us have all used [a Portkey]3417-a portkey before ? ”[133-dumbledore] asked [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore , and [they]667-us nodded , each reaching out to touch some part of the blackened kettle . “ Good . On the count of three then ... one ... two ... ”[667-us]

It happened in a fraction of a second : In the infinitesimal pause before [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore said “ three , ”[133-dumbledore] [Harry]112-harry looked up at [him]133-dumbledore — [they]668-they were very close together — and [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore ’s clear blue gaze moved from [the Portkey]21-the portkey to [Harry]112-harry ’s face .

At once , [Harry]112-harry ’s scar burned white - hot , as though the old wound had burst open again — and unbidden , unwanted , but terrifyingly strong , there rose within [Harry]112-harry a hatred so powerful [he]112-harry felt , for that instant , that [he]112-harry would like nothing better than to strike — to bite — to sink [his]112-harry fangs into [the man before [him]112-harry]669-the man before him —

“ ... three . ”[112-harry]

[He]112-harry felt a powerful jerk behind [his]112-harry navel , the ground vanished from beneath [his]112-harry feet , [his]112-harry hand was glued to the kettle ; [he]112-harry was banging into [the others]3151-the others as all sped forward in a swirl of colors and a rush of wind , the kettle pulling [them]3151-the others onward and then —

[His]112-harry feet hit the ground so hard that [his]112-harry knees buckled , the kettle clattered to the ground and somewhere close at hand a voice said , “ Back again , [the blood traitor brats]3422-the blood traitor brats , is it true [[their]3422-the blood traitor brats father]3423-their father ’s dying ... ? ”[112-harry]

“ OUT ! ”[112-harry] roared a second voice .

[Harry]112-harry scrambled to [his]112-harry feet and looked around ; [they]3151-the others had arrived in [the gloomy basement kitchen of number twelve , [Grimmauld Place]16-grimmauld place]671-the gloomy basement kitchen of number twelve , grimmauld place . [Harry]112-harry was only drinking to have something to do with [his]112-harry hands . [His]112-harry stomach was full of horrible hot , bubbling guilt . [They]673-the twins would not be [here]3296-here if it were not for [him]112-harry ; [they]673-the twins would all still be asleep in bed . If [Harry]112-harry had ever sat through a longer night than this one [he]112-harry could not remember it . [Fred]149-fred fell into a doze , [his]149-fred head sagging sideways onto [his]149-fred shoulder . [Everyone]524-everyone but [Harry]112-harry spent the rest of the morning sleeping . [He]112-harry went up to [the bedroom [he]112-harry had shared with [Ron]113-ron]699-the bedroom he had shared with ron over the summer , but while [Ron]113-ron crawled into bed and was asleep within minutes , [Harry]112-harry sat fully clothed , hunched against the cold metal bars of the bedstead , keeping [himself]112-harry deliberately uncomfortable , determined not to fall into a doze , terrified that [he]112-harry might become the serpent again in [his]112-harry sleep and awake to find that [he]112-harry had attacked [Ron]113-ron , or else slithered through [the house]458-the house after [one of [the others]3151-the others]701-one of the others ...

[[Everybody]704-everybody except [Harry]112-harry]705-everybody except harry was riotously happy and talkative as [they]703-they changed out of [their]703-they robes into jeans and sweatshirts , and [they]703-they greeted [Tonks]220-tonks and [Mad - Eye]221-moody , who had turned up to escort [them]703-they across [London]25-london , gleefully laughing at the bowler hat [Mad - Eye]221-moody was wearing at an angle to conceal [his]221-moody magical eye and assuring [him]112-harry , truthfully , that [Tonks]220-tonks , whose hair was short and bright pink again , would attract far less attention on [the underground]706-the underground .

[Harry]112-harry did not answer ; fortunately [they]703-they got out at the next stop , [a station in [the very heart of [London]25-london]711-the very heart of london]710-a station in the very heart of london , and in the bustle of leaving [the train]712-the train [he]112-harry was able to allow [Fred]149-fred and [George]150-george to get between [himself]112-harry and [Tonks]220-tonks , who was leading the way . [They]703-they all followed [her]713-her up [the escalator]714-the escalator , [Moody]221-moody clunking along at the back of [the group]715-the group , [his]221-moody bowler tilted low and one gnarled hand stuck in between the buttons of [his]221-moody coat , clutching [his]221-moody wand . [Harry]112-harry thought [he]112-harry sensed the concealed eye staring hard at [him]112-harry ; trying to deflect more questions about [his]112-harry dream [he]112-harry asked [Mad - Eye]221-moody where [St. Mungo]214-st. mungo ’s was hidden .

“ Not far from here , ”[221-moody] grunted [Moody]221-moody as [they]703-they stepped out into the wintry air on [a broad store - lined street packed with [Christmas shoppers]717-christmas shoppers]716-a broad store - lined street packed with christmas shoppers . “ Very funny , ”[112-harry] snapped [Harry]112-harry , turning away .

But as [they]976-they left , [Harry]112-harry was sure [he]112-harry saw [Neville]161-neville slip the wrapper into [his]161-neville pocket .

The door closed behind [them]976-they .

“ [I]114-hermione never knew , ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione , who looked tearful .

“ Nor did [I]113-ron , ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron rather hoarsely .

“ Nor [me]182-ginny , ”[182-ginny] whispered [Ginny]182-ginny .

[They]976-they all looked at [Harry]112-harry .

“ [I]112-harry did , ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry said glumly . “ [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore told [me]112-harry but [I]112-harry promised [I]112-harry would n’t mention it ... that ’s what [Bellatrix Lestrange]240-bellatrix got sent to [Azkaban]33-azkaban for , using the Cruciatus Curse on [[Neville]161-neville ’s parents]966-neville ’s parents until [they]966-neville ’s parents lost [their]966-neville ’s parents minds . ”[112-harry]

“ [Bellatrix Lestrange]240-bellatrix did that ? ”[114-hermione] whispered [Hermione]114-hermione , horrified . “ That woman [Kreacher]176-kreacher ’s got a photo of in [[his]176-kreacher den]3616-his den ? ”[114-hermione]

There was a long silence , broken by [Lockhart]244-lockhart ’s angry voice . “ Look , [I]244-lockhart did n’t learn joined - up writing for nothing , [you]112-harry know ! ”[244-lockhart]

[Kreacher]176-kreacher , it transpired , had been lurking in [the attic]977-the attic . [Sirius]142-sirius said [he]142-sirius had found [him]176-kreacher up there , covered in dust , no doubt looking for more relics of [the Black family]978-the black family to hide in [[his]142-sirius cupboard]979-his cupboard . Though [Sirius]142-sirius seemed satisfied with this story , it made [Harry]112-harry uneasy . [Kreacher]176-kreacher seemed to be in a better mood on [his]176-kreacher reappearance , [his]176-kreacher bitter muttering had subsided somewhat , and [he]176-kreacher submitted to orders more docilely than usual , though once or twice [Harry]112-harry caught [the house - elf]980-the house - elf staring avidly at [him]112-harry , always looking quickly away when [he]980-the house - elf saw that [Harry]112-harry had noticed .

[Harry]112-harry did not mention [his]112-harry vague suspicions to [Sirius]142-sirius , whose cheerfulness was evaporating fast now that Christmas was over . As the date of [their]981-their departure back to [Hogwarts]18-hogwarts drew nearer , [he]142-sirius became more and more prone to what [Mrs. Weasley]175-mrs. weasley called “ fits of the sullens , ”[175-mrs. weasley] in which [he]142-sirius would become taciturn and grumpy , often withdrawing to [[Buckbeak]139-buckbeak ’s room]845-buckbeak ’s room for hours at a time . [His]142-sirius gloom seeped through [the house]458-the house , oozing under doorways like some noxious gas , so that all of [them]981-their became infected by it .

[Harry]112-harry did not want to leave [Sirius]142-sirius all alone again with only [Kreacher]176-kreacher for company . In fact , for the first time in [his]112-harry life , [he]112-harry was not looking forward to returning to [Hogwarts]18-hogwarts . Going back to [school]984-school would mean placing [himself]112-harry once again under the tyranny of [Dolores Umbridge]145-dolores , who had no doubt managed to force through another dozen decrees in [their]981-their absence . Then there was no [Quidditch]252-quidditch to look forward to now that [he]142-sirius had been banned ; there was every likelihood that [their]981-their burden of homework would increase as the exams drew even nearer ; [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore remained as remote as ever ; in fact , if it had not been for [the D.A.]253-the d.a. , [Harry]112-harry felt [he]112-harry might have gone to [Sirius]142-sirius and begged [him]142-sirius to let [him]112-harry leave [Hogwarts]18-hogwarts and remain in [Grimmauld Place]16-grimmauld place .

Then , on the very last day of the holidays , something happened that made [Harry]112-harry positively dread [his]112-harry return to [school]984-school .

“ [Harry]112-harry dear , ”[175-mrs. weasley] said [Mrs. Weasley]175-mrs. weasley , poking [her]175-mrs. weasley head into [his]986-his and [[Ron]113-ron ’s bedroom]814-ron ’s bedroom , where [the pair of [them]981-their]988-the pair of them were playing wizard chess watched by [Hermione]114-hermione , [Ginny]182-ginny , and [Crookshanks]254-crookshanks , “ could [you]112-harry come down to [the kitchen]689-the kitchen ? [Harry]112-harry did not immediately register what [she]175-mrs. weasley had said ; one of [[his]112-harry castles]989-his castles was engaged in a violent tussle with [a pawn of [Ron]113-ron ’s]990-a pawn of ron ’s , and [he]112-harry was egging it on enthusiastically .

“ Squash [him]113-ron — squash [him]113-ron , [he]113-ron ’s only [a pawn]3618-a pawn , [[you]112-harry idiot]3619-you idiot — sorry , [Mrs. Weasley]175-mrs. weasley , what did [you]175-mrs. weasley say ? ”[175-mrs. weasley]

“ [Professor Snape]255-snape , [dear]3502-dear . In [the kitchen]689-the kitchen . [He]255-snape ’d like a word . ”[112-harry]

[Harry]112-harry ’s mouth fell open in horror . [He]112-harry looked around at [Ron]113-ron , [Hermione]114-hermione , and [Ginny]182-ginny , all of whom were gaping back at [him]112-harry . [Crookshanks]254-crookshanks , whom [Hermione]114-hermione had been restraining with difficulty for the past quarter of an hour , leapt gleefully upon the board and set the pieces running for cover , squealing at the top of [their]991-their voices .

“ [Snape]255-snape ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry blankly .

“ [Professor Snape]255-snape , [dear]3502-dear , ”[175-mrs. weasley] said [Mrs. Weasley]175-mrs. weasley reprovingly . “ Now come on , quickly , [he]255-snape says [he]255-snape ca n’t stay long . ”[175-mrs. weasley]

“ What ’s [he]255-snape want with [you]3502-dear ? ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron , looking unnerved as [Mrs. Weasley]175-mrs. weasley withdrew from [the room]469-the room .

“ [You]3502-dear have n’t done anything , have [you]3502-dear ? ”[175-mrs. weasley]

“ No ! ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry indignantly , racking [his]112-harry brains to think what [he]112-harry could have done that would make [Snape]255-snape pursue [him]112-harry to [Grimmauld Place]16-grimmauld place . Had [his]112-harry last piece of homework perhaps earned a T ?

[He]112-harry pushed open the kitchen door a minute or two later to find [Sirius]142-sirius and [Snape]255-snape both seated at the long kitchen table , glaring in opposite directions . The silence between [them]993-them was heavy with mutual dislike . A letter lay open on the table in front of [Sirius]142-sirius .

“ Er , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry to announce [his]112-harry presence .

[Snape]255-snape looked around at [him]112-harry , [his]255-snape face framed between curtains of greasy black hair .

“ Sit down , [Potter]112-harry . ”[255-snape]

“ [You]112-harry know , ”[142-sirius] said [Sirius]142-sirius loudly , leaning back on [his]142-sirius rear chair legs and speaking to the ceiling , “ [I]142-sirius think [I]142-sirius ’d prefer it if [you]112-harry did n’t give orders here , [Snape]255-snape . It ’s [[my]142-sirius house]3623-my house , [you]112-harry see . ”[142-sirius]

An ugly flush suffused [Snape]255-snape ’s pallid face . [Harry]112-harry sat down in a chair beside [Sirius]142-sirius , facing [Snape]255-snape across the table .

“ [I]255-snape was supposed to see [you]112-harry alone , [Potter]112-harry , ”[255-snape] said [Snape]255-snape , the familiar sneer curling [his]255-snape mouth , “ but [Black]142-sirius — ”[255-snape]

“ [I]142-sirius ’m [[his]142-sirius godfather]543-his godfather , ”[142-sirius] said [Sirius]142-sirius , louder than ever .

“ [I]255-snape am here on [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore ’s orders , ”[255-snape] said [Snape]255-snape , whose voice , by contrast , was becoming more and more quietly waspish , “ but by all means stay , [Black]142-sirius , [I]255-snape know [you]142-sirius like to feel ... involved . ”[255-snape]

“ What ’s that supposed to mean ? ”[142-sirius] said [Sirius]142-sirius , letting [his]142-sirius chair fall back onto all four legs with a loud bang .

It was [Sirius]142-sirius ’s turn to flush . [Snape]255-snape ’s lip curled in triumph as [he]255-snape turned to [Harry]112-harry .

“ [The headmaster]3380-the headmaster has sent [me]255-snape to tell [you]142-sirius , [Potter]112-harry , that it is [his]3380-the headmaster wish for [you]142-sirius to study Occlumency this term . ”[255-snape]

“ Study what ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry blankly .

[Snape]255-snape ’s sneer became more pronounced .

“ Occlumency , [Potter]112-harry . The magical defense of the mind against external penetration . An obscure branch of magic , but a highly useful one . ”[255-snape]

[Harry]112-harry ’s heart began to pump very fast indeed . Defense against external penetration ? But [he]112-harry was not being possessed , [they]994-they had all agreed on that ...

“ Why do [I]112-harry have to study Occlu — thing ? ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry blurted out .

“ Because [the headmaster]3380-the headmaster thinks it a good idea , ”[255-snape] said [Snape]255-snape smoothly . “ [You]142-sirius will receive private lessons once a week , but [you]142-sirius will not tell [anybody]3627-anybody what [you]142-sirius are doing , least of all [Dolores Umbridge]145-dolores . [You]142-sirius understand ? ”[255-snape]

“ Yes , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry . “ Who ’s going to be teaching [me]112-harry ? ”[112-harry]

[Snape]255-snape raised an eyebrow .

“ [I]255-snape am , ”[255-snape] [he]255-snape said .

[Harry]112-harry had the horrible sensation that [his]112-harry insides were melting . Extra lessons with [Snape]255-snape — what on earth had [he]112-harry done to deserve this ? [He]112-harry looked quickly around at [Sirius]142-sirius for support .

“ Why ca n’t [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore teach [Harry]112-harry ? ”[142-sirius] asked [Sirius]142-sirius aggressively . “ Why [you]112-harry ? ”[142-sirius]

“ [I]255-snape suppose because it is a [headmaster]3628-headmaster ’s privilege to delegate less enjoyable tasks , ”[255-snape] said [Snape]255-snape silkily . “ [I]255-snape assure [you]112-harry [I]255-snape did not beg for the job . ”[255-snape] [He]255-snape got to [his]255-snape feet . “ [I]255-snape will expect [you]112-harry at six o’clock on Monday evening , [Potter]112-harry . [Nobody who has seen [you]112-harry in [my]255-snape classes]3631-nobody who has seen you in my classes could deny [you]112-harry need them . ”[255-snape]

[He]255-snape turned to leave , [his]255-snape black traveling cloak billowing behind [him]255-snape .

“ [I]255-snape am in rather a hurry , [Black]142-sirius ... unlike [you]142-sirius , [I]255-snape do not have unlimited leisure time ... ”[255-snape]

“ [I]142-sirius ’ll get to the point , then , ”[142-sirius] said [Sirius]142-sirius , standing up . [He]255-snape was rather taller than [Snape]255-snape who , [Harry]112-harry noticed , had balled [his]255-snape fist in the pocket of [his]255-snape cloak over what [Harry]112-harry was sure was the handle of [his]255-snape wand . “ If [I]255-snape hear [you]142-sirius ’re using these Occlumency lessons to give [Harry]112-harry a hard time , [you]142-sirius ’ll have [me]255-snape to answer to . ”[255-snape]

“ How touching , ”[255-snape] [Snape]255-snape sneered . “ But surely [you]142-sirius have noticed that [Potter]112-harry is very like [[his]112-harry father]789-his father ? ”[255-snape]

“ Yes , [I]142-sirius have , ”[142-sirius] said [Sirius]142-sirius proudly .

“ Well then , [you]142-sirius ’ll know [he]112-harry ’s so arrogant that criticism simply bounces off [him]112-harry , ”[255-snape] [Snape]255-snape said sleekly .

[Sirius]142-sirius pushed [his]142-sirius chair roughly aside and strode around the table toward [Snape]255-snape , pulling out [his]142-sirius wand as [he]142-sirius went ; [Snape]255-snape whipped out [his]255-snape own . [They]996-they were squaring up to [each other]3141-each other , [Sirius]142-sirius looking livid , [Snape]255-snape calculating , [his]255-snape eyes darting from [Sirius]142-sirius ’s wand - tip to [his]255-snape face .

“ [Sirius]142-sirius ! ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry loudly , but [Sirius]142-sirius appeared not to hear [him]112-harry .

“ [I]142-sirius ’ve warned [you]255-snape , [Snivellus]256-snivellus , ”[142-sirius] said [Sirius]142-sirius , [his]142-sirius face barely a foot from [Snape]255-snape ’s , “ [I]142-sirius do n’t care if [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore thinks [you]255-snape ’ve reformed , [I]142-sirius know better — ”[142-sirius]

“ Oh , but why do n’t [you]142-sirius tell [him]133-dumbledore so ? ”[255-snape] whispered [Snape]255-snape . “ Or are [you]142-sirius afraid [he]133-dumbledore might not take the advice of a man who has been hiding inside [[[his]133-dumbledore mother]545-his mother ’s house]3634-his mother ’s house for six months very seriously ? ”[255-snape]

“ Tell [me]142-sirius , how is [Lucius Malfoy]155-malfoy these days ? [I]142-sirius expect [he]155-malfoy ’s delighted [his]155-malfoy lapdog ’s working at [Hogwarts]18-hogwarts , is n’t [he]155-malfoy ? ”[142-sirius]

“ [Harry]112-harry — get — out — of — it ! ”[142-sirius] snarled [Sirius]142-sirius , pushing [him]112-harry out of the way with [his]142-sirius free hand .

The kitchen door opened and [the entire Weasley family]999-the entire weasley family , plus [Hermione]114-hermione , came inside , all looking very happy , with [Mr. Weasley]201-mr. weasley walking proudly in [their]999-the entire weasley family midst dressed in a pair of striped pajamas covered by a mackintosh .

“ Cured ! ”[201-mr. weasley] [he]201-mr. weasley announced brightly to [the kitchen]689-the kitchen at large . “ Completely cured ! ”[201-mr. weasley]

[He]201-mr. weasley and [all the other Weasleys]1001-all the other weasleys froze on the threshold , gazing at the scene in front of [them]999-the entire weasley family , which was also suspended in mid - action , both [Sirius]142-sirius and [Snape]255-snape looking toward the door with [their]999-the entire weasley family wands pointing into [each other]3141-each other ’s faces and [Harry]112-harry immobile between [them]999-the entire weasley family , a hand stretched out to each of [them]999-the entire weasley family , trying to force [them]999-the entire weasley family apart .

“ [Merlin]118-merlin ’s beard , ”[201-mr. weasley] said [Mr. Weasley]201-mr. weasley , the smile sliding off [his]201-mr. weasley face , “ what ’s going on here ? ”[201-mr. weasley]

Both [Sirius]142-sirius and [Snape]255-snape lowered [their]999-the entire weasley family wands . [Harry]112-harry looked from one to [the other]1003-the other . [Each]1004-each wore an expression of utmost contempt , yet the unexpected entrance of [so many witnesses]1005-so many witnesses seemed to have brought [them]999-the entire weasley family to [their]999-the entire weasley family senses . [Snape]255-snape pocketed [his]255-snape wand and swept back across [the kitchen]689-the kitchen , passing [the Weasleys]217-the weasleys without comment . At the door [he]255-snape looked back .

“ Six o’clock Monday evening , [Potter]112-harry . ”[255-snape]

[He]255-snape was gone . [Sirius]142-sirius glared after [him]255-snape , [his]142-sirius wand at [his]142-sirius side .

“ But what ’s been going on ? ”[201-mr. weasley] asked [Mr. Weasley]201-mr. weasley again .

“ Nothing , [Arthur]203-arthur , ”[142-sirius] said [Sirius]142-sirius , who was breathing heavily as though [he]142-sirius had just run a long distance . “ Just a friendly little chat between [two old school friends]3637-two old school friends ... ”[142-sirius] With what looked like an enormous effort , [he]142-sirius smiled . “ So ... [you]203-arthur ’re cured ? That ’s great news , really great ... ”[142-sirius]

“ Yes , is n’t it ? ”[175-mrs. weasley] said [Mrs. Weasley]175-mrs. weasley , leading [[her]175-mrs. weasley husband]894-her husband forward into a chair . “ [Healer Smethwyck]227-healer smethwyck worked [his]227-healer smethwyck magic in the end , found an antidote to whatever that snake ’s got in its fangs , and [Arthur]203-arthur ’s learned [his]203-arthur lesson about dabbling in Muggle medicine , have n’t [you]203-arthur , [dear]3502-dear ? ”[175-mrs. weasley] [she]175-mrs. weasley added , rather menacingly .

“ Yes , [Molly]209-molly dear , ”[201-mr. weasley] said [Mr. Weasley]201-mr. weasley meekly .

That night ’s meal should have been a cheerful one with [Mr. Weasley]201-mr. weasley back amongst [them]1008-them ; [Harry]112-harry could tell [Sirius]142-sirius was trying to make it so , yet when [[his]112-harry godfather]543-his godfather was not forcing [himself]543-his godfather to laugh loudly at [Fred]149-fred and [George]150-george ’s jokes or offering [everyone]524-everyone more food , [his]543-his godfather face fell back into a moody , brooding expression . [Harry]112-harry was separated from [him]543-his godfather by [Mundungus]236-mundungus and [Mad - Eye]221-moody , who had dropped in to offer [Mr. Weasley]201-mr. weasley [their]1008-them congratulations ; [he]112-harry wanted to talk to [Sirius]142-sirius , to tell [him]142-sirius that [he]142-sirius should not listen to a word [Snape]255-snape said , that [Snape]255-snape was goading [him]142-sirius deliberately and that [the rest of [them]1008-them]1011-the rest of them did not think [Sirius]142-sirius was a coward for doing as [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore told [him]142-sirius and remaining in [Grimmauld Place]16-grimmauld place , but [he]112-harry had no opportunity to do so , and wondered occasionally , eyeing the ugly look on [Sirius]142-sirius ’s face , whether [he]112-harry would have dared to even if [he]112-harry had the chance . Instead [he]112-harry told [Ron]113-ron and [Hermione]114-hermione under [his]112-harry voice about having to take Occlumency lessons with [Snape]255-snape .

“ [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore wants to stop [you]112-harry having those dreams about [Voldemort]192-voldemort , ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione at once . “ Well , [you]112-harry wo n’t be sorry not to have them anymore , will [you]112-harry ? ”[114-hermione]

“ Extra lessons with [Snape]255-snape ? ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron , sounding aghast . “ [I]113-ron ’d rather have the nightmares ! ”[113-ron]

[They]1012-they were to return to [Hogwarts]18-hogwarts on [the Knight Bus]3529-the knight bus the following day , escorted once again by [Tonks]220-tonks and [Lupin]238-lupin , both of whom were eating breakfast in [the kitchen]689-the kitchen when [Harry]112-harry , [Ron]113-ron , and [Hermione]114-hermione arrived [there]3115-there next morning . [The adults]1016-the adults seemed to have been midway through a whispered conversation when the door opened ; all of [them]1016-the adults looked around hastily and fell silent .

After a hurried breakfast [they]1012-they pulled on jackets and scarves against the chilly gray January morning . [Harry]112-harry had an unpleasant constricted sensation in [his]112-harry chest ; [he]112-harry did not want to say good - bye to [Sirius]142-sirius . [He]112-harry had a bad feeling about this parting ; [he]112-harry did not know when [they]1012-they would next see [each other]3141-each other and felt that it was incumbent upon [him]112-harry to say something to [Sirius]142-sirius to stop [him]112-harry doing anything stupid — [Harry]112-harry was worried that [Snape]255-snape ’s accusation of cowardice had stung [Sirius]142-sirius so badly [he]255-snape might even now be planning some foolhardy trip beyond [Grimmauld Place]16-grimmauld place . Before [he]112-harry could think of what to say , however , [Sirius]142-sirius had beckoned [him]112-harry to [his]112-harry side .

“ [I]142-sirius want [you]112-harry to take this , ”[142-sirius] [he]142-sirius said quietly , thrusting a badly wrapped package roughly the size of a paperback book into [Harry]112-harry ’s hands .

“ What is it ? ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry asked .

“ A way of letting [me]142-sirius know if [Snape]255-snape ’s giving [you]112-harry a hard time . No , do n’t open it in here ! ”[142-sirius] said [Sirius]142-sirius , with a wary look at [Mrs. Weasley]175-mrs. weasley , who was trying to persuade [the twins]673-the twins to wear hand - knitted mittens . “ [I]175-mrs. weasley doubt [Molly]209-molly would approve — but [I]175-mrs. weasley want [you]112-harry to use it if [you]112-harry need [me]175-mrs. weasley , all right ? ”[175-mrs. weasley]

“ Okay , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry , stowing the package away in the inside pocket of [his]112-harry jacket , but [he]112-harry knew [he]112-harry would never use whatever it was . It would not be [he]112-harry , [Harry]112-harry , who lured [Sirius]142-sirius from [his]142-sirius place of safety , no matter how foully [Snape]255-snape treated [him]142-sirius in [their]673-the twins forthcoming Occlumency classes .

“ Let ’s go , then , ”[142-sirius] said [Sirius]142-sirius , clapping [Harry]112-harry on the shoulder and smiling grimly , and before [Harry]112-harry could say anything else , [they]673-the twins were heading [upstairs]3504-upstairs , stopping before the heavily chained and bolted front door , surrounded by [Weasleys]217-the weasleys .

“ Good - bye , [Harry]112-harry , take care , ”[175-mrs. weasley] said [Mrs. Weasley]175-mrs. weasley , hugging [him]112-harry .

“ Right — yeah , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry distractedly . BANG .

[A violently purple , triple - decker bus]1027-a violently purple , triple - decker bus had appeared out of thin air in front of [them]1023-them , narrowly avoiding the nearest lamppost , which jumped backward out of its way .

[A thin , pimply , jug - eared youth in a purple uniform]1028-a thin , pimply , jug - eared youth in a purple uniform leapt down onto [the pavement]1024-the pavement and said , “ Welcome to the — ”[1028-a thin , pimply , jug - eared youth in a purple uniform]

“ ’ Ere — it ’s ’ [Arry]257-arry — ! ”[220-tonks]

“ [I]113-ron ’ve always wanted to go on this thing , ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron happily , joining [Harry]112-harry on board and looking around .

It had been evening the last time [Harry]112-harry had traveled by [Knight Bus]36-knight bus and [its]36-knight bus three decks had been full of brass bedsteads . Now , in the early morning , [it]36-knight bus was crammed with an assortment of mismatched chairs grouped haphazardly around windows . [They]1043-they were rolling through [a snowy Hogsmeade]1065-a snowy hogsmeade . [The six of [them]1011-the rest of them]1074-the six of them struggled up [the slippery drive]1075-the slippery drive toward [the castle]3279-the castle dragging [their]1074-the six of them trunks . [Harry]112-harry spent most of the next day dreading the evening . [His]112-harry morning Potions lesson did nothing to dispel [his]112-harry trepidation , as [Snape]255-snape was as unpleasant as ever , and [Harry]112-harry ’s mood was further lowered by the fact that [members of [the D.A.]14-the d.a.]1077-members of the d.a. were continually approaching [him]112-harry in [the corridors]534-the corridors between classes , asking hopefully whether there would be a meeting that night .

“ [I]112-harry ’ll let [you]186-zacharias smith know when the next one is , ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry said over and over again , “ but [I]112-harry ca n’t do it tonight , [I]112-harry ’ve got to go to — er — Remedial Potions ... ”[112-harry]

By six o’clock that evening , however , even the glow of having successfully asked out [Cho Chang]187-cho was insufficient to lighten the ominous feelings that intensified with every step [Harry]112-harry took toward [[Snape]255-snape ’s office]1083-snape ’s office .

[He]112-harry paused outside the door when [he]112-harry reached [it]1084-it , wishing [he]112-harry were almost anywhere else , then , taking a deep breath , knocked , and entered .

It was [a shadowy room]1085-a shadowy room lined with shelves bearing hundreds of glass jars in which floated slimy bits of animals and plants , suspended in variously colored potions . In a corner stood the cupboard full of ingredients that [Snape]255-snape had once accused [Harry]112-harry — not without reason — of robbing . [Harry]112-harry ’s attention was drawn toward the desk , however , where a shallow stone basin engraved with runes and symbols lay in a pool of candlelight . [Harry]112-harry recognized it at once — [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore ’s Pensieve . Wondering what on earth it was doing [here]3296-here , [he]112-harry jumped when [Snape]255-snape ’s cold voice came out of the corner .

“ Shut the door behind [you]112-harry , [Potter]112-harry . ”[255-snape]

[Harry]112-harry did as [he]112-harry was told with the horrible feeling that [he]112-harry was imprisoning [himself]112-harry as [he]112-harry did so . When [he]112-harry turned back to face [the room]469-the room [Snape]255-snape had moved into the light and was pointing silently at the chair opposite [his]255-snape desk . [Harry]112-harry sat down and so did [Snape]255-snape , [his]255-snape cold black eyes fixed unblinkingly upon [Harry]112-harry , dislike etched in every line of [his]255-snape face .

“ Well , [Potter]112-harry , [you]112-harry know why [you]112-harry are here , ”[255-snape] [he]255-snape said . “ [The headmaster]3380-the headmaster has asked [me]255-snape to teach [you]112-harry Occlumency . “ Right , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry tersely .

“ Yes ... [sir]3398-sir , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry .

“ Now , Occlumency . As [I]255-snape told [you]112-harry back in [your]112-harry dear [godfather ’s kitchen]3654-godfather ’s kitchen , this branch of magic seals the mind against magical intrusion and influence . ”[255-snape]

“ And why does [Professor Dumbledore]133-dumbledore think [I]112-harry need it , [sir]3398-sir ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry , looking directly into [Snape]255-snape ’s dark , cold eyes and wondering whether [he]255-snape would answer .

[Snape]255-snape looked back at [him]112-harry for a moment and then said contemptuously , “ Surely even [you]112-harry could have worked that out by now , [Potter]112-harry ? [The Dark Lord]192-voldemort is highly skilled at Legilimency — ”[255-snape]

“ What ’s that ? [Sir]3398-sir ? ”[255-snape]

“ It is the ability to extract feelings and memories from [another person]3657-another person ’s mind — ”[255-snape]

“ [He]192-voldemort can read minds ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry quickly , [his]112-harry worst fears confirmed .

“ [You]112-harry have no subtlety , [Potter]112-harry , ”[255-snape] said [Snape]255-snape , [his]255-snape dark eyes glittering . “ [You]112-harry do not understand fine distinctions . It is one of the shortcomings that makes [you]112-harry such [a lamentable potion - maker]3658-a lamentable potion - maker . ”[255-snape]

[Snape]255-snape paused for a moment , apparently to savor the pleasure of insulting [Harry]112-harry , before continuing , “ Only [Muggles]121-muggles talk of ‘ mind reading . ’ The mind is not a book , to be opened at will and examined at leisure . Thoughts are not etched on the inside of skulls , to be perused by [any invader]3659-any invader . The mind is a complex and many - layered thing , [Potter]112-harry ... or at least , most minds are ... ”[255-snape] [He]255-snape smirked . “ It is true , however , that [those who have mastered Legilimency]3660-those who have mastered legilimency are able , under certain conditions , to delve into the minds of [[their]3660-those who have mastered legilimency victims]3661-their victims and to interpret [their]3660-those who have mastered legilimency findings correctly . [The Dark Lord]192-voldemort , for instance , almost always knows when [somebody]491-somebody is lying to [him]491-somebody . [Only those skilled at Occlumency]3663-only those skilled at occlumency are able to shut down those feelings and memories that contradict the lie , and so utter falsehoods in [his]491-somebody presence without detection . ”[255-snape]

Whatever [Snape]255-snape said , Legilimency sounded like mind reading to [Harry]112-harry and [he]112-harry did not like the sound of it at all .

“ So [he]491-somebody could know what [we]3664-we ’re thinking right now ? [Sir]3398-sir ? ”[255-snape]

“ [The Dark Lord]192-voldemort is at a considerable distance and the walls and grounds of [Hogwarts]18-hogwarts are guarded by many ancient spells and charms to ensure the bodily and mental safety of those who dwell within [them]18-hogwarts , ”[255-snape] said [Snape]255-snape . “ Time and space matter in magic , [Potter]112-harry . Eye contact is often essential to [Legilimency]266-legilimency . ”[255-snape]

“ Well then , why do [I]255-snape have to learn Occlumency ? ”[255-snape]

[Snape]255-snape eyed [Harry]112-harry , tracing [his]112-harry mouth with one long , thin finger as [he]255-snape did so .

“ The usual rules do not seem to apply with [you]112-harry , [Potter]112-harry . The curse that failed to kill [you]112-harry seems to have forged some kind of connection between [you]112-harry and [the Dark Lord]192-voldemort . The evidence suggests that at times , when [your]112-harry mind is most relaxed and vulnerable — when [you]112-harry are asleep , for instance — [you]112-harry are sharing [the Dark Lord]192-voldemort ’s thoughts and emotions . [The headmaster]3380-the headmaster thinks it inadvisable for this to continue . [He]3380-the headmaster wishes [me]255-snape to teach [you]112-harry how to close [your]112-harry mind to [the Dark Lord]192-voldemort . ”[255-snape]

[Harry]112-harry ’s heart was pumping fast again . None of this added up .

“ But why does [Professor Dumbledore]133-dumbledore want to stop it ? ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry asked abruptly . “ [I]112-harry do n’t like it much , but it ’s been useful , has n’t it ? [I]112-harry mean ... [I]112-harry saw that snake attack [Mr. Weasley]201-mr. weasley and if [I]112-harry had n’t , [Professor Dumbledore]133-dumbledore would n’t have been able to save [him]201-mr. weasley , would [he]133-dumbledore ? [Sir]3398-sir ? ”[112-harry]

[Snape]255-snape stared at [Harry]112-harry for a few moments , still tracing [his]255-snape mouth with [his]255-snape finger . When [he]255-snape spoke again , it was slowly and deliberately , as though [he]255-snape weighed every word .

“ It appears that [the Dark Lord]192-voldemort has been unaware of the connection between [you]112-harry and [himself]192-voldemort until very recently . Up till now it seems that [you]112-harry have been experiencing [his]192-voldemort emotions and sharing [his]192-voldemort thoughts without [his]192-voldemort being any the wiser . However , the vision [you]112-harry had shortly before Christmas — ”[255-snape]

“ [The one with the snake]3668-the one with the snake and [Mr. Weasley]201-mr. weasley ? ”[255-snape]

“ Do not interrupt [me]255-snape , [Potter]112-harry , ”[255-snape] said [Snape]255-snape in a dangerous voice . “ As [I]255-snape was saying ... the vision [you]112-harry had shortly before Christmas represented such a powerful incursion upon [the Dark Lord]192-voldemort ’s thoughts — ”[255-snape]

For [Harry]112-harry had just run both [his]112-harry hands hard over [his]112-harry forehead as though trying to iron it .

“ Yeah ... fine ... ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry said , lowering [his]112-harry hands , which were trembling . “ [I]112-harry just feel a bit ... [I]112-harry do n’t like Occlumency much ... ”[112-harry]

“ [I]114-hermione expect [anyone]680-anyone would feel shaky if [they]680-anyone ’d had [their]680-anyone mind attacked over and over again , ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione sympathetically . “ Look , let ’s get back to [the common room]481-the common room , [we]3708-we ’ll be a bit more comfortable there ... ”[114-hermione]

But [the common room]481-the common room was packed and full of shrieks of laughter and excitement ; [Fred]149-fred and [George]150-george were demonstrating [their]1132-their latest bit of joke shop merchandise .

“ Headless Hats ! ”[150-george] shouted [George]150-george , as [Fred]149-fred waved a pointed hat decorated with a fluffy pink feather at [the watching students]1133-the watching students . “ Two Galleons each — watch [Fred]149-fred , now ! ”[149-fred]

[Fred]149-fred swept the hat onto [his]149-fred head , beaming . For a second [he]149-fred merely looked rather stupid , then both hat and head vanished .

[Several girls]1134-several girls screamed , but [everyone else]3359-everyone else was roaring with laughter .

“ And off again ! ”[150-george] shouted [George]150-george , and [Fred]149-fred ’s hand groped for a moment in what seemed to be thin air over [his]149-fred shoulder ; then [his]149-fred head reappeared as [he]149-fred swept the pink - feathered hat from it again .

[Harry]112-harry did not answer ; [he]112-harry was still feeling ill .

[He]112-harry walked across [the common room]481-the common room , dodging [George]150-george , who tried to put a Headless Hat on [him]112-harry , and reached the peace and cool of the stone staircase to [[the boys]448-the boys ’ dormitories]1138-the boys ’ dormitories . [He]112-harry opened the door of [[his]112-harry dormitory]1139-his dormitory and was one step inside [it]1139-his dormitory when [he]112-harry experienced pain so severe [he]112-harry thought that [someone]3263-someone must have sliced into the top of [his]112-harry head . TRAGIC DEMISE OF [MINISTRY OF MAGIC WORKER]1169-ministry of magic worker

[[St. Mungo]214-st. mungo ’s [Hospital]694-hospital]3410-st. mungo ’s hospital promised a full inquiry last night after [Ministry of Magic worker]1169-ministry of magic worker [Broderick Bode]282-broderick bode , 49 , was discovered dead in [his]282-broderick bode bed , strangled by a potted - plant . [Healer Miriam Strout]283-healer strout , who was in charge of [[Mr. Bode]225-bode ’s ward]1174-mr. bode ’s ward at the time of the incident , has been suspended on full pay and was unavailable for comment yesterday , but [a spokeswizard for [the hospital]3413-the hospital]1175-a spokeswizard for the hospital said in a statement , “ [St. Mungo]214-st. mungo ’s deeply regrets the death of [Mr. Bode]225-bode , whose health was improving steadily prior to this tragic accident .
