Rumors were flying that [some of [the convicts]1201-the convicts]1200-some of the convicts had been spotted in [Hogsmeade]39-hogsmeade , that [they]1200-some of the convicts were supposed to be hiding out in [the Shrieking Shack]1202-the shrieking shack and that [they]1200-some of the convicts were going to break into [Hogwarts]18-hogwarts , just as [Sirius Black]142-sirius had done .

[Those who came from [Wizarding families]1204-wizarding families]1203-those who came from wizarding families had grown up hearing the names of [these Death Eaters]1205-these death eaters spoken with almost as much fear as [Voldemort]192-voldemort ’s ; the crimes [they]1205-these death eaters had committed during the days of [Voldemort]192-voldemort ’s reign of terror were legendary . There were [relatives of [[their]1205-these death eaters victims]3661-their victims among [the Hogwarts students]1208-the hogwarts students , who now found [themselves]1205-these death eaters the unwilling objects of a gruesome sort of reflected fame as [they]1205-these death eaters walked [the corridors]534-the corridors : [Susan Bones]286-susan bones , who had [an uncle]1210-an uncle , [aunt]1211-aunt , and [[cousins]1212-cousins who had all died at the hands of one of [the ten]1214-the ten]1213-cousins who had all died at the hands of one of the ten]1206-relatives of their victims among the hogwarts students , who now found themselves the unwilling objects of a gruesome sort of reflected fame as they walked the corridors : susan bones , who had an uncle , aunt , and cousins who had all died at the hands of one of the ten , said miserably during Herbology that [she]1215-she now had a good idea what it felt like to be [Harry]112-harry .

“ And [I]1215-she do n’t know how [you]112-harry stand it , it ’s horrible , ”[1215-she] [she]1215-she said bluntly , dumping far too much dragon manure on [her]1215-she tray of Screechsnap seedlings , causing [them]1216-them to wriggle and squeak in discomfort .

It was true that [Harry]112-harry was the subject of much renewed muttering and pointing in [the corridors]534-the corridors these days , yet [he]112-harry thought [he]112-harry detected a slight difference in the tone of [the whisperers]1218-the whisperers ’ voices . [They]1218-the whisperers sounded curious rather than hostile now , and once or twice [he]112-harry was sure [he]112-harry overheard snatches of conversation that suggested that [the speakers]1219-the speakers were not satisfied with [the Prophet]786-the prophet ’s version of how and why [ten Death Eaters]1221-ten death eaters had managed to break out of [Azkaban fortress]43-azkaban fortress . In [their]1218-the whisperers confusion and fear , [these doubters]1222-these doubters now seemed to be turning to the only other explanation available to [them]1218-the whisperers , the one that [Harry]112-harry and [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore had been expounding since the previous year .

It was not only [the students]3322-the students ’ mood that had changed . It was now quite common to come across [two or three teachers]1224-two or three teachers conversing in low , urgent whispers in [the corridors]534-the corridors , breaking off [their]1224-two or three teachers conversations the moment [they]1224-two or three teachers saw [students]483-students approaching .

“ [They]483-students obviously ca n’t talk freely in [the staffroom]3744-the staffroom anymore , ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione in a low voice , as [she]114-hermione , [Harry]112-harry , and [Ron]113-ron passed [Professors McGonagall]287-professors mcgonagall , [Flitwick]132-professor flitwick , and [Sprout]281-professor sprout huddled together outside [the Charms classroom]1227-the charms classroom one day . “ Not with [Umbridge]144-umbridge [there]3115-there . ”[281-professor sprout]

“ Reckon [they]483-students know anything new ? ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron , gazing back over [his]113-ron shoulder at [the three teachers]1228-the three teachers .

“ If [they]483-students do , [we]3746-we ’re not going to hear about it , are [we]3746-we ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry angrily . “ Not after Decree ... What number are [we]3746-we on now ? ”[112-harry]

For new signs had appeared on the house notice boards the morning after news of the [Azkaban]33-azkaban breakout :

BY ORDER OF [The High Inquisitor of [Hogwarts]18-hogwarts [teachers]3285-teachers]1229-the high inquisitor of hogwarts teachers are hereby banned from giving [students]483-students any information that is not strictly related to the subjects [they]3285-teachers are paid to teach . The above is in accordance with Educational Decree Number Twenty - six .

This latest decree had been the subject of a great number of jokes among [the students]3322-the students . [Lee Jordan]152-lee had pointed out to [Umbridge]144-umbridge that by the terms of the new rule [she]1233-her was not allowed to tell [Fred]149-fred and [George]150-george off for playing Exploding Snap in the back of [the class]493-the class .

“ Exploding Snap ’s got nothing to do with Defense Against the Dark Arts , [Professor]3376-professor ! That ’s not information relating to [your]3376-professor subject ! ”[1233-her]

When [Harry]112-harry next saw [Lee]152-lee , the back of [his]112-harry hand was bleeding rather badly . [Harry]112-harry recommended essence of murtlap .

[Harry]112-harry had thought that the breakout from [Azkaban]33-azkaban might have humbled [Umbridge]144-umbridge a little , that [she]1233-her might have been abashed at the catastrophe that had occurred right under [her]1233-her beloved [Fudge]280-fudge ’s nose . It seemed , however , to have only intensified [her]1233-her furious desire to bring every aspect of life at [Hogwarts]18-hogwarts under [her]1233-her personal control . [She]1233-her seemed determined at the very least to achieve a sacking before long , and the only question was whether it would be [Professor Trelawney]147-professor trelawney or [Hagrid]116-hagrid who went first .

Every single Divination and Care of [Magical Creatures]288-magical creatures lesson was now conducted in the presence of [Umbridge]144-umbridge and [her]1233-her clipboard . [She]1233-her lurked by the fire in [the heavily perfumed tower room]1235-the heavily perfumed tower room , interrupting [Professor Trelawney]147-professor trelawney ’s increasingly hysterical talks with difficult questions about Ornithomancy and Heptomology , insisting that [she]1233-her predict [students]483-students ’ answers before [they]483-students gave [them]483-students and demanding that [she]1233-her demonstrate [her]1233-her skill at the crystal ball , the tea leaves , and the rune stones in turn . [Harry]112-harry thought that [Professor Trelawney]147-professor trelawney might soon crack under the strain ; several times [he]112-harry passed [her]1233-her in [the corridors]534-the corridors ( in itself a very unusual occurrence as [she]1233-her generally remained in [[her]1233-her tower room]1238-her tower room ) , muttering wildly to [herself]1233-her , wringing [her]1233-her hands , and shooting terrified glances over [her]1233-her shoulder , all the time giving off a powerful smell of cooking sherry . If [he]112-harry had not been so worried about [Hagrid]116-hagrid , [he]112-harry would have felt sorry for [her]1233-her — but if one of [them]483-students was to be ousted out of a job , there could be only one choice for [Harry]112-harry as to who should remain .

Unfortunately , [Harry]112-harry could not see that [Hagrid]116-hagrid was putting up a better show than [Trelawney]147-professor trelawney . Though [he]116-hagrid seemed to be following [Hermione]114-hermione ’s advice and had shown [them]483-students nothing more frightening than a crup , a creature indistinguishable from a Jack Russell terrier except for its forked tail , since before Christmas , [he]116-hagrid also seemed to have lost [his]116-hagrid nerve . [He]116-hagrid was oddly distracted and jumpy in lessons , losing the thread of what [he]116-hagrid was saying while talking to [the class]493-the class , answering questions wrongly and glancing anxiously at [Umbridge]144-umbridge all the time . [He]116-hagrid was also more distant with [Harry]112-harry , [Ron]113-ron , and [Hermione]114-hermione than [he]116-hagrid had ever been before , expressly forbidding [them]483-students to visit [him]116-hagrid after dark .

“ If [she]114-hermione catches [yeh]483-students , it ’ll be all of [our]483-students necks on the line , ”[116-hagrid] [he]116-hagrid told [them]483-students flatly , and with no desire to do anything that jeopardized [his]116-hagrid job further , [they]483-students abstained from walking down to [[his]116-hagrid hut]1240-his hut in the evenings .

It seemed to [Harry]112-harry that [Umbridge]144-umbridge was steadily depriving [him]112-harry of everything that made [his]112-harry life at [Hogwarts]18-hogwarts worth living : visits to [[Hagrid]116-hagrid ’s house]1241-hagrid ’s house , letters from [Sirius]142-sirius , [his]116-hagrid Firebolt , and [Quidditch]252-quidditch . [He]112-harry took [his]112-harry revenge the only way [he]112-harry had : redoubling [his]112-harry efforts for [the D.A.

Harry]253-the d.a. was pleased to see that all of [them]483-students , even [Zacharias Smith]186-zacharias smith , had been spurred to work harder than ever by the news that [ten more Death Eaters]1242-ten more death eaters were now on the loose , but in [nobody]453-nobody was this improvement more pronounced than in [Neville]161-neville . The news of [[his]112-harry parents]1244-his parents ’ attacker ’s escape had wrought a strange and even slightly alarming change in [him]112-harry . [He]112-harry had not once mentioned [his]112-harry meeting with [Harry]112-harry , [Ron]113-ron , and [Hermione]114-hermione on [the closed ward in [St. Mungo ’s]19-st. mungo ’s]1245-the closed ward in st. mungo ’s , and taking [their]483-students lead from [him]112-harry , [they]483-students had kept quiet about it too . Nor had [he]112-harry said anything on the subject of [Bellatrix]240-bellatrix and [[her]240-bellatrix fellow torturers]1246-her fellow torturers ’ escape ; in fact , [he]112-harry barely spoke during D.A. meetings anymore , but worked relentlessly on every new jinx and countercurse [Harry]112-harry taught [them]483-students , [his]112-harry plump face screwed up in concentration , apparently indifferent to injuries or accidents , working harder than [anyone else in [the room]469-the room]1247-anyone else in the room . [He]112-harry was improving so fast it was quite unnerving and when [Harry]112-harry taught [them]483-students the Shield Charm , a means of deflecting minor jinxes so that they rebounded upon [the attacker]1249-the attacker , only [Hermione]114-hermione mastered the charm faster than [Neville]161-neville .

In fact [Harry]112-harry would have given a great deal to be making as much progress at Occlumency as [Neville]161-neville was making during D.A. meetings . [Harry]112-harry ’s sessions with [Snape]255-snape , which had started badly enough , were not improving ; on the contrary , [Harry]112-harry felt [he]112-harry was getting worse with every lesson .

Before [he]112-harry had started studying Occlumency , [his]112-harry scar had prickled occasionally , usually during the night , or else following one of those strange flashes of [Voldemort]192-voldemort ’s thoughts or moods that [he]112-harry experienced every now and then . Nowadays , however , [his]112-harry scar hardly ever stopped prickling , and [he]112-harry often felt lurches of annoyance or cheerfulness that were unrelated to what was happening to [him]112-harry at the time , which were always accompanied by a particularly painful twinge from [his]112-harry scar . [He]112-harry had the horrible impression that [he]112-harry was slowly turning into a kind of aerial that was tuned in to tiny fluctuations in [Voldemort]192-voldemort ’s mood , and [he]112-harry was sure [he]112-harry could date this increased sensitivity firmly from [his]112-harry first Occlumency lesson with [Snape]255-snape . What was more , [he]112-harry was now dreaming about walking down [the corridor]597-the corridor toward the entrance to [the Department of Mysteries]1119-the department of mysteries almost every night , dreams that always culminated in [him]112-harry standing longingly in front of the plain black door .

“ Maybe it ’s a bit like an illness , ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione , looking concerned when [Harry]112-harry confided in [her]114-hermione and [Ron]113-ron . “ A fever or something . It has to get worse before it gets better . ”[112-harry]

“ It ’s lessons with [Snape]255-snape that are making it worse , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry flatly . “ [I]112-harry ’m getting sick of [my]112-harry scar hurting , and [I]112-harry ’m getting bored walking down [that corridor]3748-that corridor every night . ”[112-harry] [He]112-harry rubbed [his]112-harry forehead angrily . “ [I]112-harry just wish the door would open , [I]112-harry ’m sick of standing staring at it — ”[112-harry]

“ [I]112-harry am working ! ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry , nettled . “ [You]113-ron try it sometime , [Snape]255-snape trying to get inside [your]113-ron head , it ’s not a bundle of laughs , [you]113-ron know ! ”[112-harry]

“ Maybe ... ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron slowly .

“ [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore trusts [him]255-snape , ”[114-hermione] [Hermione]114-hermione repeated . “ And if [we]3752-we ca n’t trust [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore , [we]3752-we ca n’t trust [anyone]680-anyone . ”[114-hermione]

With so much to worry about and so much to do — startling amounts of homework that frequently kept the fifth years working until past midnight , secret D.A. meetings , and regular classes with [Snape]255-snape — January seemed to be passing alarmingly fast . Before [Harry]112-harry knew it , February had arrived , bringing with it wetter and warmer weather and the prospect of the second Hogsmeade visit of the year . [Harry]112-harry had had very little time to spare on conversations with [Cho]187-cho since [they]1252-we had agreed to visit [the village]1253-the village together , but suddenly found [himself]112-harry facing a [Valentine]265-valentine ’s Day spent entirely in [her]187-cho company .

On the morning of the fourteenth [he]112-harry dressed particularly carefully . [He]112-harry and [Ron]113-ron arrived at breakfast just in time for the arrival of the post owls . [Hedwig]234-hedwig was not [there]3115-there — not that [he]112-harry had expected [her]234-hedwig — but [Hermione]114-hermione was tugging a letter from the beak of an unfamiliar brown owl as [they]1252-we sat down .

[They]1266-they wandered toward [Dervish]292-dervish and [Banges]293-banges . [Rita]270-rita stared at [her]270-rita . So did [Harry]112-harry . [Luna]178-luna , on the other hand , sang , “ [Weasley]113-ron Is [[Our]113-ron King]3085-our king ”[178-luna] dreamily under [her]178-luna breath and stirred [her]178-luna drink with a cocktail onion on a stick .

“ [You]114-hermione want [me]270-rita to report what [he]112-harry says about [He]112-harry - Who - Must - Not - Be - Named ? ”[270-rita] [Rita]270-rita asked [Hermione]114-hermione in a hushed voice .

“ Yes , [I]114-hermione do , ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione . “ The true story . All the facts . Exactly as [Harry]112-harry reports them . [He]149-fred got up again and moved restlessly to the window , staring out across [the dark grounds]1341-the dark grounds .

[George]150-george yawned widely and looked out disconsolately at the cloudy night sky .

“ [I]150-george dunno if [I]150-george even want to watch this match . If [Zacharias Smith]186-zacharias smith beats [us]3838-we [I]150-george might have to kill [myself]150-george . ”[150-george]

“ Kill [him]186-zacharias smith , more like , ”[149-fred] said [Fred]149-fred firmly .

“ That ’s the trouble with [Quidditch]252-quidditch , ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione absentmindedly , once again bent over [her]114-hermione Rune translation , “ it creates all this bad feeling and tension between [the Houses]3841-the houses . ”[114-hermione]

[She]114-hermione looked up to find [her]114-hermione copy of [Spellman]306-spellman ’s Syllabary and caught [Fred]149-fred , [George]150-george , and [Harry]112-harry looking at [her]114-hermione with expressions of mingled disgust and incredulity on [their]1342-their faces .

“ Well , it does ! ”[114-hermione] [she]114-hermione said impatiently . “ It ’s only a game , is n’t it ? ”[114-hermione]

“ [Hermione]114-hermione , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry , shaking [his]112-harry head , “ [you]114-hermione ’re good on feelings and stuff , but [you]114-hermione just do n’t understand about [Quidditch]252-quidditch . ”[112-harry]

“ Maybe not , ”[114-hermione] [she]114-hermione said darkly , returning to [her]114-hermione translation again , “ but at least [my]114-hermione happiness does n’t depend on [Ron]113-ron ’s goalkeeping ability . ”[114-hermione]

And though [Harry]112-harry would rather have jumped off [the Astronomy Tower]1343-the astronomy tower than admit it to [her]114-hermione , by the time [he]112-harry had watched the game the following Saturday [he]112-harry would have given any number of [Galleons]307-galleons not to care about [Quidditch]252-quidditch either .

The very best thing [you]1344-you could say about the match was that it was short ; [the Gryffindor spectators]1345-the gryffindor spectators had to endure only twenty - two minutes of agony . It was hard to say what the worst thing was : [Harry]112-harry thought it was a close - run contest between [Ron]113-ron ’s fourteenth failed save , [Sloper]185-jack sloper missing [the Bludger]308-the bludger but hitting [Angelina]179-angelina in the mouth with [his]185-jack sloper bat , and [Kirke]184-kirke shrieking and falling backward off [his]185-jack sloper broom as [Zacharias Smith]186-zacharias smith zoomed at [him]185-jack sloper carrying the Quaffle . The miracle was that [Gryffindor]309-gryffindor only lost by ten points : [Ginny]182-ginny managed to snatch [the Snitch]310-the snitch from right under [Hufflepuff Seeker Summerby]289-hufflepuff ’s nose , so that the final score was two hundred and forty versus two hundred and thirty .

“ Good catch , ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry told [Ginny]182-ginny back in [the common room]481-the common room , where the atmosphere closely resembled that of a particularly dismal funeral .

“ [I]182-ginny was lucky , ”[182-ginny] [she]182-ginny shrugged . “ It was n’t [a very fast Snitch]3842-a very fast snitch and [Summerby]289-hufflepuff ’s got a cold , [he]289-hufflepuff sneezed and closed [his]289-hufflepuff eyes at exactly the wrong moment . “ [Ginny]182-ginny , [I]112-harry ’ve got a lifelong ban . ”[112-harry]

“ [You]112-harry ’re banned as long as [Umbridge]144-umbridge is in [the school]1190-the school , ”[182-ginny] [Ginny]182-ginny corrected [him]112-harry . “ There ’s a difference . [Harry]112-harry looked over at [Ron]113-ron , who was hunched in a corner , staring at [his]113-ron knees , a bottle of butterbeer clutched in [his]113-ron hand .

“ [Angelina]179-angelina still wo n’t let [him]113-ron resign , ”[182-ginny] [Ginny]182-ginny said , as though reading [Harry]112-harry ’s mind . “ [She]182-ginny says [she]182-ginny knows [he]113-ron ’s got it in [him]113-ron . ”[182-ginny]

[Fred]149-fred and [George]150-george wandered over .

[He]113-ron made wild motions with [his]113-ron arms as though doing an upright doggy - paddle .

“ Well , [I]113-ron ’ll save it for parties , eh ? ”[113-ron]

[Ron]113-ron dragged [himself]113-ron up to bed shortly after this . [Harry]112-harry got into bed , thinking about the match . It had been immensely frustrating watching from the sidelines . [Umbridge]144-umbridge had been sitting a few rows below [Harry]112-harry and [Hermione]114-hermione . [He]112-harry walked toward [it]1359-it with a sense of mounting excitement . [He]112-harry was sorry to hear [she]309-gryffindor had shed even more tears over it , but very glad [they]1394-they were on speaking terms again , and even more pleased when [she]309-gryffindor gave [him]112-harry a swift kiss on the cheek and hurried off again . “ And the best bit is , ”[114-hermione] whispered [Hermione]114-hermione gleefully as [they]1395-they left [the library]3648-the library , “ [they]1395-they ca n’t contradict [you]112-harry , because [they]1395-they ca n’t admit [they]1395-they ’ve read the article ! ”[114-hermione]

“ [Dad]212-dad ’s reprinting ! ”[114-hermione] [she]114-hermione told [Harry]112-harry , [her]114-hermione eyes popping excitedly . “ [He]212-dad ca n’t believe it , [he]212-dad says [people]3280-people seem even more interested in this than [the Crumple - Horned Snorkacks]304-crumple - horned snorkacks ! ”[114-hermione]

[Harry]112-harry was a hero in [the Gryffindor common room]1401-the gryffindor common room that night ; daringly , [Fred]149-fred and [George]150-george had put an Enlargement Charm on the front cover of [The Quibbler]302-the quibbler and hung it on the wall , so that [Harry]112-harry ’s giant head gazed down upon the proceedings , occasionally saying things like “ [The Ministry]3114-the ministry are [morons ”]3867-morons ”[112-harry] and “ Eat dung , Umbridge ”[112-harry] in a booming voice . [Hermione]114-hermione did not find this very amusing ; [she]114-hermione said it interfered with [her]114-hermione concentration , and ended up going to bed early out of irritation . [Harry]112-harry had to admit that the poster was not quite as funny after an hour or two , especially when the talking spell had started to wear off , so that it merely shouted disconnected words like “ Dung ”[112-harry] and “ Umbridge ”[112-harry] at more and more frequent intervals in a progressively higher voice . In fact it started to make [his]112-harry head ache and [his]112-harry scar began prickling uncomfortably again . To disappointed moans from [the many people who were sitting around [him]112-harry]1402-the many people who were sitting around him , asking [him]112-harry to relive [his]112-harry interview for the umpteenth time , [he]112-harry announced that [he]112-harry too needed an early night .

[The dormitory]606-the dormitory was empty when [he]112-harry reached [it]606-the dormitory . [He]112-harry rested [his]112-harry forehead for a moment against the cool glass of the window beside [his]112-harry bed ; it felt soothing against [his]112-harry scar . Then [he]112-harry undressed and got into bed , wishing [his]112-harry headache would go away . [He]112-harry also felt slightly sick . [He]112-harry rolled over onto [his]112-harry side , closed [his]112-harry eyes , and fell asleep almost at once ...

[He]112-harry was standing in [a dark , curtained room lit by a single branch of candles]1404-a dark , curtained room lit by a single branch of candles . [His]112-harry hands were clenched on the back of a chair in front of [him]112-harry . They were long - fingered and white as though they had not seen sunlight for years and looked like large , pale spiders against the dark velvet of the chair .

Beyond the chair , in a pool of light cast upon the floor by the candles , knelt [a man in black robes]1405-a man in black robes .

“ [I]112-harry have been badly advised , it seems , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry , in a high , cold voice that pulsed with anger .

“ [Master]3868-master , [I]1406-the man kneeling on the floor crave [your]3868-master pardon ... ”[1406-the man kneeling on the floor] croaked [the man kneeling on the floor]1406-the man kneeling on the floor . The back of [his]1406-the man kneeling on the floor head glimmered in the candlelight . [He]1406-the man kneeling on the floor seemed to be trembling .

“ [I]112-harry do not blame [you]3868-master , [Rookwood]277-rookwood , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry in that cold , cruel voice .

[He]112-harry relinquished [his]112-harry grip upon the chair and walked around it , closer to [the man cowering upon the floor]1407-the man cowering upon the floor , until [he]112-harry stood directly over [him]1406-the man kneeling on the floor in the darkness , looking down from a far greater height than usual .

“ [Avery]317-avery told [me]112-harry [Bode]225-bode would be able to remove it . ”[112-harry]

“ [Bode]225-bode could never have taken it , [Master]3684-master ... [Bode]225-bode would have known [he]225-bode could not ... Undoubtedly that is why [he]225-bode fought so hard against [Malfoy]166-malfoy ’s Imperius Curse ... ”[112-harry]

[The kneeling man]1408-the kneeling man almost fell over in [his]1408-the kneeling man haste to obey . “ [You]112-harry have done well to tell [me]112-harry this , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry . “ Very well ... [I]112-harry have wasted months on fruitless schemes , it seems ... But no matter ... [Rookwood]277-rookwood scurried backward , bowing , and disappeared through a door .

Left alone in [the dark room]1409-the dark room , [Harry]112-harry turned toward the wall . A cracked , age - spotted mirror hung on the wall in the shadows . [Harry]112-harry moved toward it . [His]112-harry reflection grew larger and clearer in the darkness ... A face whiter than a skull ... red eyes with slits for pupils ...

“ NOOOOOOOOO ! ”[112-harry]

“ What ? ”[112-harry] yelled a voice nearby .

[Harry]112-harry flailed around madly , became entangled in the hangings , and fell out of [his]112-harry bed . “ Get up , [Potter]112-harry . ”[255-snape]

A couple of weeks after [his]112-harry dream of [Rookwood]277-rookwood , [Harry]112-harry was to be found , yet again , kneeling on the floor of [[Snape]255-snape ’s office]1083-snape ’s office , trying to clear [his]112-harry head . [He]112-harry had just been forced , yet again , to relive a stream of very early memories [he]112-harry had not even realized [he]112-harry still had , most of them concerning humiliations [Dudley]268-dudley and [[his]268-dudley gang]1418-his gang had inflicted upon [him]112-harry in [primary school]1419-primary school .

“ No , ”[255-snape] said [Snape]255-snape softly . “ [I]255-snape mean the one concerning [a man kneeling in the middle of a darkened room]3896-a man kneeling in the middle of a darkened room ... ”[255-snape]

“ It ’s ... nothing , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry .

[Snape]255-snape ’s dark eyes bored into [Harry]112-harry ’s . Remembering what [Snape]255-snape had said about eye contact being crucial to [Legilimency]266-legilimency , [Harry]112-harry blinked and looked away .

“ A dream , ”[255-snape] repeated [Snape]255-snape .

There was a pause during which [Harry]112-harry stared fixedly at a large dead frog suspended in a purple liquid in its jar .

“ [You]112-harry do know why [we]3899-we are here , do n’t [you]112-harry , [Potter]112-harry ? ”[255-snape] said [Snape]255-snape in a low , dangerous voice . “ [You]112-harry do know why [I]255-snape am giving up [my]255-snape evenings to this tedious job ? ”[255-snape]

“ So [I]112-harry can learn Occlumency , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry , now glaring at a dead eel .

“ Just that one , ”[112-harry] lied [Harry]112-harry .

“ No , [they]3900-they do n’t , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry , [his]112-harry jaw set and [his]112-harry fingers clenched tightly around the handle of [his]112-harry wand .

“ That is just as well , [Potter]112-harry , ”[255-snape] said [Snape]255-snape coldly , “ because [you]112-harry are neither special nor important , and it is not up to [you]112-harry to find out what [the Dark Lord]3672-the dark lord is saying to [[his]3672-the dark lord Death Eaters]3902-his death eaters . ”[255-snape]

“ No — that ’s [your]255-snape job , is n’t it ? ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry shot at [him]255-snape .

[He]112-harry had not meant to say it ; it had burst out of [him]112-harry in temper . For a long moment [they]1420-they stared at [each other]3141-each other , [Harry]112-harry convinced [he]112-harry had gone too far . “ Yes , [Potter]112-harry , ”[255-snape] [he]255-snape said , [his]255-snape eyes glinting . “ That is [my]255-snape job . Now , if [you]112-harry are ready , [we]1420-they will start again ... ”[255-snape]

[He]255-snape raised [his]255-snape wand . “ [One — two — three — Legilimens]3903-one — two — three — legilimens ! ”[255-snape]

[A hundred dementors]1096-a hundred dementors were swooping toward [Harry]112-harry across [the lake]3157-the lake in [the grounds]3644-the grounds ... [He]112-harry screwed up [his]112-harry face in concentration ... [They]1096-a hundred dementors were coming closer ... And somehow , [Snape]255-snape was growing clearer , and [the dementors]3098-the dementors were growing fainter ...

[Harry]112-harry raised [his]112-harry own wand .

“ Protego ! ”[112-harry]

[Snape]255-snape staggered ; [his]255-snape wand flew upward , away from [Harry]112-harry — and suddenly [Harry]112-harry ’s mind was teeming with memories that were not [his]112-harry — [a hook - nosed man]1426-a hook - nosed man was shouting at [a cowering woman]1427-a cowering woman , while [a small dark - haired boy]1428-a small dark - haired boy cried in a corner ... [A greasy - haired teenager]1429-a greasy - haired teenager sat alone in [a dark bedroom]1430-a dark bedroom , pointing [his]1429-a greasy - haired teenager wand at the ceiling , shooting down flies ... [A girl]3782-a girl was laughing as [a scrawny boy]1432-a scrawny boy tried to mount a bucking broomstick —

“ ENOUGH ! ”[3782-a girl]

[Harry]112-harry felt as though [he]112-harry had been pushed hard in the chest ; [he]112-harry took several staggering steps backward , hit some of the shelves covering [Snape]255-snape ’s walls and heard something crack . [Snape]255-snape was shaking slightly , very white in the face .

The back of [Harry]112-harry ’s robes were damp . One of the jars behind [him]112-harry had broken when [he]112-harry fell against it ; the pickled slimy thing within was swirling in its draining potion .

“ Reparo ! ”[255-snape] hissed [Snape]255-snape , and the jar sealed itself once more . “ Well , [Potter]112-harry ... that was certainly an improvement ... ”[255-snape] Panting slightly , [Snape]255-snape straightened the Pensieve in which [he]255-snape had again stored some of [his]255-snape thoughts before starting the lesson , almost as though checking that they were still there . “ [I]255-snape do n’t remember telling [you]112-harry to use a Shield Charm ... but there is no doubt that it was effective ... ”[255-snape]

[Harry]112-harry did not speak ; [he]112-harry felt that to say anything might be dangerous . [He]112-harry was sure [he]112-harry had just broken into [Snape]255-snape ’s memories , that [he]112-harry had just seen scenes from [Snape]255-snape ’s childhood , and it was unnerving to think that [the crying little boy who had watched [[his]1433-the crying little boy who had watched his parents shouting parents]1244-his parents shouting]1433-the crying little boy who had watched his parents shouting was actually standing in front of [him]112-harry with such loathing in [his]1433-the crying little boy who had watched his parents shouting eyes ...

“ Let ’s try again , shall [we]1435-we ? ”[255-snape] said [Snape]255-snape .

[Harry]112-harry felt a thrill of dread : [He]112-harry was about to pay for what had just happened , [he]112-harry was sure of it . [They]1435-we moved back into position with the desk between [them]1435-we , [Harry]112-harry feeling [he]112-harry was going to find it much harder to empty [his]112-harry mind this time ...

“ On the count of three , then , ”[255-snape] said [Snape]255-snape , raising [his]255-snape wand once more . “ One — two — ”[255-snape]

[Harry]112-harry did not have time to gather [himself]112-harry together and attempt to clear [his]112-harry mind , for [Snape]255-snape had already cried “ Legilimens ! ”[255-snape]

[He]112-harry was hurtling along [the corridor]597-the corridor toward [the Department of Mysteries]1119-the department of mysteries , past the blank stone walls , past the torches — the plain black door was growing ever larger ; [he]112-harry was moving so fast [he]112-harry was going to collide with it , [he]112-harry was feet from it and [he]112-harry could see that chink of faint blue light again —

The door had flown open ! [He]112-harry was through [it]1438-it at last , inside [a black - walled , black - floored circular room lit with blue - flamed candles]1439-a black - walled , black - floored circular room lit with blue - flamed candles , and there were more doors all around [him]112-harry — [he]112-harry needed to go on — but which door ought [he]112-harry to take — ?

“ POTTER ! ”[112-harry]

[Harry]112-harry opened [his]112-harry eyes . [He]112-harry was flat on [his]112-harry back again with no memory of having gotten [there]3115-there ; [he]112-harry was also panting as though [he]112-harry really had run the length of [the Department of Mysteries corridor]3888-the department of mysteries corridor , really had sprinted through the black door and found [the circular room]1442-the circular room ...

“ Explain [yourself]112-harry ! ”[255-snape] said [Snape]255-snape , who was standing over [him]112-harry , looking furious .

“ [I]112-harry ... dunno what happened , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry truthfully , standing up . “ [You]255-snape are not working hard enough ! ”[255-snape]

[Professor Trelawney]147-professor trelawney was standing in the middle of [the entrance hall]454-the entrance hall with [her]147-professor trelawney wand in one hand and an empty sherry bottle in the other , looking utterly mad . “ [Herd]321-herd ? ”[154-lavender] said [Lavender]154-lavender in a confused voice , and [Harry]112-harry knew [she]1489-she was thinking of cows . “ What — oh ! ”[1489-she] Comprehension dawned on [her]1489-she face . “ There are more of [you]320-firenze ? ”[1489-she] [she]1489-she said , stunned .

“ Did [Hagrid]116-hagrid breed [you]320-firenze , like [the thestrals]163-thestrals ? ”[189-dean] asked [Dean]189-dean eagerly .

[Firenze]320-firenze turned [his]320-firenze head very slowly to face [Dean]189-dean , who seemed to realize at once that [he]320-firenze had said something very offensive .

“ [I]320-firenze did n’t — [I]320-firenze meant — sorry , ”[320-firenze] [he]320-firenze finished in a hushed voice .

“ [Centaurs]3946-centaurs are not [the servants or playthings of [humans]3948-humans]3947-the servants or playthings of humans , ”[320-firenze] said [Firenze]320-firenze quietly . There was a pause , then [Parvati]153-parvati raised [her]153-parvati hand again .

“ Please , [sir]3398-sir ... why have [the other centaurs]3950-the other centaurs banished [you]3398-sir ? ”[153-parvati]

“ Because [I]320-firenze have agreed to work for [Professor Dumbledore]133-dumbledore , ”[320-firenze] said [Firenze]320-firenze . “ [They]3950-the other centaurs see this as a betrayal of [our]3951-us kind . ”[320-firenze]

[Harry]112-harry remembered how , nearly four years ago , [the centaur [Bane]322-bane]1490-the centaur bane had shouted at [Firenze]320-firenze for allowing [Harry]112-harry to ride to safety upon [his]112-harry back , calling [him]112-harry a “ common mule . ”[322-bane] [He]112-harry wondered whether it had been [Bane]322-bane who had kicked [Firenze]320-firenze in the chest .

“ Let [us]3951-us begin , ”[320-firenze] said [Firenze]320-firenze . [He]320-firenze swished [his]320-firenze long palomino tail , raised [his]320-firenze hand toward the leafy canopy overhead then lowered it slowly , and as [he]320-firenze did so , the light in [the room]469-the room dimmed , so that [they]1492-they now seemed to be sitting in [a forest clearing]1478-a forest clearing by twilight , and stars emerged upon the ceiling . There were oohs and gasps , and [Ron]113-ron said audibly , “ [Blimey]119-blimey ! ”[113-ron]

“ Lie back upon the floor , ”[320-firenze] said [Firenze]320-firenze in [his]320-firenze calm voice , “ and observe [the heavens]3952-the heavens . Here is written , for [those who can see]3953-those who can see , the fortune of [[our]3951-us races]3954-our races . ”[320-firenze]

[Harry]112-harry stretched out on [his]112-harry back and gazed upward at the ceiling . A twinkling red star winked at [him]112-harry from overhead .

“ [I]320-firenze know that [you]112-harry have learned the names of [the planets]3955-the planets and [their]3955-the planets moons in Astronomy , ”[320-firenze] said [Firenze]320-firenze ’s calm voice , “ and that [you]112-harry have mapped the stars ’ progress through [the heavens]3952-the heavens . [Our]3951-us findings teach [us]3951-us that the future may be glimpsed in the sky above [us]3951-us ... ”[320-firenze]

“ [Professor Trelawney]147-professor trelawney did Astrology with [us]3951-us ! ”[153-parvati] said [Parvati]153-parvati excitedly , raising [her]153-parvati hand in front of [her]153-parvati so that it stuck up in the air as [she]153-parvati lay on [her]153-parvati back . “ [Mars]323-mars causes accidents and burns and things like that , and when it makes an angle to [Saturn]60-saturn , like now ”[153-parvati] — [she]153-parvati drew a right angle in the air above [her]153-parvati — “ that means that [people]3280-people need to be extra careful when handling hot things — ”[153-parvati]

“ That , ”[320-firenze] said [Firenze]320-firenze calmly , “ is human nonsense . ”[320-firenze]

[Parvati]153-parvati ’s hand fell limply to [her]153-parvati side .

“ Trivial hurts , tiny human accidents , ”[320-firenze] said [Firenze]320-firenze , as [his]320-firenze hooves thudded over the mossy floor . “ These are of no more significance than the scurryings of ants to [the wide universe]3959-the wide universe , and are unaffected by planetary movements . ”[320-firenze]

“ [Professor Trelawney]147-professor trelawney — ”[153-parvati] began [Parvati]153-parvati , in a hurt and indignant voice .

[Harry]112-harry turned [his]112-harry head very slightly to look at [Parvati]153-parvati . [She]153-parvati looked very offended , as did [several of [the people surrounding [her]153-parvati]1495-the people surrounding her]1494-several of the people surrounding her .

[Firenze]320-firenze pointed to the red star directly above [Harry]112-harry .

“ In the past decade , the indications have been that [Wizard - kind]3963-wizard - kind is living through nothing more than a brief calm between two wars . It was the most unusual lesson [Harry]112-harry had ever attended . [They]1496-them did indeed burn sage and mallowsweet there on [the classroom]1479-the classroom floor , and [Firenze]320-firenze told [them]1496-them to look for certain shapes and symbols in the pungent fumes , but [he]320-firenze seemed perfectly unconcerned that [not one of [them]1496-them]734-not one of them could see any of the signs [he]320-firenze described , telling [them]1496-them that [humans]3948-humans were hardly ever good at this , that it took centaurs years and years to become competent , and finished by telling [them]1496-them that it was foolish to put too much faith in such things anyway , because [even centaurs]1500-even centaurs sometimes read [them]1496-them wrongly . [They]1553-they were at the stone gargoyle within minutes . [Harry]112-harry wondered how many of [the others]3151-the others had been caught . “ Fizzing Whizbee , ”[144-umbridge] sang [Umbridge]144-umbridge , and [the stone gargoyle]1555-the stone gargoyle jumped aside , the wall behind split open , and [they]1553-they ascended the moving stone staircase . [They]1553-they reached the polished door with the griffin knocker , but [Umbridge]144-umbridge did not bother to knock , [she]144-umbridge strode straight inside , still holding tight to [Harry]112-harry .

[The office]663-the office was full of [people]3280-people . But [Harry]112-harry , [Ron]113-ron , and [Hermione]114-hermione had turned automatically toward the giant hourglasses set in niches along the wall behind [them]1624-we , which recorded the House points . [Gryffindor]309-gryffindor and [Ravenclaw]339-ravenclaw had been neck and neck in the lead that morning . Even as [they]1624-we watched , stones flew upward , reducing the amounts in the lower bulbs . “ Noticed , have [you]1624-we ? ”[149-fred] said [Fred]149-fred ’s voice .

It was not difficult to find . One floor down , pandemonium reigned . [Somebody]344-somebody ( and [Harry]112-harry had a very shrewd idea who ) had set off what seemed to be an enormous crate of enchanted fireworks .

Dragons comprised entirely of green - and - gold sparks were soaring up and down [the corridors]534-the corridors , emitting loud fiery blasts and bangs as they went . Shocking - pink Catherine wheels five feet in diameter were whizzing lethally through the air like so many flying saucers . Rockets with long tails of brilliant silver stars were ricocheting off the walls . [Sparklers]345-sparklers were writing swearwords in midair of their own accord . Firecrackers were exploding like mines everywhere [Harry]112-harry looked , and instead of burning themselves out , fading from sight , or fizzling to a halt , these pyrotechnical miracles seemed to be gaining in energy and momentum the longer [he]112-harry watched .

[Filch]343-filch and [Umbridge]144-umbridge were standing , apparently transfixed with horror , halfway down [the stairs]607-the stairs . As [Harry]112-harry watched , one of the larger Catherine wheels seemed to decide that what it needed was more room to maneuver ; it whirled toward [Umbridge]144-umbridge and [Filch]343-filch with a sinister wheeeeeeeeee . [Both adults]1648-both adults yelled with fright and ducked and it soared straight out of the window behind [them]1648-both adults and off across [the grounds]3644-the grounds . Meanwhile , several of the dragons and a large purple bat that was smoking ominously took advantage of the open door at the end of [the corridor]597-the corridor to escape toward [the second floor]839-the second floor .

“ Hurry , [Filch]343-filch , hurry ! ”[144-umbridge] shrieked [Umbridge]144-umbridge . “ [They]4128-they ’ll be all over [the school]1190-the school unless [we]1648-both adults do something — Stupefy ! ”[144-umbridge]

A jet of red light shot out of the end of [her]144-umbridge wand and hit one of the rockets . [Harry]112-harry had seen enough . The upshot of it all was that [Professor Umbridge]144-umbridge spent [her]144-umbridge first afternoon as headmistress running all over [the school]1190-the school answering the summonses of [the other teachers]4091-the other teachers , [none of whom seemed able to rid [[their]4091-the other teachers rooms]1667-their rooms of the fireworks without [her]144-umbridge]1666-none of whom seemed able to rid their rooms of the fireworks without her . [Hermione]114-hermione returned to the table where [Harry]112-harry and [Ron]113-ron were sitting staring at [their]1672-we schoolbags as though hoping [their]1672-we homework might spring out of it and start doing itself .

“ Are [you]114-hermione feeling all right ? ”[113-ron] [Ron]113-ron asked , staring at [her]114-hermione in disbelief .

[Harry]112-harry could still hear the distant bangs of escaped firecrackers when [he]112-harry and [Ron]113-ron went up to bed an hour later , and as [he]112-harry got undressed a sparkler floated past [the tower]1673-the tower , still resolutely spelling out the word “ POO ”[112-harry] .

[He]112-harry got into bed , yawning . With [his]112-harry glasses off , the occasional firework still passing the window became blurred , looking like sparkling clouds , beautiful and mysterious against the black sky . [He]112-harry turned onto [his]112-harry side , wondering how [Umbridge]144-umbridge was feeling about [her]144-umbridge first day in [[Dumbledore]133-dumbledore ’s job]1674-dumbledore ’s job , and how [Fudge]280-fudge would react when [he]112-harry heard that [the school]1190-the school had spent most of the day in a state of advanced disruption ... Smiling to [himself]112-harry , [he]112-harry closed [his]112-harry eyes ...

The whizzes and bangs of escaped fireworks in [the grounds]3644-the grounds seemed to be growing more distant ... or perhaps [he]112-harry , [Harry]112-harry , was simply speeding away from [them]1677-them ...

[He]112-harry had fallen right into [the corridor leading to [the Department of Mysteries]1119-the department of mysteries]1118-the corridor leading to the department of mysteries . [He]112-harry was speeding toward the plain black door ... Let it open ... Let it open ...

[It]1680-it did . [He]112-harry was inside [the circular room]1442-the circular room lined with doors ... [He]112-harry crossed [it]1442-the circular room , placed [his]112-harry hand upon an identical door , and it swung inward ...

Now [he]112-harry was in [a long , rectangular room full of an odd , mechanical clicking]1682-a long , rectangular room full of an odd , mechanical clicking . There were dancing flecks of light on the walls but [he]112-harry did not pause to investigate ... [He]112-harry had to go on ...

There was a door at the far end ... It too opened at [his]112-harry touch ...

And now [he]112-harry was in [a dimly lit room]1683-a dimly lit room as high and wide as [a church]1684-a church , full of nothing but rows and rows of towering shelves , each laden with small , dusty , spun - glass spheres ... Now [Harry]112-harry ’s heart was beating fast with excitement ... [He]112-harry knew where to go ... [He]112-harry ran forward , but [his]112-harry footsteps made no noise in [the enormous , deserted room]1685-the enormous , deserted room ...

There was something in [this room]1686-this room [he]112-harry wanted very , very much ...

Something [he]112-harry wanted ... or [somebody else]3430-somebody else wanted ...

[His]112-harry scar was hurting ...

BANG ! [Harry]112-harry awoke instantly , confused and angry . [The dark dormitory]1688-the dark dormitory was full of the sound of laughter .

[Harry]112-harry heard [Ron]113-ron and [Dean]189-dean scramble out of bed for a better look . [He]112-harry lay quite still and silent while the pain in [his]112-harry scar subsided and disappointment washed over [him]112-harry . [He]112-harry felt as though a wonderful treat had been snatched from [him]112-harry at the very last moment ... [He]112-harry had got so close that time ...

[Harry]112-harry lay and listened to the appreciative whoops of [Gryffindors]159-gryffindors in [the dormitories below them]1689-the dormitories below them . [Harry]112-harry looked anxiously behind [him]112-harry again . “ Yeah , well , [I]113-ron do n’t blame [you]112-harry ! ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron angrily , setting down [his]113-ron study schedule . “ If it had n’t been for [her]190-marietta ... ”[113-ron]

[Ron]113-ron went into a rant about [Marietta Edgecombe]190-marietta , which [Harry]112-harry found helpful . All [he]113-ron had to do was look angry , nod , and say “ yeah ”[113-ron] and “ that ’s right ”[113-ron] whenever [Ron]113-ron drew breath , leaving [his]113-ron mind free to dwell , ever more miserably , on what [he]113-ron had seen in [the Pensieve]40-the pensieve .

[He]113-ron felt as though the memory of it was eating [him]113-ron from inside . [He]113-ron had been so sure that [[his]113-ron parents]1244-his parents had been [wonderful people]1786-wonderful people that [he]113-ron never had the slightest difficulty in disbelieving [Snape]255-snape ’s aspersions on [[his]113-ron father]789-his father ’s character . Had n’t people like [Hagrid]116-hagrid and [Sirius]142-sirius told [Harry]112-harry how wonderful [[his]113-ron father]789-his father had been ? ( Yeah , well , look what [Sirius]142-sirius was like [himself]142-sirius , said a nagging voice inside [Harry]112-harry ’s head ... [He]142-sirius was as bad , was n’t [he]142-sirius ? ) Yes , [he]112-harry had once overheard [Professor McGonagall]200-professor mcgonagall saying that [[his]112-harry father]789-his father and [Sirius]142-sirius had been [troublemakers]1790-troublemakers at [school]984-school , but [she]200-professor mcgonagall had described [them]1792-them as [forerunners of [the Weasley twins]1635-the weasley twins]1793-forerunners of the weasley twins , and [Harry]112-harry could not imagine [Fred]149-fred and [George]150-george dangling [someone]3263-someone upside down for the fun of it ... not unless [they]1792-them really loathed [them]1792-them ... [Harry]112-harry tried to make a case for [Snape]255-snape having deserved what [he]255-snape had suffered at [James]350-james ’s hands — but had n’t [Lily]357-lily asked , “ What ’s [he]255-snape done to [you]112-harry ? ”[357-lily] And had n’t [James]350-james replied , “ It ’s more the fact that [he]255-snape exists , if [you]112-harry know what [I]350-james mean ? ”[350-james] Had n’t [James]350-james started it all simply because [Sirius]142-sirius said [he]142-sirius was bored ? [Harry]112-harry reminded [himself]112-harry that [Lily]357-lily had intervened ; [[his]112-harry mother]545-his mother had been decent , yet the memory of the look on [her]545-his mother face as [she]545-his mother had shouted at [James]350-james disturbed [him]112-harry quite as much as anything else . For nearly five years the thought of [[his]112-harry father]789-his father had been a source of comfort , of inspiration . [Harry]112-harry awoke very early the next day , feeling almost as anxious as [he]112-harry had done on the morning of [his]112-harry hearing at [the Ministry of Magic]85-the ministry of magic . It was not only the prospect of breaking into [[Umbridge]144-umbridge ’s office]1286-umbridge ’s office and using [her]144-umbridge fire to speak to [Sirius]142-sirius that was making [him]112-harry feel nervous , though that was certainly bad enough — today also happened to be the first time [he]112-harry would be in close proximity with [Snape]255-snape since [Snape]255-snape had thrown [him]112-harry out of [[his]112-harry office]1448-his office , as [they]1822-they had Potions that day .

After lying in bed for a while thinking about the day ahead , [Harry]112-harry got up very quietly and moved across to the window beside [Neville]161-neville ’s bed , staring out on a truly glorious morning . The sky was a clear , misty , opalescent blue . Directly ahead of [him]112-harry , [Harry]112-harry could see the towering beech tree below which [[his]112-harry father]789-his father had once tormented [Snape]255-snape . [He]112-harry was not sure what [Sirius]142-sirius could possibly say to [him]112-harry that would make up for what [he]112-harry had seen in [the Pensieve]40-the pensieve , but [he]112-harry was desperate to hear [Sirius]142-sirius ’s own account of what had happened , to know of any mitigating factors there might have been , any excuse at all for [[his]112-harry father]789-his father ’s behavior ...

Something caught [Harry]112-harry ’s attention : movement on [the edge of [the Forbidden Forest]57-the forbidden forest]1825-the edge of the forbidden forest . [Harry]112-harry squinted into the sun and saw [Hagrid]116-hagrid emerging from between the trees . [He]116-hagrid seemed to be limping . As [Harry]112-harry watched , [Hagrid]116-hagrid staggered to the door of [[his]116-hagrid cabin]462-his cabin and disappeared inside [it]462-his cabin . [Harry]112-harry watched [the cabin]470-the cabin for several minutes . [Hagrid]116-hagrid did not emerge again , but smoke furled from the chimney , so [Hagrid]116-hagrid could not be so badly injured that [he]116-hagrid was unequal to stoking the fire ...

[Harry]112-harry turned away from the window , headed back to [[his]112-harry trunk]1828-his trunk , and started to dress .

With the prospect of forcing entry into [[Umbridge]144-umbridge ’s office]1286-umbridge ’s office ahead , [Harry]112-harry had never expected the day to be a restful one , but [he]112-harry had not reckoned on [Hermione]114-hermione ’s almost continual attempts to dissuade [him]112-harry from what [he]112-harry was planning to do at five o’clock . For the first time ever , [she]114-hermione was at least as inattentive to [Professor Binns]359-professor binns in History of Magic as [Harry]112-harry and [Ron]113-ron were , keeping up a stream of whispered admonitions that [Harry]112-harry tried very hard to ignore .

“ ... and if [she]114-hermione does catch [you]112-harry there , apart from being expelled , [she]114-hermione ’ll be able to guess [you]112-harry ’ve been talking to [Snuffles]360-snuffles and this time [I]114-hermione expect [she]114-hermione ’ll force [you]112-harry to drink Veritaserum and answer [her]114-hermione questions ... ”[114-hermione]

“ [Hermione]114-hermione , ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron in a low and indignant voice , “ are [you]114-hermione going to stop telling [Harry]112-harry off and listen to [Binns]359-professor binns , or am [I]113-ron going to have to take notes instead ? ”[113-ron]

“ [You]114-hermione take notes for a change , it wo n’t kill [you]114-hermione ! ”[114-hermione]

By the time [they]1830-they reached [the dungeons]1450-the dungeons , neither [Harry]112-harry nor [Ron]113-ron was speaking to [Hermione]114-hermione any longer . Undeterred , [she]114-hermione took advantage of [their]1830-they silence to maintain an uninterrupted flow of dire warnings , all uttered under [her]114-hermione breath in a vehement hiss that caused [Seamus]199-seamus to waste five whole minutes checking [his]199-seamus cauldron for leaks .

[Snape]255-snape , meanwhile , seemed to have decided to act as though [Harry]112-harry were invisible . [Harry]112-harry was , of course , well used to this tactic , as it was one of [Uncle Vernon]272-uncle vernon ’s favorites , and on the whole was grateful [he]112-harry had to suffer nothing worse . In fact , compared to what [he]112-harry usually had to endure from [Snape]255-snape in the way of taunts and snide remarks , [he]112-harry found the new approach something of an improvement and was pleased to find that when left well alone , [he]112-harry was able to concoct an Invigoration Draught quite easily . At the end of the lesson [he]112-harry scooped some of the potion into a flask , corked it , and took it up to [Snape]255-snape ’s desk for marking , feeling that [he]112-harry might at last have scraped an E.

[He]112-harry had just turned away when [he]112-harry heard a smashing noise ; [Malfoy]166-malfoy gave a gleeful yell of laughter . [Harry]112-harry whipped around again . [His]112-harry potion sample lay in pieces on the floor , and [Snape]255-snape was watching [him]112-harry with a look of gloating pleasure .

“ Whoops , ”[255-snape] [he]255-snape said softly . “ Another zero , then , [Potter]112-harry ... ”[255-snape]

[Harry]112-harry was too incensed to speak . [He]112-harry strode back to [[his]112-harry cauldron]1832-his cauldron , intending to fill another flask and force [Snape]255-snape to mark it , but saw to [his]112-harry horror that the rest of the contents had vanished .

“ [I]114-hermione ’m sorry ! ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione with [her]114-hermione hands over [her]114-hermione mouth . “ [I]114-hermione ’m really sorry , [Harry]112-harry , [I]114-hermione thought [you]112-harry ’d finished , so [I]114-hermione cleared up ! ”[114-hermione]

[Harry]112-harry could not bring [himself]112-harry to answer . When the bell rang [he]112-harry hurried out of [the dungeon]1699-the dungeon without a backward glance and made sure that [he]112-harry found [himself]112-harry a seat between [Neville]161-neville and [Seamus]199-seamus for lunch so that [Hermione]114-hermione could not start nagging [him]112-harry about using [[Umbridge]144-umbridge ’s office]1286-umbridge ’s office again .

But the fact remained that if [he]112-harry were caught ...

[He]112-harry could abandon the plan and simply learn to live with the memory of what [[his]112-harry father]789-his father had done on a summer ’s day more than twenty years ago ...

But did [he]112-harry want to be like [[his]112-harry father]789-his father anymore ?

“ [Harry]112-harry , do n’t do it , please do n’t do it ! ”[114-hermione] [Hermione]114-hermione said in anguished tones as the bell rang at the end of the class .

[He]112-harry did not answer ; [he]112-harry did not know what to do . [Ron]113-ron seemed determined to give neither [his]113-ron opinion nor [his]113-ron advice . [Harry]112-harry ’s heart beat very fast as [he]112-harry left [the classroom]1479-the classroom . Then [Umbridge]144-umbridge came pelting out of [[her]144-umbridge classroom]1663-her classroom as fast as [her]144-umbridge short legs would carry [her]144-umbridge . Pulling out [her]144-umbridge wand , [she]144-umbridge hurried off in the opposite direction : It was now or never .

“ [Harry]112-harry — please ! ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione weakly .

But [he]112-harry had made up [his]112-harry mind — hitching [his]112-harry bag more securely onto [his]112-harry shoulder [he]112-harry set off at a run , weaving in and out of [students]483-students now hurrying in the opposite direction , off to see what all the fuss was about in [the east wing]4190-the east wing ...

[Harry]112-harry reached [the corridor where [Umbridge]144-umbridge ’s office]1857-the corridor where umbridge ’s office was situated and found [it]1857-the corridor where umbridge ’s office deserted . Dashing behind a large suit of armor whose helmet creaked around to watch [him]112-harry , [he]112-harry pulled open [his]112-harry bag , seized [Sirius]142-sirius ’s knife , and donned the Invisibility Cloak . [He]112-harry then crept slowly and carefully back out from behind the suit of armor and along [the corridor]597-the corridor until [he]112-harry reached [Umbridge]144-umbridge ’s door .

[He]112-harry inserted the blade of the magical knife into the crack around it and moved it gently up and down , then withdrew it . There was a tiny click , and the door swung open . [He]112-harry ducked inside [the office]663-the office , closed the door quickly behind [him]112-harry , and looked around .

[It]663-the office was empty ; nothing was moving except the horrible kittens on the plates continuing to frolic on the wall above the confiscated broomsticks .

[Harry]112-harry pulled off [his]112-harry Cloak and , striding over to the fireplace , found what [he]112-harry was looking for within seconds : a small box containing glittering Floo powder .

[He]112-harry crouched down in front of the empty grate , [his]112-harry hands shaking . [He]112-harry had never done this before , though [he]112-harry thought [he]112-harry knew how it must work . Sticking [his]112-harry head into the fireplace , [he]112-harry took a large pinch of powder and dropped it onto the logs stacked neatly beneath [him]112-harry . They exploded at once into emerald - green flames .

“ Number twelve , [Grimmauld Place]16-grimmauld place ! ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry said loudly and clearly .

It was one of the most curious sensations [he]112-harry had ever experienced ; [he]112-harry had traveled by [Floo]362-floo powder before , of course , but then it had been [his]112-harry entire body that had spun around and around in the flames through the network of Wizarding fireplaces that stretched over [the country]1860-the country : This time , [his]112-harry knees remained firm upon the cold floor of [[Umbridge]144-umbridge ’s office]1286-umbridge ’s office , and only [his]112-harry head hurtled through the emerald fire ...

And then , abruptly as it had begun , the spinning stopped . Feeling rather sick and as though [he]112-harry was wearing an exceptionally hot muffler around [his]112-harry head , [Harry]112-harry opened [his]112-harry eyes to find that [he]112-harry was looking up out of the kitchen fireplace at the long , wooden table , where [a man]598-a man sat poring over a piece of parchment .

“ [Sirius]142-sirius ? ”[598-a man]

[The man]599-the man jumped and looked around . It was not [Sirius]142-sirius , but [Lupin]361-lupin .

“ [Harry]112-harry ! ”[599-the man] [he]599-the man said , looking thoroughly shocked . “ What are [you]112-harry — what ’s happened , is everything all right ? ”[599-the man]

“ Yeah , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry . “ [I]112-harry just wondered — [I]112-harry mean , [I]112-harry just fancied a — a chat with [Sirius]142-sirius . ”[112-harry]

“ [I]361-lupin ’ll call [him]142-sirius , ”[361-lupin] said [Lupin]361-lupin , getting to [his]361-lupin feet , still looking perplexed . “ [He]142-sirius went [upstairs]3504-upstairs to look for [Kreacher]176-kreacher , [he]142-sirius seems to be hiding in [the attic]977-the attic again ... ”[361-lupin]

And [Harry]112-harry saw [Lupin]361-lupin hurry out of [the kitchen]689-the kitchen . Now [he]361-lupin was left with nothing to look at but the chair and table legs . [He]112-harry wondered why [Sirius]142-sirius had never mentioned how very uncomfortable it was to speak out of the fire — [his]142-sirius knees were already objecting painfully to [their]1865-their prolonged contact with [[Umbridge]144-umbridge ’s hard stone floor]1866-umbridge ’s hard stone floor .

[Lupin]361-lupin returned with [Sirius]142-sirius at [his]361-lupin heels moments later .

“ What is it ? ”[142-sirius] said [Sirius]142-sirius urgently , sweeping [his]142-sirius long dark hair out of [his]142-sirius eyes and dropping to the ground in front of the fire , so that [he]142-sirius and [Harry]112-harry were on a level ; [Lupin]361-lupin knelt down too , looking very concerned . “ Are [you]112-harry all right ? Do [you]112-harry need help ? ”[361-lupin]

“ No , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry , “ it ’s nothing like that ... [I]112-harry just wanted to talk ... about [[my]112-harry dad]3809-my dad ... ”[112-harry]

The story of [Fred]149-fred and [George]150-george ’s flight to freedom was retold so often over the next few days that [Harry]112-harry could tell it would soon become the stuff of Hogwarts legend . Within a week , even [those who had been eyewitnesses]1898-those who had been eyewitnesses were half - convinced that [they]1898-those who had been eyewitnesses had seen [the twins]673-the twins dive - bomb [Umbridge]144-umbridge on [their]673-the twins brooms , pelting [her]144-umbridge with Dungbombs before zooming out of the doors . In the immediate aftermath of [their]673-the twins departure there was a great wave of talk about copying [them]673-the twins , so that [Harry]112-harry frequently heard [students]483-students saying things like , “ Honestly , some days [I]483-students just feel like jumping on [my]483-students broom and leaving [this place]3840-this place , ”[483-students] or else , “ One more lesson like that and [I]483-students might just do a Weasley ... ”[483-students]

[Fred]149-fred and [George]150-george had made sure that [nobody]453-nobody was likely to forget [them]673-the twins very soon . Eventually [the area]1905-the area was roped off and [Filch]172-filch , gnashing [his]172-filch teeth furiously , was given the task of punting [students]483-students across [it]1905-the area to [[their]483-students classrooms]1907-their classrooms . Then there were the two large broom - shaped holes in [[Umbridge]144-umbridge ’s office]1286-umbridge ’s office door , through which [Fred]149-fred and [George]150-george ’s Cleansweeps had smashed to rejoin [[their]673-the twins masters]1911-their masters . However , [her]144-umbridge troubles were far from over .

Inspired by [Fred]149-fred and [George]150-george ’s example , [a great number of [students]483-students]1913-a great number of students were now vying for [the newly vacant positions of [Troublemakers - in - Chief]1916-troublemakers - in - chief]1915-the newly vacant positions of troublemakers - in - chief . Dungbombs and Stinkpellets were dropped so frequently in [the corridors]534-the corridors that it became the new fashion for [students]483-students to perform Bubble - Head Charms on [themselves]483-students before leaving lessons , which ensured [them]483-students a supply of fresh clean air , even though it gave [them]483-students all the peculiar appearance of wearing upside - down goldfish bowls on [their]483-students heads .

[Filch]172-filch prowled [the corridors]534-the corridors with a horsewhip ready in [his]172-filch hands , desperate to catch [miscreants]1923-miscreants , but the problem was that there were now so many of [them]1923-miscreants that [he]172-filch did not know which way to turn . [Pansy Parkinson]169-pansy parkinson , to [Hermione]114-hermione ’s delight , missed all [her]169-pansy parkinson lessons the following day , as [she]169-pansy parkinson had sprouted antlers .

Meanwhile it became clear just how many Skiving Snackboxes [Fred]149-fred and [George]150-george had managed to sell before leaving [Hogwarts]18-hogwarts . [Umbridge]144-umbridge only had to enter [[her]144-umbridge classroom]1663-her classroom for [the students assembled there]1929-the students assembled there to faint , vomit , develop dangerous fevers , or else spout blood from both nostrils . Shrieking with rage and frustration [she]144-umbridge attempted to trace the mysterious symptoms to [their]1929-the students assembled there source , but [the students]3322-the students told [her]144-umbridge stubbornly [they]3322-the students were suffering “ Umbridge - itis . ”[3322-the students] After putting four successive classes in [detention]1931-detention and failing to discover [their]3322-the students secret [she]144-umbridge was forced to give up and allow [the bleeding , swooning , sweating , and vomiting students]1932-the bleeding , swooning , sweating , and vomiting students to leave [[her]144-umbridge classes]1933-her classes in droves .

But not even [the users of the Snackboxes]1934-the users of the snackboxes could compete with [that master of chaos]1935-that master of chaos , [Peeves]171-peeves , who seemed to have taken [Fred]149-fred ’s parting words deeply to heart . Cackling madly , [he]1935-that master of chaos soared through [the school]1190-the school , upending tables , bursting out of blackboards , and toppling statues and vases . Twice [he]1935-that master of chaos shut [Mrs. Norris]202-mrs. norris inside suits of armor , from which [she]202-mrs. norris was rescued , yowling loudly , by [the furious caretaker]1937-the furious caretaker . [He]1935-that master of chaos smashed lanterns and snuffed out candles , juggled burning torches over the heads of [screaming students]1938-screaming students , caused neatly stacked piles of parchment to topple into fires or out of windows , flooded [the second floor]839-the second floor when [he]1935-that master of chaos pulled off all the taps in [the bathrooms]3987-the bathrooms , dropped a bag of tarantulas in the middle of [the Great Hall]1163-the great hall during breakfast and , whenever [he]1935-that master of chaos fancied a break , spent hours at a time floating along after [Umbridge]144-umbridge and blowing loud raspberries every time [she]202-mrs. norris spoke .

[None of the staff]1942-none of the staff but [Filch]172-filch seemed to be stirring [themselves]1942-none of the staff to help [her]202-mrs. norris . Indeed , a week after [Fred]149-fred and [George]150-george ’s departure [Harry]112-harry witnessed [Professor McGonagall]200-professor mcgonagall walking right past [Peeves]171-peeves , who was determinedly loosening a crystal chandelier , and could have sworn [he]112-harry heard [her]202-mrs. norris tell [the poltergeist]1943-the poltergeist out of the corner of [her]202-mrs. norris mouth , “ It unscrews the other way . ”[202-mrs. norris]

To cap matters , [Montague]340-montague had still not recovered from [his]1935-that master of chaos sojourn in [the toilet]1709-the toilet . [He]1935-that master of chaos remained confused and disorientated and [[his]1935-that master of chaos parents]1244-his parents were to be observed one Tuesday morning striding up [the front drive]1946-the front drive , looking extremely angry .

“ Should [we]4269-we say something ? ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione in a worried voice , pressing [her]114-hermione cheek against the Charms window so that [she]114-hermione could see [Mr.]1947-mr. and [Mrs. Montague]340-montague marching inside . “ About what happened to [him]1935-that master of chaos ? “ ’ Course not , [he]1935-that master of chaos ’ll recover , ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron indifferently .

“ Anyway , more trouble for [Umbridge]144-umbridge , is n’t it ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry in a satisfied voice .

[He]112-harry and [Ron]113-ron both tapped the teacups [they]1948-they were supposed to be charming with [their]1948-they wands . [Harry]112-harry ’s spouted four very short legs that would not reach the desk and wriggled pointlessly in midair . [Ron]113-ron ’s grew four very thin spindly legs that hoisted the cup off the desk with great difficulty , trembled for a few seconds , then folded , causing the cup to crack into two .

“ [Reparo]363-reparo ! ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione quickly , mending [Ron]113-ron ’s cup with a wave of [her]114-hermione wand . “ That ’s all very well , but what if [Montague]340-montague ’s permanently injured ? ”[114-hermione]

[Harry]112-harry ’s heart sank . Once [they]1953-them had exhausted the subject of [Fred]149-fred and [George]150-george ’s dramatic departure , which admittedly had taken many hours , [Ron]113-ron and [Hermione]114-hermione had wanted to hear news of [Sirius]142-sirius . [He]112-harry had been regretting this ever since ; [Hermione]114-hermione would not let the subject drop and kept reverting to it when [Harry]112-harry least expected it .

[Ron]113-ron ’s ears went red . [Harry]112-harry felt a kind of vindictive pleasure : [He]112-harry had not , of course , dreamed anything of the sort .

Last night [he]112-harry had once again made the journey along [the Department of Mysteries corridor]3888-the department of mysteries corridor . [He]112-harry had passed through [the circular room]1442-the circular room , then [the room full of clicking and dancing light]1956-the room full of clicking and dancing light , until [he]112-harry found [himself]112-harry again inside [that cavernous room full of shelves on which were ranged dusty glass spheres ...

The problem was that with just under a month to go until the exams and every free moment devoted to studying , [his]112-harry mind seemed saturated with information when [he]112-harry went to bed so that [he]112-harry found it very difficult to get to sleep at all . When [he]112-harry did , [his]112-harry overwrought brain presented [him]112-harry most nights with stupid dreams about the exams . [He]112-harry also suspected that part of [his]112-harry mind — the part that often spoke in [Hermione]114-hermione ’s voice — now felt guilty on the occasions it strayed down [that corridor]3748-that corridor ending in the black door , and sought to wake [him]112-harry before [he]112-harry could reach journey ’s end .

[Harry]112-harry and [Hermione]114-hermione looked at [each other]3141-each other , then ducked into the cover of the trees behind [Hagrid]116-hagrid , who was already striding away from [them]1983-they into the green gloom , [his]116-hagrid crossbow over [his]116-hagrid arm . [Harry]112-harry and [Hermione]114-hermione ran to catch up with [him]116-hagrid .

“ [Hagrid]116-hagrid , why are [you]116-hagrid armed ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry .

“ Jus ’ a precaution , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid , shrugging [his]116-hagrid massive shoulders .

“ Nah , well , [we]1983-they weren ’ goin’ in so far then , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid . “ An ’ anyway , tha ’ was before [Firenze]320-firenze left [the forest]3290-the forest , wasn ’ it ? ”[116-hagrid]

“ Why does [Firenze]320-firenze leaving make a difference ? ”[114-hermione] asked [Hermione]114-hermione curiously .

“ ’Cause [the other centaurs]3950-the other centaurs are good an ’ riled at [me]116-hagrid , tha ’s why , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid quietly , glancing around . “ [They]3950-the other centaurs used ter be — well , [yeh]116-hagrid couldn ’ call ’em friendly — but [we]1983-they got on all righ ’ . Kept ’ emselves to ’ emselves , bu ’ always turned up if [I]116-hagrid wanted a word . Not anymore ... ”[116-hagrid]

[He]116-hagrid sighed deeply .

“ [Firenze]320-firenze said that [they]3950-the other centaurs ’re angry because [he]320-firenze went to work for [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore ? ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry asked , tripping on a protruding root because [he]112-harry was busy watching [Hagrid]116-hagrid ’s profile .

On this incomprehensible note [he]116-hagrid fell silent and forged a little ahead , taking one stride for every three of [theirs]1994-they , so that [they]1994-they had great trouble keeping up with [him]116-hagrid .

[The path]1995-the path was becoming increasingly overgrown and the trees grew so closely together as [they]1994-they walked farther and farther into [the forest]3290-the forest that it was as dark as dusk . [They]1994-they were soon a long way past the clearing where [Hagrid]116-hagrid had shown [them]1994-they the thestrals , but [Harry]112-harry felt no sense of unease until [Hagrid]116-hagrid stepped unexpectedly off [the path]1995-the path and began wending [his]116-hagrid way in and out of trees toward [the dark heart of [the forest]3290-the forest]1998-the dark heart of the forest .

It was a great struggle to keep up with [Hagrid]116-hagrid , what with branches and thickets of thorn through which [Hagrid]116-hagrid marched as easily as though they were cobwebs , but which snagged [Harry]112-harry and [Hermione]114-hermione ’s robes , frequently entangling them so severely that [they]2001-they had to stop for minutes at a time to free [themselves]2001-they . Any sound seemed threatening in the muffled silence . [He]112-harry had just noticed ropes thick as saplings stretching from around the trunks of the largest nearby trees toward the place where [Grawp]368-grawp lay curled on the ground with [his]368-grawp back to [them]2018-them .

[Harry]112-harry and [Hermione]114-hermione exchanged miserable looks , [Harry]112-harry uncomfortably aware that [he]112-harry had already promised [Hagrid]116-hagrid that [he]112-harry would do whatever [he]112-harry asked .

“ What — what does that involve , exactly ? ”[114-hermione] [Hermione]114-hermione inquired .

“ Not food or anythin ’ ! ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid eagerly . “ [He]116-hagrid can get [his]116-hagrid own food , no problem . [Birds]369-birds an ’ deer an ’ stuff ...
