If [I]116-hagrid jus ’ knew [someone]3263-someone was carryin ’ on tryin ’ ter help [him]368-grawp a bit ... teachin ’ [him]368-grawp , [yeh]2021-them know ... ”[116-hagrid]

[Harry]112-harry said nothing , but turned to look back at the gigantic form lying asleep on the ground in front of [them]2021-them . [Grawp]368-grawp had [his]368-grawp back to [them]2021-them . Unlike [Hagrid]116-hagrid , who simply looked like [a very oversize human]2022-a very oversize human , [Grawp]368-grawp looked strangely misshapen . What [Harry]112-harry had taken to be a vast mossy boulder to the left of [the great earthen mound [he]112-harry now recognized as [Grawp]368-grawp ’s head]2023-the great earthen mound he now recognized as grawp ’s head . It was much larger in proportion to the body than a human head , almost perfectly round and covered with tightly curling , close - growing hair the color of bracken . The rim of a single large , fleshy ear was visible on top of the head , which seemed to sit , rather like [Uncle Vernon]272-uncle vernon ’s , directly upon the shoulders with little or no neck in between . The back , under what looked like a dirty brownish smock comprised of animal skins sewn roughly together , was very broad , and as [Grawp]368-grawp slept , it seemed to strain a little at the rough seams of the skins . The legs were curled up under the body ; [Harry]112-harry could see the soles of enormous , filthy , bare feet , large as sledges , resting one on top of the other on [the earthy forest floor]2024-the earthy forest floor .

“ [You]116-hagrid want [us]4326-us to teach [him]368-grawp , ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry said in a hollow voice . [He]112-harry now understood what [Firenze]320-firenze ’s warning had meant . [His]368-grawp attempt is not working . [He]112-harry would do better to abandon it . Of course , [the other creatures who lived in [the forest]3290-the forest]2025-the other creatures who lived in the forest would have heard [Hagrid]116-hagrid ’s fruitless attempts to teach [Grawp English]368-grawp ...

“ Yeah — even if [yeh]116-hagrid jus ’ talk ter [him]368-grawp a bit , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid hopefully . “ ’Cause [I]116-hagrid reckon , if [he]368-grawp can talk ter [people]3280-people , [he]368-grawp ’ll understand more that [we]4328-we all like [him]368-grawp really , an ’ want [him]368-grawp to stay ... ”[116-hagrid]

[Harry]112-harry looked at [Hermione]114-hermione , who peered back at [him]112-harry from between the fingers over [her]114-hermione face .

“ Kind of makes [you]114-hermione wish [we]4328-we had [Norbert]370-norbert back , does n’t it ? ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry said and [she]114-hermione gave a very shaky laugh .

“ [Yeh’ll]4328-we do it , then ? ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid , who did not seem to have caught what [Harry]112-harry had just said .

“ [We]4328-we ’ll ... ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry , already bound by [his]112-harry promise . “ [We]4328-we ’ll try , [Hagrid]116-hagrid ... ”[112-harry]

“ [I]116-hagrid knew [I]116-hagrid could count on [yeh]4328-we , [Harry]112-harry , ”[116-hagrid] [Hagrid]116-hagrid said , beaming in a very watery way and dabbing at [his]116-hagrid face with [his]116-hagrid handkerchief again . “ An ’ [I]116-hagrid don ’ wan ’ [yeh]4328-we ter put [yerself]4328-we out too much , like ... [I]116-hagrid know [yeh’ve]4328-we got exams ... If [yeh]4328-we could jus ’ nip down here in [yer]4328-we Invisibility Cloak maybe once a week an ’ have a little chat with [him]368-grawp ... [I]116-hagrid ’ll wake [him]368-grawp up , then — introduce [you]4328-we — ”[116-hagrid]

“ Wha — no ! ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione , jumping up , “ [Hagrid]116-hagrid , no , do n’t wake [him]368-grawp , really , [we]2027-we do n’t need — ”[114-hermione]

But [Hagrid]116-hagrid had already stepped over the great trunk in front of [them]2027-we and was proceeding toward [Grawp]368-grawp . When [he]116-hagrid was around ten feet away , [he]116-hagrid lifted a long , broken bough from the ground , smiled reassuringly over [his]116-hagrid shoulder at [Harry]112-harry and [Hermione]114-hermione , and then poked [Grawp]368-grawp hard in the middle of the back with the end of the bough .

[The giant]2028-the giant gave a roar that echoed around [the silent forest]2029-the silent forest . Birds in the treetops overhead rose twittering from their perches and soared away . In front of [Harry]112-harry and [Hermione]114-hermione , meanwhile , [the gigantic Grawp]2030-the gigantic grawp was rising from the ground , which shuddered as [he]116-hagrid placed an enormous hand upon it to push [himself]116-hagrid onto [his]116-hagrid knees and turned [his]116-hagrid head to see who and what had disturbed [him]116-hagrid .

“ All righ ’ , [Grawpy]371-grawpy ? ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid in a would - be cheery voice , backing away with the long bough raised , ready to poke [Grawp]368-grawp again . “ Had a nice sleep , eh ? ”[368-grawp]

[Harry]112-harry and [Hermione]114-hermione retreated as far as [they]2031-they could while still keeping [the giant]2028-the giant within [their]2031-they sights . [Grawp]368-grawp knelt between two trees [he]368-grawp had not yet uprooted . [They]2031-they looked up into [his]368-grawp startlingly huge face , which resembled a gray full moon swimming in the gloom of [the clearing]2033-the clearing . It was as though the features had been hewn onto a great stone ball . The nose was stubby and shapeless , the mouth lopsided and full of misshapen yellow teeth the size of half - bricks . The small eyes were a muddy greenish - brown and just now were half gummed together with sleep . [Grawp]368-grawp raised dirty knuckles as big as cricket balls to [his]368-grawp eyes , rubbed vigorously , then , without warning , pushed [himself]368-grawp to [his]368-grawp feet with surprising speed and agility .

“ Oh [my]112-harry ... ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry heard [Hermione]114-hermione squeal , terrified , beside [him]112-harry .

The trees to which the other ends of the ropes around [Grawp]368-grawp ’s wrists and ankles were attached creaked ominously . [He]368-grawp was , as [Hagrid]116-hagrid had said , at least sixteen feet tall . Gazing blearily around , [he]116-hagrid reached out a hand the size of a beach umbrella , seized a bird ’s nest from the upper branches of a towering pine and turned it upside down with a roar of apparent displeasure that there was no bird in it — eggs fell like grenades toward the ground and [Hagrid]116-hagrid threw [his]116-hagrid arms over [his]116-hagrid head to protect [himself]116-hagrid .

“ Anyway , [Grawpy]371-grawpy , ”[116-hagrid] shouted [Hagrid]116-hagrid , looking up apprehensively in case of further falling eggs , “ [I]116-hagrid ’ve brought [some friends]4329-some friends ter meet [yeh]371-grawpy . But [Grawp]368-grawp merely gave another low roar ; it was hard to say whether [he]368-grawp was listening to [Hagrid]116-hagrid or whether [he]368-grawp even recognized the sounds [Hagrid]116-hagrid was making as speech . [He]116-hagrid had now seized the top of the pine tree and was pulling it toward [him]116-hagrid , evidently for the simple pleasure of seeing how far it would spring back when [he]116-hagrid let go .

“ Now , [Grawpy]371-grawpy , don ’ do that ! ”[116-hagrid] shouted [Hagrid]116-hagrid . “ Tha ’s how [you]371-grawpy ended up pullin ’ up the others — ”[116-hagrid]

And sure enough , [Harry]112-harry could see the earth around the tree ’s roots beginning to crack .

“ [I]116-hagrid got [company]4330-company fer [yeh]371-grawpy ! ”[116-hagrid] [Hagrid]116-hagrid shouted . “ [Company]4330-company , see ! Look down , [yeh big buffoon]4332-yeh big buffoon , [I]116-hagrid brought [yeh]371-grawpy [some friends]4329-some friends ! ”[116-hagrid]

“ Oh [Hagrid]116-hagrid , do n’t , ”[114-hermione] moaned [Hermione]114-hermione , but [Hagrid]116-hagrid had already raised the bough again and gave [Grawp]368-grawp ’s knee a sharp poke .

[The giant]2028-the giant let go of the top of the pine tree , which swayed menacingly and deluged [Hagrid]116-hagrid with a rain of needles , and looked down .

[The giant]2028-the giant had only just realized that [Harry]112-harry and [Hermione]114-hermione were there . [They]2036-yeh watched , in great trepidation , as [he]2028-the giant lowered [his]2028-the giant huge boulder of a head so that [he]2028-the giant could peer blearily at [them]2036-yeh .

[Nobody]453-nobody spoke for a while , not even when [they]453-nobody heard the distant crash that meant [Grawp]368-grawp had pulled over the pine tree at last . “ [I]114-hermione dunno — ”[114-hermione]

“ And [I]114-hermione wish [they]4372-they ’d stop singing that stupid song , ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione miserably , “ have n’t [they]4372-they gloated enough ? ”[114-hermione]

“ Oh , let ’s get in before [we]2053-we have to meet [the Slytherins]158-the slytherins , ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione .

“ [Hermione]114-hermione ... ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry slowly .

The song was growing louder , but it was issuing not from [a crowd of green - and - silver - clad Slytherins]2058-a crowd of green - and - silver - clad slytherins , but from a mass of red and gold moving slowly toward [the castle]3279-the castle , which was bearing a solitary figure upon [its]3279-the castle many shoulders ...

“ No ! ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione in a hushed voice .

“ YES ! ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry loudly .

“ [HARRY]112-harry ! [HERMIONE]114-hermione ! ”[113-ron] yelled [Ron]113-ron , waving the silver Quidditch Cup in the air and looking quite beside [himself]113-ron . “ [WE]2060-they DID IT ! [WE]2060-they WON ! ”[113-ron]

[They]2060-they beamed up at [him]113-ron as [he]113-ron passed ; there was a scrum at the door of [the castle]3279-the castle and [Ron]113-ron ’s head got rather badly bumped on the lintel , but [nobody]453-nobody seemed to want to put [him]113-ron down . Still singing , [the crowd]3452-the crowd squeezed [itself]3452-the crowd into [the entrance hall]454-the entrance hall and out of sight . Then [they]2060-they turned to [each other]3141-each other , [their]2060-they smiles fading .

“ [We]2060-they ’ll save [our]2060-they news till tomorrow , shall [we]2060-they ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry .

“ Yes , all right , ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione wearily . “ [I]114-hermione ’m not in any hurry ... ”[114-hermione]

[They]2060-they climbed the steps together . At the front doors both instinctively looked back at [the Forbidden Forest]485-the forbidden forest . [Harry]112-harry was not sure whether it was [his]112-harry imagination or not , but [he]112-harry rather thought [he]112-harry saw a small cloud of birds erupting into the air over the treetops in the distance , almost as though the tree in which [they]2060-they had been nesting had just been pulled up by the roots .

[Ron]113-ron ’s euphoria at helping [Gryffindor]309-gryffindor scrape the Quidditch Cup was such that [he]113-ron could not settle to anything next day . All [he]113-ron wanted to do was talk over the match and [Harry]112-harry and [Hermione]114-hermione found it very difficult to find an opening in which to mention [Grawp]368-grawp — not that either of [them]2060-they tried very hard ; [neither]637-neither was keen to be the one to bring [Ron]113-ron back to reality in quite such a brutal fashion . [Ron]113-ron was not particularly keen on this idea at first ; [he]113-ron was thoroughly enjoying being patted on the back by [Gryffindors]159-gryffindors walking past [his]113-ron chair , not to mention the occasional outbursts of “ [Weasley]113-ron Is [[Our]2060-they King]3085-our king , ”[159-gryffindors] but agreed after a while that some fresh air might do [him]113-ron good .

[They]2060-they spread [their]2060-they books out in the shade of the beech tree and sat down while [Ron]113-ron talked [them]2060-they through [his]113-ron first save of the match for what felt like the dozenth time .

“ Well , [I]2071-i mean , [I]2071-i ’d already let in that one of [Davies]339-ravenclaw ’s , so [I]2071-i was n’t feeling that confident , but [I]2071-i dunno , when [Bradley]364-bradley came toward [me]2071-i , just out of nowhere , [I]2071-i thought — [you]364-bradley can do this ! “ [I]112-harry ’m not , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry quickly , looking down at [his]112-harry Transfiguration notes and attempting to straighten [his]112-harry face . [The castle grounds]2077-the castle grounds were gleaming in the sunlight as though freshly painted ; the cloudless sky smiled at itself in [the smoothly sparkling lake]2078-the smoothly sparkling lake , the satin - green lawns rippled occasionally in a gentle breeze : [June]314-june had arrived , but to the fifth years this meant only one thing : [Their]2079-their O.W.L.s were upon [them]2079-their at last .

[[Their]2079-their teachers]2080-their teachers were no longer setting [them]2079-their homework ; lessons were devoted to reviewing those topics [[their]2079-their teachers]2080-their teachers thought most likely to come up in the exams . The purposeful , feverish atmosphere drove nearly everything but the O.W.L.s from [Harry]112-harry ’s mind , though [he]112-harry did wonder occasionally during Potions lessons whether [Lupin]361-lupin had ever told [Snape]255-snape that [he]361-lupin must continue giving [Harry]112-harry Occlumency tuition : If [he]361-lupin had , then [Snape]255-snape had ignored [Lupin]361-lupin as thoroughly as [he]361-lupin was now ignoring [Harry]112-harry . This suited [Harry]112-harry very well ; [he]112-harry was quite busy and tense enough without extra classes with [Snape]255-snape , and to [his]112-harry relief [Hermione]114-hermione was much too preoccupied these days to badger [him]112-harry about Occlumency . [She]114-hermione was spending a lot of time muttering to [herself]114-hermione and had not laid out any elf clothes for days .

[She]114-hermione was not the only person acting oddly as the O.W.L.s drew steadily nearer . [Ernie Macmillan]338-ernie had developed an irritating habit of interrogating [people]3280-people about [their]3280-people study habits .

“ How many hours [d’you]4385-d’you think [you]112-harry ’re doing a day ? ”[338-ernie] [he]338-ernie demanded of [Harry]112-harry and [Ron]113-ron as [they]2083-we queued outside Herbology , a manic gleam in [his]338-ernie eyes .

“ [I]113-ron dunno , ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron . “ A few ... ”[113-ron]

“ More or less than eight ? ”[338-ernie]

“ Less , [I]113-ron s’pose , ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron , looking slightly alarmed .

“ [I]338-ernie ’m doing eight , ”[338-ernie] said [Ernie]338-ernie , puffing out [his]338-ernie chest . “ Eight or nine . [I]338-ernie ’m getting an hour in before breakfast every day . [Harry]112-harry was deeply thankful that [Professor Sprout]281-professor sprout ushered [them]2083-we into greenhouse three at that point , forcing [Ernie]338-ernie to abandon [his]338-ernie recital .

Meanwhile [Draco Malfoy]166-malfoy had found a different way to induce panic .

Meanwhile a flourishing black - market trade in aids to concentration , mental agility , and wakefulness had sprung up among the fifth and seventh years . [Harry]112-harry and [Ron]113-ron were much tempted by the bottle of Baruffio ’s Brain Elixir offered to [them]2086-they by Ravenclaw sixth year [Eddie Carmichael]378-eddie carmichael , who swore it was solely responsible for the nine “ Outstanding ”[113-ron] O.W.L.s [he]378-eddie carmichael had gained the previous summer and was offering the whole pint for a mere twelve Galleons . “ [Hermione]114-hermione , [we]2086-they wanted to buy that ! ”[113-ron] shouted [Ron]113-ron .

This information took the edge off [Harry]112-harry and [Ron]113-ron ’s desire for brain stimulants .

[They]2088-their received [their]2088-their examination schedules and details of the procedure for O.W.L.s during [their]2088-their next Transfiguration lesson .

“ As [you]113-ron can see , ”[200-professor mcgonagall] [Professor McGonagall]200-professor mcgonagall told [the class]493-the class while [they]2088-their copied down the dates and times of [their]2088-their exams from the blackboard , “ [your]113-ron O.W.L.s are spread over two successive weeks . [[Our]4397-our new — headmistress]4398-our new — headmistress ”[200-professor mcgonagall] — [Professor McGonagall]200-professor mcgonagall pronounced the word with the same look on [her]200-professor mcgonagall face that [Aunt Petunia]380-aunt petunia had whenever [she]380-aunt petunia was contemplating a particularly stubborn bit of dirt — “ has asked [the Heads of House]4399-the heads of house to tell [[their]4399-the heads of house students]4400-their students that cheating will be punished most severely — because , of course , [your]4401-your examination results will reflect upon [the headmistress]4109-the headmistress ’s new regime at [the school]1190-the school ... ”[200-professor mcgonagall]

[Professor McGonagall]200-professor mcgonagall gave a tiny sigh . [Harry]112-harry saw the nostrils of [her]200-professor mcgonagall sharp nose flare .

[Harry]112-harry imagined sitting in [[his]112-harry bedroom]3547-his bedroom in [Privet Drive]30-privet drive in six weeks ’ time , waiting for [his]112-harry O.W.L. results . Well , [he]112-harry thought , at least [he]112-harry would be sure of one bit of post next summer ...

[Their]2091-their first exam , Theory of Charms , was scheduled for Monday morning . [Harry]112-harry agreed to test [Hermione]114-hermione after lunch on Sunday but regretted it almost at once . [She]114-hermione was very agitated and kept snatching the book back from [him]112-harry to check that [she]114-hermione had gotten the answer completely right , finally hitting [him]112-harry hard on the nose with the sharp edge of Achievements in [Charming]79-charming .

“ Why do n’t [you]114-hermione just do it [yourself]114-hermione ? ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry said firmly , handing the book back to [her]114-hermione , [his]112-harry eyes watering .

Meanwhile [Ron]113-ron was reading two years of Charms notes with [his]113-ron fingers in [his]113-ron ears , [his]113-ron lips moving soundlessly ; [Seamus]199-seamus was lying flat on [his]199-seamus back on the floor , reciting the definition of a Substantive Charm , while [Dean]189-dean checked it against The Standard Book of Spells , Grade 5 ; and [Parvati]153-parvati and [Lavender]154-lavender , who were practicing basic locomotion charms , were making [their]2092-they pencil cases race each other around the edge of the table .

Dinner was a subdued affair that night . [Harry]112-harry and [Ron]113-ron did not talk much , but ate with gusto , having studied hard all day . [Hermione]114-hermione on the other hand kept putting down [her]114-hermione knife and fork and diving under the table for [her]114-hermione bag , from which [she]114-hermione would seize a book to check some fact or figure . [Ron]113-ron was just telling [her]114-hermione that [she]114-hermione ought to eat a decent meal or [she]114-hermione would not sleep that night , when [her]114-hermione fork slid from [her]114-hermione limp fingers and landed with a loud tinkle on [her]114-hermione plate .

“ Oh , my goodness , ”[114-hermione] [she]114-hermione said faintly , staring into [the entrance hall]454-the entrance hall . “ Is that [them]2095-a small group of ancient - looking witches ? Is that [the examiners]4406-the examiners ? ”[114-hermione]

[Harry]112-harry and [Ron]113-ron whipped around on [their]2092-they bench . Through the doors to [the Great Hall]1163-the great hall [they]2092-they could see [Umbridge]144-umbridge standing with [a small group of ancient - looking witches]2095-a small group of ancient - looking witches and [wizards]3128-wizards . [Umbridge]144-umbridge , [Harry]112-harry was pleased to see , looked rather nervous .

“ Shall [we]2092-they go and have a closer look ? ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron .

[Harry]112-harry and [Hermione]114-hermione nodded and [they]2092-they hastened toward the double doors into [the entrance hall]454-the entrance hall , slowing down as [they]2092-they stepped over the threshold to walk sedately past [the examiners]4406-the examiners . [Harry]112-harry thought [Professor Marchbanks]377-professor marchbanks must be [the tiny , stooped witch with a face so lined it looked as though it had been draped in cobwebs]2099-the tiny , stooped witch with a face so lined it looked as though it had been draped in cobwebs ; [Umbridge]144-umbridge was speaking to [her]2099-the tiny , stooped witch with a face so lined it looked as though it had been draped in cobwebs very deferentially . [Professor Marchbanks]377-professor marchbanks seemed to be a little deaf ; [she]2099-the tiny , stooped witch with a face so lined it looked as though it had been draped in cobwebs was answering [Umbridge]144-umbridge very loudly considering that [they]2100-they were only a foot apart .

It was an uncomfortable sort of an evening . [Everyone]524-everyone was trying to do some last - minute studying but [nobody]453-nobody seemed to be getting very far . [Harry]112-harry went to bed early but then lay awake for what felt like hours . [None of the fifth years]2110-none of the fifth years talked very much at breakfast next day either . On the whole [Harry]112-harry thought it went rather well ; [his]112-harry Levitation Charm was certainly much better than [Malfoy]166-malfoy ’s had been , though [he]112-harry wished [he]112-harry had not mixed up the incantations for Color - Change and Growth Charms , so that the rat [he]112-harry was supposed to be turning orange swelled shockingly and was the size of a badger before [Harry]112-harry could rectify [his]112-harry mistake . There was no time to relax that night — [they]2131-they went straight to [the common room]481-the common room after dinner and submerged [themselves]2131-they in studying for Transfiguration next day . The Astronomy theory exam on Wednesday morning went well enough ; [Harry]112-harry was not convinced [he]112-harry had got the names of [all of [Jupiter]388-jupiter ’s moons]2162-all of jupiter ’s moons right , but was at least confident that none of [them]2162-all of jupiter ’s moons was inhabited by mice . [He]112-harry might as well have tried to see moving pictures in the desktop as in the stubbornly blank crystal ball ; [he]112-harry lost [his]112-harry head completely during tea - leaf reading , saying it looked to [him]112-harry as though [Professor Marchbanks]377-professor marchbanks would shortly be meeting [a round , dark , soggy stranger]2163-a round , dark , soggy stranger , and rounded off the whole fiasco by mixing up the life and head lines on [her]2163-a round , dark , soggy stranger palm and informing [her]2163-a round , dark , soggy stranger that [she]2163-a round , dark , soggy stranger ought to have died the previous Tuesday .

When [they]2167-they reached [the top of [the Astronomy Tower]1343-the astronomy tower]2168-the top of the astronomy tower at eleven o’clock [they]2167-they found [a perfect night for stargazing , cloudless and still]2170-a perfect night for stargazing , cloudless and still . [Each of [them]2167-they]2172-each of them set up [his]2173-his or [her]2174-her telescope and , when [Professor Marchbanks]377-professor marchbanks gave the word , proceeded to fill in the blank star chart [he]2173-his or [she]2174-her had been given .

[Professors Marchbanks]389-professors marchbanks and [Tofty]385-professor tofty strolled among [them]2167-they , watching as [they]2167-they entered the precise positions of the stars and planets [they]2167-they were observing . All was quiet except for the rustle of parchment , the occasional creak of a telescope as it was adjusted on its stand , and the scribbling of many quills . Half an hour passed , then an hour ; the little squares of reflected gold light flickering on the ground below started to vanish as lights in [the castle]3279-the castle windows were extinguished .

As [Harry]112-harry completed the constellation Orion on [his]112-harry chart , however , the front doors of [the castle]3279-the castle opened directly below the parapet where [he]112-harry was standing , so that light spilled down the stone steps a little way across [the lawn]1094-the lawn . [Harry]112-harry glanced down as [he]112-harry made a slight adjustment to the position of [his]112-harry telescope and saw five or six elongated shadows moving over the brightly lit grass before the doors swung shut and [the lawn]1094-the lawn became [a sea of darkness once more]2179-a sea of darkness once more .

[Harry]112-harry put [his]112-harry eye back to [his]112-harry telescope and refocused it , now examining [Venus]390-venus . [He]112-harry looked down at [his]112-harry chart to enter [the planet there]2180-the planet there , but something distracted [him]112-harry . If [they]2182-half a dozen figures had not been moving , and the moonlight had not been gilding the tops of [their]2182-half a dozen figures heads , [they]2182-half a dozen figures would have been indistinguishable from [the dark ground on which [they]2182-half a dozen figures stood]2184-the dark ground on which they stood . Even at this distance , [Harry]112-harry had a funny feeling that [he]112-harry recognized the walk of [the squattest among [them]2182-half a dozen figures , who seemed to be leading [the group]715-the group]2185-the squattest among them , who seemed to be leading the group .

[He]112-harry could not think why [Umbridge]144-umbridge would be taking a stroll outside past midnight , much less accompanied by [five others]2187-five others . Then [somebody]491-somebody coughed behind [him]112-harry , and [he]112-harry remembered that [he]112-harry was halfway through an exam . [He]112-harry had quite forgotten [Venus]390-venus ’s position — jamming [his]112-harry eye to [his]112-harry telescope , [he]112-harry found it again and was again on the point of entering it on [his]112-harry chart when , alert for any odd sound , [he]112-harry heard a distant knock that echoed through [the deserted grounds]2189-the deserted grounds , followed immediately by the muffled barking of a large dog .

[He]112-harry looked up , [his]112-harry heart hammering . The door opened and [he]112-harry distinctly saw [six tiny but sharply defined figures]2193-six tiny but sharply defined figures walk over the threshold . The door closed again and there was silence .

[Harry]112-harry felt very uneasy . [He]112-harry glanced around to see whether [Ron]113-ron or [Hermione]114-hermione had noticed what [he]112-harry had , but [Professor Marchbanks]377-professor marchbanks came walking behind [him]112-harry at that moment , and not wanting to appear as though [he]377-professor marchbanks was sneaking looks at [anyone else]3354-anyone else ’s work , [he]112-harry hastily bent over [his]112-harry star chart and pretended to be adding notes to it while really peering over the top of the parapet toward [[Hagrid]116-hagrid ’s cabin]480-hagrid ’s cabin . [Several of [the people around [Harry]112-harry]2201-the people around harry]2200-several of the people around harry ducked out from behind [their]2200-several of the people around harry telescopes and peered instead in the direction of [[Hagrid]116-hagrid ’s cabin]480-hagrid ’s cabin .

[Harry]112-harry stared fixedly at the first question . “ [Luna]178-luna and [I]182-ginny can stand at either end of [the corridor]597-the corridor , ”[182-ginny] said [Ginny]182-ginny promptly , “ and warn [people]3280-people not to go down there because [someone]3263-someone ’s let off a load of Garroting Gas . ”[182-ginny] [Hermione]114-hermione looked surprised at the readiness with which [Ginny]182-ginny had come up with this lie . “ [You]255-snape can make some more , ca n’t [you]255-snape ? ”[144-umbridge] [she]144-umbridge said , [her]144-umbridge voice becoming more sweetly girlish as it always did when [she]144-umbridge was furious .

[Harry]112-harry ’s eyes met [Ron]113-ron ’s . [He]112-harry closed [his]112-harry eyes and put [his]112-harry face down into the horse ’s silky mane as [they]2452-they burst through the topmost branches of the trees and soared out into a bloodred sunset .

[Harry]112-harry did not think [he]112-harry had ever moved so fast : The thestral streaked over [the castle]3279-the castle , its wide wings hardly beating . The cooling air was slapping [Harry]112-harry ’s face ; eyes screwed up against the rushing wind , [he]112-harry looked around and saw [[his]112-harry five fellows]2454-his five fellows soaring along behind [him]112-harry , each of [them]2454-his five fellows bent as low as possible into the neck of [their]2454-his five fellows thestral to protect [themselves]2454-his five fellows from its slipstream .

[They]2454-his five fellows were over [the Hogwarts grounds]2455-the hogwarts grounds , [they]2454-his five fellows had passed [Hogsmeade]39-hogsmeade . “ This is bizarre ! ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry heard [Ron]113-ron yell from somewhere behind [him]112-harry , and [he]112-harry imagined how it must feel to be speeding along at this height with no visible means of support ...

Twilight fell : The sky turned to a light , dusky purple littered with tiny silver stars , and soon it was only the lights of [Muggle towns]2461-muggle towns that gave [them]2454-his five fellows any clue of how far from [the ground]4376-the ground [they]2454-his five fellows were or how very fast [they]2454-his five fellows were traveling . [Harry]112-harry ’s arms were wrapped tightly around [his]112-harry horse ’s neck as [he]112-harry willed it to go even faster . How much time had elapsed since [he]112-harry had seen [Sirius]142-sirius lying on [the Department of Mysteries floor]2463-the department of mysteries floor ? How much longer would [he]112-harry be able to resist [Voldemort]399-voldemort ? All [Harry]112-harry knew for sure was that [Sirius]142-sirius had neither done as [Voldemort]399-voldemort wanted , nor died , for [he]112-harry was convinced that either outcome would cause [him]112-harry to feel [Voldemort]399-voldemort ’s jubilation or fury course through [his]112-harry own body , making [his]112-harry scar sear as painfully as it had on the night [Mr. Weasley]201-mr. weasley was attacked ...

On [they]2454-his five fellows flew through the gathering darkness ; [Harry]112-harry ’s face felt stiff and cold , [his]112-harry legs numb from gripping the thestral ’s sides so tightly , but [he]112-harry did not dare shift positions lest [he]112-harry slip ... [He]112-harry was deaf from the thundering in [his]112-harry ears and [his]112-harry mouth was dry and frozen from the rush of cold night air . [He]112-harry had lost all sense of how far [they]2454-his five fellows had come ; all [his]112-harry faith was in the beast below [him]112-harry , still streaking purposefully through the night , barely flapping its wings as it sped ever onward ...

If [they]2454-his five fellows were too late ...

[He]112-harry ’s still alive , [he]112-harry ’s still fighting , [I]0-i can feel it ...

If [Voldemort]399-voldemort decided [Sirius]142-sirius was not going to crack ...

[I]0-i ’d know ...

[Harry]112-harry ’s stomach gave a jolt . The thestral ’s head was suddenly pointing toward the ground and [he]112-harry had actually slid forward a few inches along its neck . [They]2454-his five fellows were descending at last ... [He]112-harry heard [one of [the girls]450-the girls]2464-one of the girls shriek behind [him]112-harry and twisted around dangerously but could see no sign of a falling body ... And now bright orange lights were growing larger and rounder on all sides . “ [Visitor to [the Ministry]3114-the ministry]4652-visitor to the ministry , [you]3584-visitors are required to submit to a search and present [your]3584-visitors wand for registration at the security desk , which is located at the far end of [the Atrium]4654-the atrium . ”[112-harry]

A chink of soft golden light hit [their]2477-their feet and , widening , rose up [their]2477-their bodies . [Harry]112-harry bent [his]112-harry knees and held [his]112-harry wand as ready as [he]112-harry could in such cramped conditions , peering through the glass to see whether [anybody]3627-anybody was waiting for [them]2477-their in [the Atrium]4654-the atrium , but [it]4654-the atrium seemed to be completely empty . “ [The Ministry of Magic]85-the ministry of magic wishes [you]112-harry a pleasant evening , ”[1447-the woman] said [the woman]1447-the woman ’s voice .

“ Come on , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry quietly and [the six of [them]1074-the six of them]1074-the six of them sprinted off down [the hall]672-the hall , [Harry]112-harry in the lead , past [the fountain]2490-the fountain , toward the desk where [the security man who had weighed [Harry]112-harry ’s wand had sat and which was now deserted]2491-the security man who had weighed harry ’s wand had sat and which was now deserted .

[Harry]112-harry felt sure that there ought to be [a security person there]2492-a security person there , sure that [their]2492-a security person there absence was an ominous sign , and [his]112-harry feeling of foreboding increased as [they]1074-the six of them passed through the golden gates to [the lifts]2493-the lifts . [He]112-harry pressed the nearest down button and [a lift]2494-a lift clattered into sight almost immediately , the golden grilles slid apart with a great , echoing clanking , and [they]1074-the six of them dashed inside . [Harry]112-harry stabbed the number nine button , the grilles closed with a bang , and [the lift]2495-the lift began to descend , jangling and rattling . [Harry]112-harry had not realized how noisy [the lifts]2493-the lifts were on the day that [he]112-harry had come with [Mr. Weasley]201-mr. weasley — [he]112-harry was sure that the din would raise [every security person within [the building]2498-the building]2497-every security person within the building , yet when [the lift]2495-the lift halted , the cool female voice said , “ [Department of Mysteries]88-the department of mysteries , ”[1074-the six of them] and the grilles slid open again , [they]1074-the six of them stepped out into [the corridor]597-the corridor where nothing was moving but the nearest torches , flickering in the rush of air from [the lift]2495-the lift .

[Harry]112-harry turned toward the plain black door . After months and months of dreaming about it , [he]112-harry was here at last ...

“ Let ’s go , ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry whispered , and [he]112-harry led the way down [the corridor]597-the corridor , [Luna]178-luna right behind [him]112-harry , gazing around with [her]178-luna mouth slightly open .

“ Okay , listen , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry , stopping again within six feet of the door . “ Maybe ... maybe [a couple of people]4655-a couple of people should stay [here]3296-here as a — as [a lookout]4657-a lookout , and — ”[112-harry]

“ And how ’re [we]1074-the six of them going to let [you]112-harry know something ’s coming ? ”[182-ginny] asked [Ginny]182-ginny , [her]182-ginny eyebrows raised . “ [You]112-harry could be miles away . ”[182-ginny]

“ [We]1074-the six of them ’re coming with [you]112-harry , [Harry]112-harry , ”[161-neville] said [Neville]161-neville .

“ Let ’s get on with it , ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron firmly .

[Harry]112-harry still did not want to take [them]2503-them all with [him]112-harry , but it seemed [he]112-harry had no choice . [He]112-harry turned to face the door and walked forward . Just as it had in [his]112-harry dream , it swung open and [he]112-harry marched forward , leading [the others]3151-the others over the threshold .

[They]3151-the others were standing in [a large , circular room]2505-a large , circular room . Everything in here was black including the floor and ceiling — identical , unmarked , handle - less black doors were set at intervals all around the black walls , interspersed with branches of candles whose flames burned blue , their cool , shimmering light reflected in the shining marble floor so that it looked as though there was dark water underfoot .

“ [Someone]3263-someone shut the door , ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry muttered .

[He]112-harry regretted giving this order the moment [Neville]161-neville had obeyed it . Without the long chink of light from [the torch - lit corridor behind [them]3151-the others]2506-the torch - lit corridor behind them , [the place]3101-the place became so dark that for a moment the only things [they]3151-the others could see were the bunches of shivering blue flames on the walls and their ghostly reflections in the floor below .

In [his]112-harry dream , [Harry]112-harry had always walked purposefully across [this room]1686-this room to the door immediately opposite the entrance and walked on . But there were around a dozen doors here . Just as [he]112-harry was gazing ahead at the doors opposite [him]112-harry , trying to decide which was [the right one]2509-the right one , there was a great rumbling noise and the candles began to move sideways . The circular wall was rotating .

[Hermione]114-hermione grabbed [Harry]112-harry ’s arm as though frightened the floor might move too , but it did not . For a few seconds the blue flames around [them]3151-the others were blurred to resemble neon lines as the wall sped around and then , quite as suddenly as it had started , the rumbling stopped and everything became stationary once again .

[Harry]112-harry ’s eyes had blue streaks burned into them ; it was all [he]112-harry could see .

“ What was that about ? ”[113-ron] whispered [Ron]113-ron fearfully .

“ [I]182-ginny think it was to stop [us]3151-the others knowing which door [we]3151-the others came in from , ”[182-ginny] said [Ginny]182-ginny in a hushed voice .

[Harry]112-harry realized at once that [she]182-ginny was right : [He]112-harry could no sooner have picked the exit from the other doors than located an ant upon the jet - black floor . Meanwhile , the door through which [they]3151-the others needed to proceed could be any of [the dozen surrounding [them]3151-the others]2510-the dozen surrounding them .

“ How ’re [we]3151-the others going to get back out ? ”[161-neville] said [Neville]161-neville uncomfortably .

“ Well , that does n’t matter now , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry forcefully , blinking to try and erase the blue lines from [his]112-harry vision , and clutching [his]112-harry wand tighter than ever . “ [We]3151-the others wo n’t need to get out till [we]3151-the others ’ve found [Sirius]142-sirius — ”[112-harry]

“ Do n’t go calling for [him]142-sirius , though ! ”[114-hermione] [Hermione]114-hermione said urgently , but [Harry]112-harry had never needed [her]114-hermione advice less ; [his]112-harry instinct was to keep as quiet as possible for the time being .

“ [I]112-harry do n’t — ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry began . [He]112-harry marched straight at the door now facing [him]112-harry , [the others following close behind [him]112-harry]2511-the others following close behind him , set [his]112-harry left hand against its cool , shining surface , raised [his]112-harry wand , ready to strike the moment it opened , and pushed . [The place]3101-the place was quite empty except for a few desks and , in the very middle of [the room]469-the room , an enormous glass tank of deep - green water , big enough for all of [them]2516-them to swim in , which contained a number of pearly white objects that were drifting around lazily in the liquid .

[This room]1686-this room was larger than the last , dimly lit and rectangular , and the center of [it]1686-this room was sunken , forming a great stone pit some twenty feet below [them]2516-them . [They]2516-them were standing on the topmost tier of what seemed to be stone benches running all around [the room]469-the room and descending in steep steps like [an amphitheater]2524-an amphitheater , or [the courtroom in which [Harry]112-harry had been tried by [the Wizengamot]413-the wizengamot]2525-the courtroom in which harry had been tried by the wizengamot . Instead of a chained chair , however , there was a raised stone dais in the center of the lowered floor , and upon this dais stood a stone archway that looked so ancient , cracked , and crumbling that [Harry]112-harry was amazed the thing was still standing . Unsupported by any surrounding wall , the archway was hung with a tattered black curtain or veil which , despite the complete stillness of the cold surrounding air , was fluttering very slightly as though it had just been touched .

“ Who ’s there ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry , jumping down onto the bench below . There was no answering voice , but the veil continued to flutter and sway .

“ Careful ! ”[114-hermione] whispered [Hermione]114-hermione .

[The pointed archway]2530-the pointed archway looked much taller from where [he]112-harry stood now than when [he]112-harry had been looking down on [it]2530-the pointed archway from above . Still the veil swayed gently , as though [somebody]491-somebody had just passed through it .

“ This is it ! ”[112-harry]

[He]112-harry knew it at once by the beautiful , dancing , diamond - sparkling light . As [Harry]112-harry ’s eyes became more accustomed to the brilliant glare [he]112-harry saw clocks gleaming from every surface , large and small , grandfather and carriage , hanging in spaces between the bookcases or standing on desks ranging the length of [the room]469-the room , so that a busy , relentless ticking filled [the place]3101-the place like thousands of minuscule , marching footsteps . The source of the dancing , diamond - bright light was a towering crystal bell jar that stood at the far end of [the room]469-the room .

“ This way ! ”[112-harry]

[Harry]112-harry ’s heart was pumping frantically now that [he]112-harry knew [they]2547-they were on the right track . [He]112-harry led the way forward down [the narrow space between the lines of the desks]2548-the narrow space between the lines of the desks , heading , as [he]112-harry had done in [his]112-harry dream , for the source of the light , the crystal bell jar quite as tall as [he]112-harry was that stood on a desk and appeared to be full of a billowing , glittering wind .

“ Oh look ! ”[182-ginny] said [Ginny]182-ginny , as [they]2547-they drew nearer , pointing at the very heart of the bell jar .

Drifting along in the sparkling current inside was a tiny , jewel - bright egg . As it rose in the jar it cracked open and a hummingbird emerged , which was carried to the very top of the jar , but as it fell on the draft , its feathers became bedraggled and damp again , and by the time it had been borne back to the bottom of the jar it had been enclosed once more in its egg .

“ Keep going ! ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry sharply , because [Ginny]182-ginny showed signs of wanting to stop and watch the egg ’s progress back into a bird .

[They]2547-they were there , [they]2547-they had found [the place]3101-the place : high as [a church]1684-a church and full of nothing but towering shelves covered in small , dusty , glass orbs . [They]2547-they passed row eighty - four ... eighty - five ... [Harry]112-harry moved a little closer . [Ron]113-ron was pointing at one of the small glass spheres that glowed with a dull inner light , though it was very dusty and appeared not to have been touched for many years .

“ [My]112-harry name ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry blankly .

[He]112-harry stepped forward . Not as tall as [Ron]113-ron , [he]112-harry had to crane [his]112-harry neck to read the yellowish label affixed to the shelf right beneath the dusty glass ball . In spidery writing was written a date of some sixteen years previously .

[Harry]112-harry stared at it .

“ What is it ? ”[113-ron] [Ron]113-ron asked , sounding unnerved . “ What ’s [your]112-harry name doing down here ? ”[113-ron]

“ [Harry]112-harry , [I]114-hermione do n’t think [you]112-harry should touch it , ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione sharply , as [he]2571-he stretched out [his]2571-he hand .

“ Why not ? ”[2571-he] [he]2571-he said . “ It ’s something to do with [me]2571-he , is n’t it ? ”[2571-he]

“ Do n’t , [Harry]112-harry , ”[161-neville] said [Neville]161-neville suddenly . [Harry]112-harry looked around at [him]161-neville . [Neville]161-neville ’s round face was shining slightly with sweat . [He]161-neville looked as though [he]161-neville could not take much more suspense .

“ It ’s got [my]112-harry name on , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry .

And feeling slightly reckless , [he]112-harry closed [his]112-harry fingers around the dusty ball ’s surface . [He]112-harry had expected it to feel cold , but it did not . On the contrary , it felt as though it had been lying in the sun for hours , as though the glow of light within was warming it . Expecting , even hoping , that something dramatic was going to happen , something exciting that might make [their]2572-their long and dangerous journey worthwhile after all , [he]112-harry lifted the glass ball down from its shelf and stared at it .

Nothing whatsoever happened . [The others]3151-the others moved in closer around [Harry]112-harry , gazing at the orb as [he]112-harry brushed it free of the clogging dust .

And then , from right behind [them]2572-their , a drawling voice said , “ Very good , [Potter]112-harry . Now turn around , nice and slowly , and give that to [me]3151-the others . ”[3151-the others]

Black shapes were emerging out of thin air all around [them]2572-their , blocking [their]2572-their way left and right ; eyes glinted through slits in hoods , a dozen lit wand - tips were pointing directly at [their]2572-their hearts . [Ginny]182-ginny gave a gasp of horror .

“ To [me]155-malfoy , [Potter]112-harry , ”[155-malfoy] repeated the drawling voice of [Lucius Malfoy]155-malfoy as [he]155-malfoy held out [his]155-malfoy hand , palm up .

[Harry]112-harry ’s insides plummeted sickeningly . [They]2572-their were trapped and outnumbered two to one .

“ To [me]155-malfoy , ”[155-malfoy] said [Malfoy]155-malfoy yet again .

“ Where ’s [Sirius]142-sirius ? ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry said .

“ [Avada]420-avada — ”[2627-the second death eater]

But the thin ribbons were spinning around [Ron]113-ron ’s chest now . [He]113-ron tugged and tore at [them]2687-they as the brain was pulled tight against [him]113-ron like an octopus ’s body .

“ Diffindo ! ”[112-harry] yelled [Harry]112-harry , trying to sever the feelers wrapping themselves tightly around [Ron]113-ron before [his]113-ron eyes , but they would not break . [Ron]113-ron fell over , still thrashing against [his]113-ron bonds .

“ [Harry]112-harry , it ’ll suffocate [him]113-ron ! ”[182-ginny] screamed [Ginny]182-ginny , immobilized by [her]182-ginny broken ankle on the floor — then a jet of red light flew from one of [the Death Eater]414-the death eater ’s wands and hit [her]182-ginny squarely in the face . [She]182-ginny keeled over sideways and lay there unconscious .

[Harry]112-harry released [Neville]161-neville , though [he]112-harry was unaware of doing so . [Harry]112-harry jumped to the ground , pulling out [his]112-harry wand , as [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore turned to [the dais]2529-the dais too .

And [Harry]112-harry saw the look of mingled fear and surprise on [[his]112-harry godfather]543-his godfather ’s wasted , once - handsome face as [he]142-sirius fell through the ancient doorway and disappeared behind the veil , which fluttered for a moment as though in a high wind and then fell back into place .

[Harry]112-harry heard [Bellatrix Lestrange]240-bellatrix ’s triumphant scream , but knew it meant nothing — [Sirius]142-sirius had only just fallen through the archway , [he]142-sirius would reappear from the other side any second ...

“ There ’s nothing [you]112-harry can do , [Harry]112-harry — ”[361-lupin]

“ [We]4756-we can still reach [him]142-sirius — ”[112-harry]

“ There ’s nothing [you]112-harry can do , [Harry]112-harry ... nothing ... [He]142-sirius ’s gone . ”[361-lupin]

“ [He]142-sirius has n’t gone ! ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry yelled .

[He]112-harry did not believe it , [he]112-harry would not believe it ; still [he]112-harry fought [Lupin]361-lupin with every bit of strength [he]112-harry had : [Lupin]361-lupin did not understand , [people]3280-people hid behind that curtain , [he]112-harry had heard [them]3280-people whispering the first time [he]112-harry had entered [the room]469-the room — [Sirius]142-sirius was hiding , simply lurking out of sight —

“ [SIRIUS]142-sirius ! ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry bellowed , “ [SIRIUS]142-sirius ! ”[112-harry]

“ [He]142-sirius ca n’t come back , [Harry]112-harry , ”[361-lupin] said [Lupin]361-lupin , [his]361-lupin voice breaking as [he]361-lupin struggled to contain [Harry]112-harry . “ [He]142-sirius ca n’t come back , because [he]142-sirius ’s d — ”[361-lupin]

“ [HE]142-sirius — IS — NOT — DEAD ! ”[112-harry] roared [Harry]112-harry . “ [SIRIUS]142-sirius ! ”[112-harry]

There was movement going on around [them]2755-them , pointless bustling , the flashes of more spells . To [Harry]112-harry it was meaningless noise , the deflected curses flying past [them]2755-them did not matter , nothing mattered except that [Lupin]361-lupin stop pretending that [Sirius]142-sirius , who was standing feet from [them]2755-them behind that old curtain , was not going to emerge at any moment , shaking back [his]142-sirius dark hair and eager to reenter the battle —

[Dumbledore]133-dumbledore had most of the remaining Death Eaters grouped in the middle of [the room]469-the room , seemingly immobilized by invisible ropes . [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore flicked [his]133-dumbledore own wand . “ [You]192-voldemort do not seek to kill [me]192-voldemort , [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore ? ”[192-voldemort] called [Voldemort]192-voldemort , [his]192-voldemort scarlet eyes narrowed over the top of the shield . “ Above such brutality , are [you]192-voldemort ? ”[192-voldemort]

“ [We]4778-we both know that there are other ways of destroying [a man]598-a man , [Tom]189-dean , ”[133-dumbledore] [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore said calmly , continuing to walk toward [Voldemort]192-voldemort as though [he]133-dumbledore had not a fear in [the world]3138-the world , as though nothing had happened to interrupt [his]133-dumbledore stroll up [the hall]672-the hall . “ Merely taking [your]133-dumbledore life would not satisfy [me]133-dumbledore , [I]133-dumbledore admit — ”[133-dumbledore]

“ There is nothing worse than death , [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore ! ”[192-voldemort] snarled [Voldemort]192-voldemort .

“ [You]133-dumbledore are quite wrong , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore , still closing in upon [Voldemort]192-voldemort and speaking as lightly as though [they]2806-they were discussing the matter over drinks . [Harry]112-harry felt scared to see [him]133-dumbledore walking along , undefended , shieldless . [He]112-harry wanted to cry out a warning , but [[his]112-harry headless guard]2807-his headless guard kept shunting [him]112-harry backward toward the wall , blocking [his]112-harry every attempt to get out from behind it . “ Indeed , [your]133-dumbledore failure to understand that there are things much worse than death has always been [your]133-dumbledore greatest weakness — ”[112-harry]

Another jet of green light flew from behind the silver shield . This time it was the one - armed centaur , galloping in front of [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore , that took the blast and shattered into a hundred pieces , but before the fragments had even hit the floor , [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore had drawn back [his]133-dumbledore wand and waved it as though brandishing a whip . A long thin flame flew from the tip ; it wrapped itself around [Voldemort]192-voldemort , shield and all . For a moment , it seemed [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore had won , but then the fiery rope became a serpent , which relinquished its hold upon [Voldemort]192-voldemort at once and turned , hissing furiously , to face [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore .

[Voldemort]192-voldemort vanished . The snake reared from the floor , ready to strike —

There was a burst of flame in midair above [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore just as [Voldemort]192-voldemort reappeared , standing on the plinth in the middle of the pool where so recently the five statues had stood .

“ Look out ! ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry yelled .

But even as [he]112-harry shouted , one more jet of green light had flown at [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore from [Voldemort]192-voldemort ’s wand and the snake had struck —

[Fawkes]206-fawkes swooped down in front of [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore , opened [his]2808-his beak wide , and swallowed the jet of green light whole . [He]2808-his burst into flame and fell to the floor , small , wrinkled , and flightless . At the same moment , [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore brandished [his]133-dumbledore wand in one , long , fluid movement — the snake , which had been an instant from sinking its fangs into [him]133-dumbledore , flew high into the air and vanished in a wisp of dark smoke ; the water in the pool rose up and covered [Voldemort]192-voldemort like a cocoon of molten glass —

For a few seconds [Voldemort]192-voldemort was visible only as [a dark , rippling , faceless figure , shimmering and indistinct upon the plinth , clearly struggling to throw off the suffocating mass]2809-a dark , rippling , faceless figure , shimmering and indistinct upon the plinth , clearly struggling to throw off the suffocating mass —

Then [he]192-voldemort was gone , and the water fell with a crash back into its pool , slopping wildly over the sides , drenching the polished floor .

“ [MASTER]3684-master ! ”[240-bellatrix] screamed [Bellatrix]240-bellatrix .

Sure it was over , sure [Voldemort]192-voldemort had decided to flee , [Harry]112-harry made to run out from behind [[his]112-harry statue guard]2810-his statue guard , but [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore bellowed , “ Stay where [you]112-harry are , [Harry]112-harry ! ”[133-dumbledore]

For the first time , [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore sounded frightened . [Harry]112-harry could not see why . [The hall]672-the hall was quite empty but for [themselves]2812-themselves , the sobbing [Bellatrix]240-bellatrix still trapped under [her]240-bellatrix statue , and the tiny baby Fawkes croaking feebly on the floor —

And then [Harry]112-harry ’s scar burst open . [He]112-harry knew [he]112-harry was dead : it was pain beyond imagining , pain past endurance —

[He]112-harry was gone from [the hall]672-the hall , [he]112-harry was locked in the coils of a creature with red eyes , so tightly bound that [Harry]112-harry did not know where [his]112-harry body ended and the creature ’s began . [They]2814-they were fused together , bound by pain , and there was no escape —

And when [the creature]2815-the creature spoke , it used [Harry]112-harry ’s mouth , so that in [his]112-harry agony [he]112-harry felt [his]112-harry jaw move ...

“ Kill [me]2815-the creature now , [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore ... ”[2815-the creature]

“ If death is nothing , [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore , kill [the boy]3500-the boy ... ”[2815-the creature]

Let the pain stop , thought [Harry]112-harry . Let [him]2815-the creature kill [us]2817-us ... End it , [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore ... Death is nothing compared to this ...

And [I]0-i ’ll see [Sirius]142-sirius again ...

And as [Harry]112-harry ’s heart filled with emotion , the creature ’s coils loosened , the pain was gone , [Harry]112-harry was lying facedown on the floor , [his]112-harry glasses gone , shivering as though [he]112-harry lay upon ice , not wood ...

And there were voices echoing through [the hall]672-the hall , more voices than there should have been : [Harry]112-harry opened [his]112-harry eyes , saw [his]112-harry glasses lying at the heel of the headless statue that had been guarding [him]112-harry , but which now lay flat on its back , cracked and immobile . [He]112-harry put them on and raised [his]112-harry head an inch to find [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore ’s crooked nose inches from [his]112-harry own .

“ Are [you]112-harry all right , [Harry]112-harry ? ”[112-harry]

[The Atrium]4654-the atrium was full of [people]3280-people . [Harry]112-harry felt the familiar sensation of a hook being jerked behind [his]112-harry navel . [Harry]112-harry ’s feet hit solid ground again ; [his]112-harry knees buckled a little and [the golden wizard]2782-the golden wizard ’s head fell with a resounding clunk to the floor . [He]112-harry looked around and saw that [he]112-harry had arrived in [[Dumbledore]133-dumbledore ’s office]618-dumbledore ’s office .

Everything seemed to have repaired itself during [the headmaster]3380-the headmaster ’s absence . The delicate silver instruments stood again upon the spindle - legged tables , puffing and whirring serenely . The portraits of [the headmasters]2841-the headmasters and [headmistresses]2842-headmistresses were snoozing in [their]2843-their frames , heads lolling back in armchairs or against the edge of [their]2843-their pictures . [Harry]112-harry looked through the window . There was a cool line of pale green along the horizon : Dawn was approaching .

The silence and the stillness , broken only by the occasional grunt or snuffle of a sleeping portrait , was unbearable to [him]112-harry . If [his]112-harry surroundings could have reflected the feelings inside [him]112-harry , the pictures would have been screaming in pain . [He]112-harry walked around [the quiet , beautiful office]2844-the quiet , beautiful office , breathing quickly , trying not to think . But [he]112-harry had to think ... There was no escape ...

It was [his]112-harry fault [Sirius]142-sirius had died ; it was all [his]112-harry fault . If [he]112-harry , [Harry]112-harry , had not been stupid enough to fall for [Voldemort]192-voldemort ’s trick , if [he]112-harry had not been so convinced that what [he]112-harry had seen in [his]112-harry dream was real , if [he]112-harry had only opened [his]112-harry mind to the possibility that [Voldemort]192-voldemort was , as [Hermione]114-hermione had said , banking on [Harry]112-harry ’s love of playing [the hero]4476-the hero ...

It was unbearable , [he]112-harry would not think about it , [he]112-harry could not stand it ... There was a terrible hollow inside [him]112-harry [he]112-harry did not want to feel or examine , a dark hole where [Sirius]142-sirius had been , where [Sirius]142-sirius had vanished . [He]112-harry did not want to have to be alone with [that great , silent space]2846-that great , silent space , [he]112-harry could not stand it —

The guilt filling the whole of [Harry]112-harry ’s chest like some monstrous , weighty parasite now writhed and squirmed . [Harry]112-harry could not stand this , [he]112-harry could not stand being [Harry]112-harry anymore ... [Harry]112-harry tried to say “ Good , ”[112-harry] but no sound came out . [Harry]112-harry contented [himself]112-harry with nodding at the carpet , which was growing lighter as the sky outside grew paler . [Harry]112-harry felt the white - hot anger lick [his]112-harry insides , blazing in the terrible emptiness , filling [him]112-harry with the desire to hurt [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore for [his]133-dumbledore calmness and [his]133-dumbledore empty words .

[He]112-harry seized the table on which the silver instrument had stood and threw that too . [It]2865-it broke apart on the floor and the legs rolled in different directions .

“ [You]112-harry do care , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore . [He]133-dumbledore had not flinched or made a single move to stop [Harry]112-harry demolishing [[his]112-harry office]1448-his office . “ [I]112-harry — DON’T ! ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry screamed , so loudly that [he]112-harry felt [his]112-harry throat might tear , and for a second [he]112-harry wanted to rush at [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore and break [him]133-dumbledore too ; shatter that calm old face , shake [him]133-dumbledore , hurt [him]133-dumbledore , make [him]133-dumbledore feel some tiny part of the horror inside [Harry]112-harry .

“ Oh yes , [you]112-harry do , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore , still more calmly . “ [You]112-harry have now lost [[your]112-harry mother]3414-your mother , [[your]112-harry father]3408-your father , and the closest thing to [a parent]4809-a parent [you]112-harry have ever known . “ [YOU]133-dumbledore DON’T KNOW HOW [I]112-harry FEEL ! ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry roared . “ [YOU]133-dumbledore — STANDING THERE — [YOU]133-dumbledore — ”[112-harry]

But words were no longer enough , smashing things was no more help . [He]112-harry wanted to run , [he]112-harry wanted to keep running and never look back , [he]112-harry wanted to be somewhere [he]112-harry could not see the clear blue eyes staring at [him]112-harry , that hatefully calm old face . [He]112-harry ran to the door , seized the doorknob again , and wrenched at it .

But the door would not open .

[Harry]112-harry turned back to [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore .

“ Let [me]112-harry out , ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry said . [He]112-harry was shaking from head to foot .

“ No , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore simply .

For a few seconds [they]2867-they stared at [each other]3141-each other .

“ Let [me]112-harry out , ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry said again .

“ No , ”[133-dumbledore] [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore repeated .

“ If [you]112-harry do n’t — if [you]112-harry keep [me]133-dumbledore in [here]3296-here — if [you]112-harry do n’t let [me]133-dumbledore — ”[133-dumbledore]

“ By all means continue destroying [my]133-dumbledore possessions , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore serenely . “ [I]133-dumbledore daresay [I]133-dumbledore have too many . ”[133-dumbledore]

[He]133-dumbledore walked around [his]133-dumbledore desk and sat down behind it , watching [Harry]112-harry .

“ Let [me]112-harry out , ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry said yet again , in a voice that was cold and almost as calm as [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore ’s .

“ Not until [I]133-dumbledore have had [my]133-dumbledore say , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore .

“ Do [you]112-harry — do [you]112-harry think [I]112-harry want to — do [you]112-harry think [I]112-harry give a — [I]112-harry DON’T CARE WHAT [YOU’VE]112-harry GOT TO SAY ! ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry roared . “ [I]112-harry do n’t want to hear anything [you]112-harry ’ve got to say ! ”[112-harry]

“ [You]112-harry will , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore sadly . “ Because [you]112-harry are not nearly as angry with [me]133-dumbledore as [you]112-harry ought to be . If [you]112-harry are to attack [me]133-dumbledore , as [I]133-dumbledore know [you]112-harry are close to doing , [I]133-dumbledore would like to have thoroughly earned it . ”[133-dumbledore]

[Harry]112-harry was still standing with [his]112-harry hand on the doorknob but [he]112-harry was unaware of it . [He]112-harry was gazing at [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore , hardly breathing , listening yet barely understanding what [he]112-harry was hearing .

“ Please sit down , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore . It was not an order , it was a request .

[Harry]112-harry hesitated , then walked slowly across [the room]469-the room now littered with silver cogs and fragments of wood and took the seat facing [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore ’s desk .

“ Am [I]210-phineas nigellus to understand , ”[210-phineas nigellus] said [Phineas Nigellus]210-phineas nigellus slowly from [Harry]112-harry ’s left , “ that [[my]210-phineas nigellus great - great - grandson]3419-my great - great - grandson — [the last of [the Blacks]4813-the blacks]4812-the last of the blacks — is dead ? ”[210-phineas nigellus]

“ Yes , [Phineas]210-phineas nigellus , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore .

“ [I]210-phineas nigellus do n’t believe it , ”[210-phineas nigellus] said [Phineas]210-phineas nigellus brusquely .

[Harry]112-harry turned [his]112-harry head in time to see [Phineas]210-phineas nigellus marching out of [his]112-harry portrait and knew that [he]112-harry had gone to visit [his]112-harry other painting in [Grimmauld Place]16-grimmauld place . [He]112-harry would walk , perhaps , from portrait to portrait , calling for [Sirius]142-sirius through [the house]458-the house ...

“ [Harry]112-harry , [I]133-dumbledore owe [you]112-harry an explanation , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore . “ An explanation of [an old man]4814-an old man ’s mistakes . For [I]133-dumbledore see now that what [I]133-dumbledore have done , and not done , with regard to [you]112-harry , bears all the hallmarks of the failings of age . [Youth]4815-youth can not know how age thinks and feels . But [old men]4816-old men are guilty if [they]4816-old men forget what it was to be young ... and [I]133-dumbledore seem to have forgotten lately ... ”[133-dumbledore]

The sun was rising properly now . There was a rim of dazzling orange visible over [the mountains]3126-the mountains and the sky above it was colorless and bright . The light fell upon [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore , upon the silver of [his]133-dumbledore eyebrows and beard , upon the lines gouged deeply into [his]133-dumbledore face .

“ [I]133-dumbledore guessed , fifteen years ago , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore , “ when [I]133-dumbledore saw the scar upon [your]112-harry forehead , what it might mean . [I]133-dumbledore guessed that it might be the sign of a connection forged between [you]112-harry and [Voldemort]192-voldemort . ”[133-dumbledore]

“ [You]133-dumbledore ’ve told [me]112-harry this before , [Professor]361-lupin , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry bluntly . [He]112-harry did not care about being rude . [He]112-harry did not care about anything very much anymore .

“ Yes , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore apologetically . “ Yes , but [you]112-harry see — it is necessary to start with [your]112-harry scar . For it became apparent , shortly after [you]112-harry rejoined [the magical world]4817-the magical world , that [I]133-dumbledore was correct , and that [your]112-harry scar was giving [you]112-harry warnings when [Voldemort]192-voldemort was close to [you]112-harry , or else feeling powerful emotion . ”[133-dumbledore]

“ [I]112-harry know , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry wearily .

“ And this ability of [yours]112-harry — to detect [Voldemort]192-voldemort ’s presence , even when [he]192-voldemort is disguised , and to know what [he]192-voldemort is feeling when [his]192-voldemort emotions are roused — has become more and more pronounced since [Voldemort]192-voldemort returned to [his]192-voldemort own body and [his]192-voldemort full powers . ”[133-dumbledore]

[Harry]112-harry did not bother to nod . [He]112-harry knew all of this already .

“ More recently , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore , “ [I]133-dumbledore became concerned that [Voldemort]192-voldemort might realize that this connection between [you]112-harry exists . Sure enough , there came a time when [you]112-harry entered so far into [his]192-voldemort mind and thoughts that [he]192-voldemort sensed [your]112-harry presence . [I]133-dumbledore am speaking , of course , of the night when [you]112-harry witnessed the attack on [Mr. Weasley]201-mr. weasley . ”[133-dumbledore]

“ Yeah , [Snape]255-snape told [me]112-harry , ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry muttered .

“ [Professor Snape]255-snape , [Harry]112-harry , ”[133-dumbledore] [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore corrected [him]112-harry quietly . “ But did [you]112-harry not wonder why it was not [I]133-dumbledore who explained this to [you]112-harry ? Why [I]133-dumbledore did not teach [you]112-harry Occlumency ? Why [I]133-dumbledore had not so much as looked at [you]112-harry for months ? ”[133-dumbledore]

[Harry]112-harry looked up . [He]112-harry could see now that [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore looked sad and tired .

[Harry]112-harry remembered the feeling that a dormant snake had risen in [him]112-harry , ready to strike , on those occasions when [he]112-harry and [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore made eye contact .

“ [Voldemort]192-voldemort ’s aim in possessing [you]112-harry , as [he]192-voldemort demonstrated tonight , would not have been [my]112-harry destruction . It would have been [yours]112-harry . [He]192-voldemort hoped , when [he]192-voldemort possessed [you]112-harry briefly a short while ago , that [I]112-harry would sacrifice [you]112-harry in the hope of killing [him]192-voldemort . ”[112-harry]

[He]112-harry sighed deeply . [Harry]112-harry was letting the words wash over [him]112-harry . [He]112-harry would have been so interested to know all this a few months ago , and now it was meaningless compared to the gaping chasm inside [him]112-harry that was the loss of [Sirius]142-sirius , none of it mattered ...

“ [Sirius]142-sirius told [me]112-harry that [you]112-harry felt [Voldemort]192-voldemort awake inside [you]112-harry the very night that [you]112-harry had the vision of [Arthur Weasley]203-arthur ’s attack . [I]112-harry knew at once that [my]112-harry worst fears were correct : [Voldemort]192-voldemort from that point had realized [he]192-voldemort could use [you]112-harry . In an attempt to arm [you]112-harry against [Voldemort]192-voldemort ’s assaults on [your]112-harry mind , [I]112-harry arranged Occlumency lessons with [Professor Snape]255-snape . ”[112-harry]

[He]112-harry paused . [Harry]112-harry watched the sunlight , which was sliding slowly across the polished surface of [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore ’s desk , illuminate a silver ink pot and a handsome scarlet quill . [Harry]112-harry could tell that [the portraits all around [them]2873-them]2872-the portraits all around them were awake and listening raptly to [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore ’s explanation . [He]112-harry could hear the occasional rustle of robes , the slight clearing of a throat . [Phineas Nigellus]210-phineas nigellus had still not returned ...

“ But [I]112-harry did n’t , ”[112-harry] muttered [Harry]112-harry . [He]112-harry said it aloud to try and ease the dead weight of guilt inside [him]112-harry ; a confession must surely relieve some of the terrible pressure squeezing [his]112-harry heart . “ [I]112-harry did n’t practice , [I]112-harry did n’t bother , [I]112-harry could ’ve stopped [myself]112-harry having those dreams , [Hermione]114-hermione kept telling [me]112-harry to do it , if [I]112-harry had [he]210-phineas nigellus ’d never have been able to show [me]112-harry where to go , and — [Sirius]142-sirius would n’t — [Sirius]142-sirius would n’t — ”[112-harry]

Something was erupting inside [Harry]112-harry ’s head : a need to justify [himself]112-harry , to explain —

“ [I]133-dumbledore tried to check [he]210-phineas nigellus ’d really taken [Sirius]142-sirius , [I]133-dumbledore went to [[Umbridge]144-umbridge ’s office]1286-umbridge ’s office , [I]133-dumbledore spoke to [Kreacher]176-kreacher in the fire , and [he]176-kreacher said [Sirius]142-sirius was n’t [there]3115-there , [he]176-kreacher said [he]176-kreacher ’d gone ! ”[133-dumbledore]

“ [Kreacher]176-kreacher lied , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore calmly . “ [You]112-harry are not [[his]210-phineas nigellus master]4820-his master , [he]210-phineas nigellus could lie to [you]112-harry without even needing to punish [himself]210-phineas nigellus . [Kreacher]176-kreacher intended [you]112-harry to go to [the Ministry of Magic]3103-the ministry of magic . ”[133-dumbledore]

“ [He]176-kreacher — [he]176-kreacher sent [me]133-dumbledore on purpose ? ”[133-dumbledore]

“ Oh yes . [Kreacher]176-kreacher , [I]133-dumbledore am afraid , has been serving [more than one master]4822-more than one master for months . ”[133-dumbledore]

“ How ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry blankly . “ [He]176-kreacher has n’t been out of [Grimmauld Place]16-grimmauld place for years . ”[112-harry]

“ [Kreacher]176-kreacher seized [his]176-kreacher opportunity shortly before Christmas , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore , “ when [Sirius]142-sirius , apparently , shouted at [him]176-kreacher to ‘ get out . ’ [He]176-kreacher took [Sirius]142-sirius at [his]176-kreacher word and interpreted this as an order to leave [the house]458-the house . [He]176-kreacher went to [the only Black family member for whom [he]176-kreacher had any respect left ... [[Black]142-sirius ’s cousin]3715-black ’s cousin Narcissa , [sister of [Bellatrix]240-bellatrix and wife of [Lucius Malfoy]155-malfoy]4826-sister of bellatrix and wife of lucius malfoy]4824-the only black family member for whom he had any respect left ... black ’s cousin narcissa , sister of bellatrix and wife of lucius malfoy . ”[133-dumbledore]

“ How do [you]133-dumbledore know all this ? ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry said . [His]112-harry heart was beating very fast . [He]112-harry felt sick . [He]112-harry remembered worrying about [Kreacher]176-kreacher ’s odd absence over Christmas , remembered [him]176-kreacher turning up again in [the attic]977-the attic ...

“ [He]176-kreacher was laughing ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry in a hollow voice .

“ Oh yes , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore . “ [You]112-harry see , [Kreacher]176-kreacher was not able to betray [us]4827-us totally . [He]176-kreacher is not [Secret - Keeper for [the Order]23-the order]4828-secret - keeper for the order , [he]176-kreacher could not give [the Malfoys]242-the malfoys [our]4827-us whereabouts or tell [them]4829-them any of the Order ’s confidential plans that [he]176-kreacher had been forbidden to reveal . [He]176-kreacher was bound by the enchantments of [his]176-kreacher kind , which is to say that [he]176-kreacher could not disobey a direct order from [[his]176-kreacher master]4820-his master , [Sirius]142-sirius . But [he]176-kreacher gave [Narcissa]434-narcissa information of the sort that is very valuable to [Voldemort]192-voldemort , yet must have seemed much too trivial for [Sirius]142-sirius to think of banning [him]176-kreacher from repeating it . ”[133-dumbledore]

“ Like what ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry .

“ Like the fact that [the person [Sirius]142-sirius cared most about in [the world]3138-the world]4831-the person sirius cared most about in the world was [you]112-harry , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore quietly . “ Like the fact that [you]112-harry were coming to regard [Sirius]142-sirius as a mixture of [father]4833-father and [brother]4310-brother . [Harry]112-harry ’s lips were cold and numb .

“ So ... when [I]133-dumbledore asked [Kreacher]176-kreacher if [Sirius]142-sirius was [there]3115-there last night ... ”[133-dumbledore]

“ [The Malfoys]242-the malfoys — undoubtedly on [Voldemort]192-voldemort ’s instructions — had told [him]176-kreacher [he]176-kreacher must find a way of keeping [Sirius]142-sirius out of the way once [you]112-harry had seen the vision of [Sirius]142-sirius being tortured . There seemed to be very little air in [Harry]112-harry ’s lungs , [his]112-harry breathing was quick and shallow .

“ And [Kreacher]176-kreacher told [you]112-harry all this ... and laughed ? ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry croaked .

“ [He]176-kreacher did not wish to tell [me]133-dumbledore , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore . “ But [I]133-dumbledore am [a sufficiently accomplished Legilimens [myself]133-dumbledore]4840-a sufficiently accomplished legilimens myself to know when [I]133-dumbledore am being lied to and [I]133-dumbledore — persuaded [him]176-kreacher — to tell [me]133-dumbledore the full story , before [I]133-dumbledore left for [the Department of Mysteries]1119-the department of mysteries . ”[133-dumbledore]

“ And , ”[112-harry] whispered [Harry]112-harry , [his]112-harry hands curled in cold fists on [his]112-harry knees , “ and [Hermione]114-hermione kept telling [us]4842-us to be nice to [him]176-kreacher — ”[112-harry]

“ [She]114-hermione was quite right , [Harry]112-harry , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore . “ [I]133-dumbledore warned [Sirius]142-sirius when [we]4842-us adopted [twelve Grimmauld Place]16-grimmauld place as [[our]4842-us headquarters]4843-our headquarters that [Kreacher]176-kreacher must be treated with kindness and respect . “ Do n’t [you]133-dumbledore blame — do n’t [you]133-dumbledore — talk — about [Sirius]142-sirius like — ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry ’s breath was constricted , [he]112-harry could not get the words out properly . But the rage that had subsided so briefly had flared in [him]112-harry again ; [he]112-harry would not let [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore criticize [Sirius]142-sirius . “ [Kreacher]176-kreacher ’s a lying — foul — [he]176-kreacher deserved — ”[133-dumbledore]

“ [Kreacher]176-kreacher is what [he]176-kreacher has been made by [wizards]3128-wizards , [Harry]112-harry , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore . “ Yes , [he]176-kreacher is to be pitied .
