“ DON’T TALK ABOUT [SIRIUS]142-sirius LIKE THAT ! ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry yelled .

[He]112-harry was on [his]112-harry feet again , furious , ready to fly at [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore , who had plainly not understood [Sirius]142-sirius at all , how brave [he]142-sirius was , how much [he]142-sirius had suffered ...

“ What about [Snape]255-snape ? ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry spat . “ [You]133-dumbledore ’re not talking about [him]255-snape , are [you]133-dumbledore ? When [I]112-harry told [him]255-snape [Voldemort]192-voldemort had [Sirius]142-sirius [he]255-snape just sneered at [me]112-harry as usual — ”[112-harry]

[Harry]112-harry disregarded this ; [he]112-harry felt a savage pleasure in blaming [Snape]255-snape , it seemed to be easing [his]112-harry own sense of dreadful guilt , and [he]112-harry wanted to hear [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore agree with [him]112-harry .

“ [Snape]255-snape — [Snape]255-snape g - goaded [Sirius]142-sirius about staying in [the house]458-the house — [he]255-snape made out [Sirius]142-sirius was [a coward]3636-a coward — ”[133-dumbledore]

“ [Sirius]142-sirius was much too old and clever to have allowed such feeble taunts to hurt [him]142-sirius , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore .

“ [Snape]255-snape stopped giving [me]112-harry Occlumency lessons ! ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry snarled . “ [He]255-snape threw [me]112-harry out of [[his]255-snape office]1448-his office ! ”[112-harry]

“ [I]133-dumbledore am aware of it , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore heavily . “ [I]133-dumbledore have already said that it was a mistake for [me]133-dumbledore not to teach [you]4852-you [myself]133-dumbledore , though [I]133-dumbledore was sure , at the time , that nothing could have been more dangerous than to open [your]4852-you mind even further to [Voldemort]192-voldemort while in [my]133-dumbledore presence — ”[133-dumbledore]

“ [Snape]255-snape made it worse , [my]112-harry scar always hurt worse after lessons with [him]255-snape — ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry remembered [Ron]113-ron ’s thoughts on the subject and plunged on . “ How do [you]133-dumbledore know [he]255-snape was n’t trying to soften [me]113-ron up for [Voldemort]192-voldemort , make it easier for [him]255-snape to get inside [my]113-ron — ”[113-ron]

“ [I]133-dumbledore trust [Severus Snape]435-severus snape , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore simply . “ But [I]133-dumbledore forgot — [another old man]4853-another old man ’s mistake — that some wounds run too deep for the healing . [I]133-dumbledore thought [Professor Snape]255-snape could overcome [his]255-snape feelings about [[your]133-dumbledore father]3408-your father — [I]133-dumbledore was wrong . ”[133-dumbledore]

“ But that ’s okay , is it ? ”[112-harry] yelled [Harry]112-harry , ignoring the scandalized faces and disapproving mutterings of the portraits covering the walls . “ It ’s okay for [Snape]255-snape to hate [[my]113-ron dad]3809-my dad , but it ’s not okay for [Sirius]142-sirius to hate [Kreacher]176-kreacher ? ”[113-ron]

“ [Sirius]142-sirius did not hate [Kreacher]176-kreacher , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore . “ [He]142-sirius regarded [him]176-kreacher as [a servant unworthy of much interest or notice]4856-a servant unworthy of much interest or notice . Indifference and neglect often do much more damage than outright dislike ... [The fountain [we]4858-we destroyed tonight]4857-the fountain we destroyed tonight told a lie . [We]4858-we wizards have mistreated and abused [[our]4858-we fellows]4859-our fellows for too long , and [we]4858-we are now reaping [our]4858-we reward . ”[133-dumbledore]

“ SO [SIRIUS]142-sirius DESERVED WHAT [HE]142-sirius GOT , DID [HE]142-sirius ? ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry yelled .

“ [I]133-dumbledore did not say that , nor will [you]112-harry ever hear [me]133-dumbledore say it , ”[133-dumbledore] [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore replied quietly . “ [Sirius]142-sirius was not [a cruel man]4860-a cruel man , [he]142-sirius was kind to [house - elves]3558-house - elves in general . [He]142-sirius had no love for [Kreacher]176-kreacher , because [Kreacher]176-kreacher was a living reminder of [the home [Sirius]142-sirius had hated]4862-the home sirius had hated . ”[133-dumbledore]

“ Yeah , [he]142-sirius did hate it ! ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry , [his]112-harry voice cracking , turning [his]112-harry back on [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore and walking away . The sun was bright inside [the room]469-the room now , and the eyes of all the portraits followed [him]133-dumbledore as [he]133-dumbledore walked , without realizing what [he]133-dumbledore was doing , without seeing [the office]663-the office at all . “ [You]133-dumbledore made [him]142-sirius stay shut up in [that house]4466-that house and [he]142-sirius hated it , that ’s why [he]142-sirius wanted to get out last night — ”[133-dumbledore]

“ [I]133-dumbledore was trying to keep [Sirius]142-sirius alive , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore quietly .

“ [People]3280-people do n’t like being locked up ! ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry said furiously , rounding on [him]133-dumbledore . “ [You]133-dumbledore did it to [me]112-harry all last summer — ”[112-harry]

[Dumbledore]133-dumbledore closed [his]133-dumbledore eyes and buried [his]133-dumbledore face in [his]133-dumbledore long - fingered hands . [Harry]112-harry watched [him]133-dumbledore , but this uncharacteristic sign of exhaustion , or sadness , or whatever it was from [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore , did not soften [him]112-harry . On the contrary , [he]112-harry felt even angrier that [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore was showing signs of weakness . [He]133-dumbledore had no business being weak when [Harry]112-harry wanted to rage and storm at [him]133-dumbledore .

[Dumbledore]133-dumbledore lowered [his]133-dumbledore hands and surveyed [Harry]112-harry through [his]133-dumbledore half - moon glasses .

“ It is time , ”[133-dumbledore] [he]133-dumbledore said , “ for [me]133-dumbledore to tell [you]112-harry what [I]133-dumbledore should have told [you]112-harry five years ago , [Harry]112-harry . Please sit down . [I]133-dumbledore am going to tell [you]112-harry everything . [I]133-dumbledore ask only a little patience . [You]112-harry will have [your]112-harry chance to rage at [me]133-dumbledore — to do whatever [you]112-harry like — when [I]133-dumbledore have finished . [I]133-dumbledore will not stop [you]112-harry . ”[133-dumbledore]

[Harry]112-harry glared at [him]133-dumbledore for a moment , then flung [himself]112-harry back into the chair opposite [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore and waited . [He]133-dumbledore paused . [Harry]112-harry said nothing .

“ [She]4867-she does n’t love [me]112-harry , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry at once . “ [She]4867-she does n’t give a damn — ”[112-harry]

“ [I]112-harry still do n’t — ”[112-harry]

“ Wait , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry . “ Wait a moment . ”[112-harry]

[Harry]112-harry stared into the blue eyes and said nothing , but [his]112-harry heart was racing again .

[Harry]112-harry waited , but [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore did not speak .

The sun had risen fully now . [[Dumbledore]133-dumbledore ’s office]618-dumbledore ’s office was bathed in it . [He]133-dumbledore sat back down behind [his]133-dumbledore desk and watched [his]133-dumbledore thoughts swirl and drift inside the Pensieve for a moment . A figure rose out of it , draped in shawls , [her]2881-her eyes magnified to enormous size behind [her]2881-her glasses , and [she]2881-her revolved slowly , [her]2881-her feet in the basin . [The slowly revolving Professor Trelawney]147-professor trelawney sank back into the silver mass below and vanished .

“ It means — [me]112-harry ? ”[112-harry]

[Dumbledore]133-dumbledore took a deep breath .

[Harry]112-harry closed [his]112-harry eyes . If [he]112-harry had not gone to save [Sirius]142-sirius , [Sirius]142-sirius would not have died ... “ Yes , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore .

For a long time , [neither of [them]2885-us]3348-neither of them spoke . “ [I]133-dumbledore feel [I]133-dumbledore owe [you]112-harry another explanation , [Harry]112-harry , ”[133-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore hesitantly . “ [You]112-harry may , perhaps , have wondered why [I]133-dumbledore never chose [you]112-harry as [a prefect]3289-a prefect ? [Harry]112-harry looked up at [him]133-dumbledore and saw a tear trickling down [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore ’s face into [his]133-dumbledore long silver beard .

In a brief statement Friday night , [Minister of Magic Cornelius Fudge]280-fudge confirmed that [He]280-fudge - Who - [Must - Not - Be - Named]2891-must - not - be - named has returned to [this country]2892-this country and is active once more .

“ It is with great regret that [I]280-fudge must confirm that [the wizard]634-the wizard styling [himself]634-the wizard [Lord]4928-lord — well , [you]112-harry know who [I]280-fudge mean — is alive and among [us]4929-we again , ”[280-fudge] said [Fudge]280-fudge , looking tired and flustered as [he]280-fudge addressed [reporters]1157-reporters . “ It is with almost equal regret that [we]4929-we report the mass revolt of [the dementors of [Azkaban]33-azkaban , who have shown [themselves]4930-the dementors of azkaban , who have shown themselves averse to continuing in the ministry ’s employ averse to continuing in [the Ministry]3114-the ministry ’s employ]4930-the dementors of azkaban , who have shown themselves averse to continuing in the ministry ’s employ . [The Minister]3259-the minister ’s statement was met with dismay and alarm from [the Wizarding community]3611-the wizarding community , which as recently as last Wednesday was receiving Ministry assurances that there was “ no truth whatsoever in these persistent rumors that [You]4936-you - Know - Who is operating amongst [us]4929-we once more . ”[280-fudge]

Details of the events that led to the Ministry turnaround are still hazy , though it is believed that [He]2896-he - Who - Must - Not - Be - Named and [a select band of [followers]3501-followers]2897-a select band of followers ( known as [Death Eaters]137-death eaters ) gained entry to [the Ministry of Magic itself]2899-the ministry of magic itself on Thursday evening .

[Albus Dumbledore]133-dumbledore , [newly reinstated headmaster of [Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry]1607-hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry]2900-newly reinstated headmaster of hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry , [reinstated member of [the International Confederation of Wizards]2254-the international confederation of wizards]2902-reinstated member of the international confederation of wizards , and [reinstated Chief Warlock of the Wizengamot]2904-reinstated chief warlock of the wizengamot , was unavailable for comment last night . [He]133-dumbledore has insisted for a year that [You]2905-you - Know - Who was not dead , as was widely hoped and believed , but recruiting [followers once more for a fresh attempt to seize power]2906-followers once more for a fresh attempt to seize power . Meanwhile [the Boy Who Lived]437-the boy who lived —

“ There [you]2907-his are , [Harry]112-harry , [I]114-hermione knew [they]2908-they ’d drag [you]2907-his into it somehow , ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione , looking over the top of the paper at [him]2907-his .

[They]2908-they were in [the hospital wing]1095-the hospital wing . “ [He]113-ron ’s ‘ the Boy Who Lived ’ again now , though , is n’t [he]113-ron ? ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron darkly . “ Not such [a show - off maniac]4937-a show - off maniac anymore , eh ? ”[113-ron]

[He]2907-his helped [himself]2907-his to a handful of Chocolate Frogs from the immense pile on [his]2907-his bedside cabinet , threw a few to [Harry]112-harry , [Ginny]182-ginny , and [Neville]161-neville , and ripped off the wrapper of [his]2907-his own with [his]2907-his teeth . According to [Madam Pomfrey]120-madam pomfrey , thoughts could leave deeper scarring than almost anything else , though since [she]120-madam pomfrey had started applying copious amounts of [Dr. Ubbly]438-dr. ubbly ’s Oblivious Unction , there seemed to be some improvement .

“ Yes , [they]4938-them ’re very complimentary about [you]112-harry now , [Harry]112-harry , ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione , now scanning down the article . “ ‘ [A lone voice of truth]4939-a lone voice of truth ... perceived as unbalanced , yet never wavered in [his]112-harry story ... forced to bear ridicule and slander ... ’ Hmmm , ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione , frowning , “ [I]114-hermione notice [they]4938-them do n’t mention the fact that it was [them]4938-them doing all the ridiculing and slandering , though ... ”[114-hermione]

[She]114-hermione winced slightly and put a hand to [her]114-hermione ribs . The curse [Dolohov]274-dolohov had used on [her]114-hermione , though less effective than it would have been had [he]274-dolohov been able to say the incantation aloud , had nevertheless caused , in [Madam Pomfrey]120-madam pomfrey ’s words , “ quite enough damage to be going on with . ”[120-madam pomfrey] [Hermione]114-hermione was having to take ten different types of potion every day and although [she]114-hermione was improving greatly , was already bored with [the hospital wing]1095-the hospital wing .

“ ‘ [You]4940-you - Know - Who ’s Last Attempt to Take Over , pages two to four , What the Ministry Should Have Told [Us]4941-we , page five , Why Nobody Listened to [Albus Dumbledore]133-dumbledore , pages six to eight , Exclusive Interview with [Harry Potter]112-harry , page nine ... ’ Well , ”[114-hermione] said [Hermione]114-hermione , folding up the newspaper and throwing it aside , “ it ’s certainly given [them]4938-them lots to write about . “ [Daddy]303-daddy sold it to [them]4938-them , ”[178-luna] said [Luna]178-luna vaguely , turning a page of The Quibbler . “ [He]112-harry got a very good price for it too , so [we]4941-we ’re going to go on an expedition to [Sweden]104-sweden this summer and see if [we]4941-we can catch [a Crumple - Horned Snorkack]439-a crumple - horned snorkack . ”[178-luna]

[Harry]112-harry did not need telling twice . [He]112-harry thrust [his]112-harry wand back inside [his]112-harry robes and headed straight for the front doors without another glance at [Snape]255-snape and [Malfoy]155-malfoy .

“ [I]112-harry ’m fine , ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry said quickly , because [he]112-harry could not bear to discuss the thing that [he]112-harry knew was in [Hagrid]116-hagrid ’s mind . “ So , where ’ve [you]116-hagrid been ? ”[112-harry]

[Harry]112-harry would normally have tried to persuade [Hagrid]116-hagrid out of this idea at once . [He]112-harry was starting to wish [he]112-harry was alone again , and with the idea of hastening [his]112-harry departure [he]112-harry took several large gulps of [his]112-harry dandelion juice , half emptying [his]112-harry glass .

“ [Ev’ryone]366-ev’ryone knows [you]112-harry ’ve bin tellin ’ the truth now , [Harry]112-harry , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid softly and unexpectedly . “ [Tha]4974-tha ’s got ta be better , hasn ’ it ? ”[116-hagrid]

[Harry]112-harry shrugged .

“ Look ... ”[116-hagrid] [Hagrid]116-hagrid leaned toward [him]112-harry across the table , “ [I]116-hagrid knew [Sirius]142-sirius longer ’ n [you]112-harry did ... [He]4975-he died in battle , an ’ tha ’s the way [he]4975-he ’d ’ve wanted [ter]366-ev’ryone go — ”[116-hagrid]

[Hagrid]116-hagrid bowed [his]116-hagrid great shaggy head .

[Harry]112-harry leapt up again .

“ [I]112-harry ’ve got to go and visit [Ron]113-ron and [Hermione]114-hermione in [the hospital wing]1095-the hospital wing , ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry said mechanically .

“ Oh , ”[116-hagrid] said [Hagrid]116-hagrid , looking rather upset . “ Oh ... all righ ’ then , [Harry]112-harry ... Take care of [yerself]112-harry then , an ’ drop back in if [yeh’ve]112-harry got a mo ... ”[116-hagrid]

“ Yeah ... right ... ”[3280-people]

[Harry]112-harry crossed to the door as fast as [he]112-harry could and pulled it open . [He]112-harry was out in the sunshine again before [Hagrid]116-hagrid had finished saying good - bye and walked away across [the lawn]1094-the lawn . Once again , [people]3280-people called out to [him]112-harry as [he]112-harry passed . [He]112-harry closed [his]112-harry eyes for a few moments , wishing [they]3280-people would all vanish , that [he]112-harry could open [his]112-harry eyes and find [himself]112-harry alone in [the grounds]3644-the grounds ...

A few days ago , before [his]112-harry exams had finished and [he]112-harry had seen the vision [Voldemort]192-voldemort had planted in [his]112-harry mind , [he]112-harry would have given almost anything for [the Wizarding world]2964-the wizarding world to know that [he]112-harry had been telling the truth , for [them]2964-the wizarding world to believe that [Voldemort]192-voldemort was back and know that [he]112-harry was neither [a liar]2965-a liar nor mad . Now , however ...

[He]112-harry walked a short way around [the lake]3157-the lake , sat down on [its]3157-the lake bank , sheltered from the gaze of [passersby]2967-passersby behind a tangle of shrubs , and stared out over the gleaming water , thinking ...

Perhaps the reason [he]112-harry wanted to be alone was because [he]112-harry had felt isolated from [everybody]704-everybody since [his]112-harry talk with [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore . An invisible barrier separated [him]112-harry from [the rest of [the world]3138-the world]2969-the rest of the world . [He]112-harry was — [he]112-harry had always been — [a marked man]2971-a marked man . It was just that [he]112-harry had never really understood what that meant ...

And yet sitting here on [the edge of [the lake]3157-the lake]1753-the edge of the lake , with the terrible weight of grief dragging at [him]112-harry , with the loss of [Sirius]142-sirius so raw and fresh inside , [he]112-harry could not muster any great sense of fear . It was sunny and [the grounds around [him]112-harry]2974-the grounds around him were full of [laughing people]2975-laughing people , and even though [he]112-harry felt as distant from [them]2975-laughing people as though [he]112-harry belonged to [a different race]2976-a different race , it was still very hard to believe as [he]112-harry sat here that [his]112-harry life must include , or end in , murder ...

[He]112-harry sat there for a long time , gazing out at [the water]2977-the water , trying not to think about [[his]112-harry godfather]543-his godfather or to remember that it was directly across from here , on [the opposite bank]2979-the opposite bank , that [Sirius]142-sirius had collapsed trying to fend off [a hundred dementors]1096-a hundred dementors ...

The sun had fallen before [he]112-harry realized that [he]112-harry was cold . [He]112-harry got up and returned to [the castle]3279-the castle , wiping [his]112-harry face on [his]112-harry sleeve as [he]112-harry went .

[Ron]113-ron and [Hermione]114-hermione left [the hospital wing]1095-the hospital wing completely cured three days before the end of term . [Hermione]114-hermione showed signs of wanting to talk about [Sirius]142-sirius , but [Ron]113-ron tended to make hushing noises every time [she]114-hermione mentioned [his]113-ron name . [Harry]112-harry was not sure whether or not [he]112-harry wanted to talk about [[his]112-harry godfather]543-his godfather yet ; [his]112-harry wishes varied with [his]112-harry mood . [He]112-harry knew one thing , though : Unhappy as [he]112-harry felt at the moment , [he]112-harry would greatly miss [Hogwarts]18-hogwarts in a few days ’ time when [he]112-harry was back at number four , [Privet Drive]30-privet drive . Even though [he]112-harry now understood exactly why [he]112-harry had to return [there]3115-there every summer , [he]112-harry did not feel any better about it . Indeed , [he]112-harry had never dreaded [his]112-harry return more .

[Professor Umbridge]144-umbridge left [Hogwarts]18-hogwarts the day before the end of term . It seemed that [she]144-umbridge had crept out of [the hospital wing]1095-the hospital wing during dinnertime , evidently hoping to depart undetected , but unfortunately for [her]144-umbridge , [she]144-umbridge met [Peeves]171-peeves on the way , who seized [his]171-peeves last chance to do as [Fred]149-fred had instructed and chased [her]144-umbridge gleefully from [the premises]2986-the premises , whacking [her]144-umbridge alternately with a walking stick and a sock full of chalk . [Many students]1373-many students ran out into [the entrance hall]454-the entrance hall to watch [her]144-umbridge running away down [the path]1995-the path , and [the Heads of [Houses]109-houses]2990-the heads of houses tried only halfheartedly to restrain [[their]2990-the heads of houses pupils]2991-their pupils . Indeed , [Professor McGonagall]200-professor mcgonagall sank back into [her]200-professor mcgonagall chair at the staff table after a few feeble remonstrances and was clearly heard to express a regret that [she]200-professor mcgonagall could not run cheering after [Umbridge]144-umbridge [herself]200-professor mcgonagall , because [Peeves]171-peeves had borrowed [her]200-professor mcgonagall walking stick .

[Their]2992-their last evening at [school]984-school arrived ; [most people]572-most people had finished packing and were already heading down to the end - of - term feast , but [Harry]112-harry had not even started .

“ Just do it tomorrow ! ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron , who was waiting by the door of [[their]2992-their dormitory]2995-their dormitory . “ Come on , [I]113-ron ’m starving ... ”[113-ron]

“ [I]113-ron wo n’t be long ... Look , [you]112-harry go ahead ... ”[113-ron]

But when [the dormitory]606-the dormitory door closed behind [Ron]113-ron , [Harry]112-harry made no effort to speed up [his]112-harry packing . The very last thing [he]112-harry wanted to do was to attend the end - of - term feast . [He]112-harry was worried that [Dumbledore]133-dumbledore would make some reference to [him]112-harry in [his]133-dumbledore speech . [He]112-harry was sure to mention [Voldemort]192-voldemort ’s return ; [he]112-harry had talked to [them]2992-their about it last year , after all ...

[Harry]112-harry pulled some crumpled robes out of the very bottom of [his]112-harry trunk to make way for folded ones and , as [he]112-harry did so , noticed a badly wrapped package lying in a corner of it . [He]112-harry could not think what it was doing there . [He]112-harry bent down , pulled it out from underneath [his]112-harry trainers , and examined it .

[He]112-harry realized what it was within seconds . [Sirius]142-sirius had given it to [him]112-harry just inside the front door of [twelve Grimmauld Place]16-grimmauld place . Use it if [you]2997-you need [me]0-i , all right ?

[Harry]112-harry sank down onto [his]112-harry bed and unwrapped the package . Out fell a small , square mirror . It looked old ; it was certainly dirty . [Harry]112-harry held it up to [his]112-harry face and saw [his]112-harry own reflection looking back at [him]112-harry .

[He]112-harry turned the mirror over . There on the reverse side was a scribbled note from [Sirius]142-sirius .

This is a two - way mirror . [I]0-i 've got the other . If [you]2997-you need to speak to [me]0-i , just say [my]0-i name into it ; [you]2997-you 'll appear in [my]0-i mirror and [I]0-i 'll be able to talk in [yours]2997-you . [James]350-james and [I]0-i used to use [them]2998-them when [we]2999-we were in separate detentions .

And [Harry]112-harry ’s heart began to race . [He]112-harry remembered seeing [[his]112-harry dead parents]3000-his dead parents in [the Mirror of [Erised]110-erised]3001-the mirror of erised four years ago . [He]112-harry was going to be able to talk to [Sirius]142-sirius again , right now , [he]112-harry knew it —

[He]112-harry looked around to make sure there was [nobody else there]3002-nobody else there ; [the dormitory]606-the dormitory was quite empty . [He]112-harry looked back at the mirror , raised it in front of [his]112-harry face with trembling hands , and said , loudly and clearly , “ [Sirius]142-sirius . ”[112-harry]

[His]112-harry breath misted the surface of the glass . [He]112-harry held the mirror even closer , excitement flooding through [him]112-harry , but the eyes blinking back at [him]112-harry through the fog were definitely [his]112-harry own .

[He]112-harry wiped the mirror clear again and said , so that every syllable rang clearly through [the room]469-the room , “ [Sirius Black]142-sirius ! ”[112-harry]

Nothing happened . [The frustrated face looking back out of the mirror]3005-the frustrated face looking back out of the mirror was still , definitely , [his]112-harry own ...

[Sirius]142-sirius did n’t have [his]142-sirius mirror on [him]142-sirius when [he]142-sirius went through the archway , said a small voice in [Harry]112-harry ’s head . That ’s why it ’s not working ...

[Harry]112-harry remained quite still for a moment , then hurled the mirror back into the trunk where it shattered . [He]112-harry had been convinced , for a whole , shining minute , that [he]112-harry was going to see [Sirius]142-sirius , talk to [him]142-sirius again ...

Disappointment was burning in [his]112-harry throat . [He]112-harry got up and began throwing [his]112-harry things pell - mell into the trunk on top of the broken mirror —

But then an idea struck [him]112-harry ... A better idea than a mirror ... A much bigger , more important idea ... How had [he]112-harry never thought of it before — why had [he]112-harry never asked ?

[He]112-harry was sprinting out of [the dormitory]606-the dormitory and down [the spiral staircase]2235-the spiral staircase , hitting the walls as [he]112-harry ran and barely noticing . [He]112-harry hurtled across [the empty common room]3008-the empty common room , through the portrait hole and off along [the corridor]597-the corridor , ignoring [the Fat Lady , who called after [him]112-harry]3010-the fat lady , who called after him , “ The feast is about to start , [you]112-harry know , [you]112-harry ’re cutting it very fine ! ”[3010-the fat lady , who called after him]

But [Harry]112-harry had no intention of going to the feast ...

How could it be that [the place]3101-the place was full of ghosts whenever [you]3012-you did n’t need one , yet now ...

[He]112-harry ran down staircases and along [corridors]4161-corridors and met [nobody either alive or dead]3014-nobody either alive or dead . [They]3015-they were all , clearly , in [the Great Hall]1163-the great hall . Outside [[his]112-harry Charms classroom]3017-his charms classroom [he]112-harry came to a halt , panting and thinking disconsolately that [he]112-harry would have to wait until later , until after the end of the feast ...

But just as [he]112-harry had given up hope [he]112-harry saw it — [a translucent somebody drifting across the end of the corridor]3018-a translucent somebody drifting across the end of the corridor .

“ Hey — hey [Nick]394-nick ! [NICK]394-nick ! ”[3018-a translucent somebody drifting across the end of the corridor]

The ghost stuck its head back out of the wall , revealing the extravagantly plumed hat and dangerously wobbling head of [Sir Nicholas de Mimsy - Porpington]442-nick .

“ Good evening , ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry said , withdrawing the rest of [his]112-harry body from the solid stone and smiling at [Harry]112-harry . “ [I]112-harry am not [the only one who is late]4979-the only one who is late , then ? Though , ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry sighed , “ in rather different senses , of course ... ”[112-harry]

“ [Nick]442-nick , can [I]442-nick ask [you]442-nick something ? ”[442-nick]

A most peculiar expression stole over Nearly Headless [Nick]442-nick ’s face as [he]442-nick inserted a finger in the stiff ruff at [his]442-nick neck and tugged it a little straighter , apparently to give [himself]442-nick thinking time . [He]442-nick desisted only when [his]442-nick partially severed neck seemed about to give way completely .

“ Er — now , [Harry]112-harry ? ”[442-nick] said [Nick]442-nick , looking discomforted . “ Ca n’t it wait until after the feast ? ”[442-nick]

“ No — [Nick]442-nick — please , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry , “ [I]112-harry really need to talk to [you]442-nick . Can [we]4980-we go in here ? ”[112-harry]

[Harry]112-harry opened the door of [the nearest classroom]3019-the nearest classroom and [Nearly Headless Nick]115-nick sighed .

“ Oh very well , ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry said , looking resigned . “ [I]112-harry ca n’t pretend [I]112-harry have n’t been expecting it . ”[112-harry]

[Harry]112-harry was holding the door open for [him]442-nick , but [he]442-nick drifted through the wall instead .

“ Expecting what ? ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry asked , as [he]112-harry closed the door .

“ [You]112-harry to come and find [me]115-nick , ”[115-nick] said [Nick]115-nick , now gliding over to the window and looking out at [the darkening grounds]3020-the darkening grounds . “ It happens , sometimes ... when [somebody]491-somebody has suffered a ... loss . ”[115-nick]

“ Well , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry , refusing to be deflected . “ [You]112-harry were right , [I]112-harry ’ve — [I]112-harry ’ve come to find [you]115-nick . ”[112-harry]

[Nick]115-nick said nothing .

“ [It]4982-it ’s — ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry , who was finding this more awkward than [he]112-harry had anticipated , “ it ’s just — [you]115-nick ’re dead . But [you]115-nick ’re still [here]3296-here , are n’t [you]115-nick ? ”[112-harry]

[Nick]115-nick sighed and continued to gaze out at [the grounds]3644-the grounds .

“ That ’s right , is n’t it ? ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry urged [him]115-nick . “ [You]115-nick died , but [I]112-harry ’m talking to [you]115-nick ... [You]115-nick can walk around [Hogwarts]18-hogwarts and everything , ca n’t [you]115-nick ? ”[112-harry]

“ Yes , ”[115-nick] said [Nearly Headless Nick]115-nick quietly , “ [I]115-nick walk and talk , yes . ”[115-nick]

“ So , [you]115-nick came back , did n’t [you]115-nick ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry urgently . “ [People]3280-people can come back , right ? [As ghosts]4985-as ghosts . [They]3280-people do n’t have to disappear completely . Well ? ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry added impatiently , when [Nick]115-nick continued to say nothing .

[Nearly Headless Nick]115-nick hesitated , then said , “ [Not everyone]4986-not everyone can come back as a ghost . ”[115-nick]

“ What [d’you]115-nick mean ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry quickly .

“ Only ... only [wizards]3128-wizards . ”[115-nick]

“ Oh , ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry , and [he]112-harry almost laughed with relief . “ Well , that ’s okay then , [the person [I]112-harry ’m asking about]4988-the person i ’m asking about is [a wizard]4989-a wizard . So [he]4988-the person i ’m asking about can come back , right ? ”[112-harry]

[Nick]115-nick turned away from the window and looked mournfully at [Harry]112-harry . “ [He]4988-the person i ’m asking about wo n’t come back . ”[115-nick]

“ Who ? ”[112-harry]

“ [Sirius Black]142-sirius , ”[115-nick] said [Nick]115-nick .

“ But [you]115-nick did ! ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry angrily . “ [You]115-nick came back — [you]115-nick ’re dead and [you]115-nick did n’t disappear — ”[112-harry]

“ [Wizards]3128-wizards can leave an imprint of [themselves]3128-wizards upon [the earth]4991-the earth , to walk palely where [their]3128-wizards living selves once trod , ”[115-nick] said [Nick]115-nick miserably . “ But [very few wizards]4992-very few wizards choose that path . ”[115-nick]

“ Why not ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry . “ Anyway — it does n’t matter — [Sirius]142-sirius wo n’t care if it ’s unusual , [he]142-sirius ’ll come back , [I]112-harry know [he]142-sirius will ! ”[112-harry]

And so strong was [his]112-harry belief that [Harry]112-harry actually turned [his]112-harry head to check the door , sure , for a split second , that [he]112-harry was going to see [Sirius]142-sirius , pearly white and transparent but beaming , walking through [it]3022-it toward [him]112-harry .

“ [He]142-sirius will not come back , ”[115-nick] repeated [Nick]115-nick quietly . “ [He]142-sirius will have ... gone on . ”[115-nick]

“ What d’you mean , ‘ gone on ’ ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry quickly . “ Gone on where ? Listen — what happens when [you]4993-you die , anyway ? Where do [you]4993-you go ? Why does n’t [everyone]524-everyone come back ? Why is n’t [this place]3840-this place full of ghosts ? Why — ? ”[112-harry]

“ [I]115-nick can not answer , ”[115-nick] said [Nick]115-nick .

“ [You]115-nick ’re dead , are n’t [you]115-nick ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry exasperatedly . “ Who can answer better than [you]115-nick ? ”[112-harry]

“ [I]115-nick was afraid of death , ”[115-nick] said [Nick]115-nick . “ [I]115-nick chose to remain behind . [I]115-nick sometimes wonder whether [I]115-nick ought n’t to have ... Well , that is neither here nor there ... In fact , [I]115-nick am neither here nor there ... ”[115-nick] [He]115-nick gave a small sad chuckle . “ [I]115-nick know nothing of the secrets of death , [Harry]112-harry , for [I]115-nick chose [my]115-nick feeble imitation of life instead . [I]115-nick believe [learned wizards]4996-learned wizards study the matter in [the Department of Mysteries]1119-the department of mysteries — ”[115-nick]

“ Do n’t talk to [me]112-harry about [that place]3453-that place ! ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry fiercely .

“ [I]115-nick am sorry not to have been more help , ”[115-nick] said [Nick]115-nick gently . “ Well ... well , do excuse [me]115-nick ... the feast , [you]112-harry know ... ”[115-nick]

And [he]115-nick left [the room]469-the room , leaving [Harry]112-harry there alone , gazing blankly at the wall through which [Nick]115-nick had disappeared .

[Harry]112-harry felt almost as though [he]112-harry had lost [his]112-harry godfather all over again in losing the hope that [he]112-harry might be able to see or speak to [him]112-harry once more . [He]112-harry walked slowly and miserably back up through [the empty castle]3024-the empty castle , wondering whether [he]112-harry would ever feel cheerful again .

[He]112-harry had turned the corner toward [the Fat Lady ’s corridor]3025-the fat lady ’s corridor when [he]112-harry saw [somebody up ahead]3026-somebody up ahead fastening a note to a board on the wall . A second glance showed [him]112-harry that it was [Luna]178-luna . There were no good hiding places nearby , [she]178-luna was bound to have heard [his]112-harry footsteps , and in any case , [Harry]112-harry could hardly muster the energy to avoid [anyone]680-anyone at the moment .

“ Hello , ”[178-luna] said [Luna]178-luna vaguely , glancing around at [him]112-harry as [she]178-luna stepped back from the notice .

“ How come [you]178-luna ’re not at the feast ? ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry asked .

“ Well , [I]178-luna ’ve lost most of [my]178-luna possessions , ”[178-luna] said [Luna]178-luna serenely . “ [People]3280-people take them and hide [them]3028-them , [you]112-harry know . But as it ’s the last night , [I]178-luna really do need [them]3028-them back , so [I]178-luna ’ve been putting up signs . ”[178-luna]

[She]178-luna gestured toward the notice board , upon which , sure enough , [she]178-luna had pinned a list of all [her]178-luna missing books and clothes , with a plea for [their]3028-them return .

An odd feeling rose in [Harry]112-harry — an emotion quite different from the anger and grief that had filled [him]112-harry since [Sirius]142-sirius ’s death . It was a few moments before [he]112-harry realized that [he]112-harry was feeling sorry for [Luna]178-luna .

“ How come [people]3280-people hide [your]178-luna stuff ? ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry asked [her]178-luna , frowning .

“ Oh ... well ... ”[178-luna] [She]178-luna shrugged . “ [I]178-luna think [they]3280-people think [I]178-luna ’m a bit odd , [you]112-harry know . [Some people]3337-some people call [me]178-luna ‘ [Loony ’ Lovegood]193-loony , actually . ”[178-luna]

[Harry]112-harry looked at [her]178-luna and the new feeling of pity intensified rather painfully .

“ That ’s no reason for [them]3280-people to take [your]178-luna things , ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry said flatly . “ D’you want help finding [them]3280-people ? ”[112-harry]

“ Oh no , ”[178-luna] [she]178-luna said , smiling at [him]112-harry . “ [They]3280-people ’ll come back , [they]3280-people always do in the end . It was just that [I]178-luna wanted to pack tonight . Anyway ... why are n’t [you]178-luna at the feast ? ”[178-luna]

[Harry]112-harry shrugged . “ Just did n’t feel like it . ”[112-harry]

“ No , ”[178-luna] said [Luna]178-luna , observing [him]112-harry with those oddly misty , protuberant eyes . “ [I]178-luna do n’t suppose [you]112-harry do . [That man the Death Eaters]5002-that man the death eaters killed was [[your]112-harry godfather]5003-your godfather , was n’t [he]5002-that man the death eaters ? [Ginny]182-ginny told [me]178-luna . ”[178-luna]

[Harry]112-harry nodded curtly , but found that for some reason [he]112-harry did not mind [Luna]178-luna talking about [Sirius]142-sirius . [He]112-harry had just remembered that [she]178-luna too could see thestrals .

“ Have [you]178-luna ... ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry began . “ [I]112-harry mean , who ... has [anyone]680-anyone [you]178-luna ’ve known ever died ? ”[112-harry]

“ Yes , ”[178-luna] said [Luna]178-luna simply , “ [[my]178-luna mother]3563-my mother . [She]3563-my mother was [a quite extraordinary witch]5006-a quite extraordinary witch , [you]112-harry know , but [she]3563-my mother did like to experiment and one of [her]3563-my mother spells went rather badly wrong one day . [I]178-luna was nine . ”[178-luna]

“ [I]112-harry ’m sorry , ”[112-harry] [Harry]112-harry mumbled .

“ Yes , it was rather horrible , ”[178-luna] said [Luna]178-luna conversationally . “ [I]178-luna still feel very sad about it sometimes . But [I]178-luna ’ve still got [Dad]212-dad . And anyway , it ’s not as though [I]178-luna ’ll never see [Mum]174-mum again , is it ? ”[178-luna]

“ Er — is n’t it ? ”[112-harry] said [Harry]112-harry uncertainly .

[She]178-luna shook [her]178-luna head in disbelief . “ Oh , come on . [You]112-harry heard [them]5007-them , just behind the veil , did n’t [you]112-harry ? ”[178-luna]

“ [You]112-harry mean ... ”[178-luna]

“ In [that room]3898-that room with the archway . [They]5007-them were just lurking out of sight , that ’s all . [You]112-harry heard [them]5007-them . ”[178-luna]

[They]3029-they looked at [each other]3141-each other . [Luna]178-luna was smiling slightly . [Harry]112-harry did not know what to say , or to think . [Luna]178-luna believed so many extraordinary things ... yet [he]112-harry had been sure [he]112-harry had heard voices behind the veil too ...

“ Are [you]178-luna sure [you]178-luna do n’t want [me]112-harry to help [you]178-luna look for [your]178-luna stuff ? ”[112-harry] [he]112-harry said .

“ Oh no , ”[178-luna] said [Luna]178-luna . “ No , [I]178-luna think [I]178-luna ’ll just go down and have some pudding and wait for it all to turn up ... It always does in the end ... Well , have a nice holiday , [Harry]112-harry . ”[178-luna]

“ Yeah ... yeah , [you]112-harry too . ”[178-luna]

[She]178-luna walked away from [him]112-harry , and as [he]112-harry watched [her]178-luna go , [he]112-harry found that the terrible weight in [his]112-harry stomach seemed to have lessened slightly .

The journey [home]3087-home on [the Hogwarts Express]111-the hogwarts express next day was eventful in several ways . Firstly , [Malfoy]155-malfoy , [Crabbe]156-crabbe , and [Goyle]157-goyle , who had clearly been waiting all week for the opportunity to strike without [teacher witnesses]3032-teacher witnesses , attempted to ambush [Harry]112-harry halfway down [the train]712-the train as [he]112-harry made [his]112-harry way back from [the toilet]1709-the toilet . The attack might have succeeded had it not been for the fact that [they]3035-they unwittingly chose to stage the attack right outside [a compartment full of [D.A. members , who saw what was happening through the glass and rose as one to rush to [Harry]112-harry ’s aid]3037-d.a. members , who saw what was happening through the glass and rose as one to rush to harry ’s aid]3036-a compartment full of d.a. members , who saw what was happening through the glass and rose as one to rush to harry ’s aid . “ [I]338-ernie must say , [I]338-ernie ’m looking forward to seeing [[Malfoy]155-malfoy ’s mother]5009-malfoy ’s mother ’s face when [he]155-malfoy gets off [the train]712-the train , ”[338-ernie] said [Ernie]338-ernie with some satisfaction , as [he]338-ernie watched [Malfoy]155-malfoy squirm above [him]338-ernie . “ [Goyle]157-goyle ’s mum’ll be really pleased , though , ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron , who had come to investigate the source of the commotion . “ [He]112-harry ’s loads better - looking now ... [Harry]112-harry thanked [the others]3151-the others and accompanied [Ron]113-ron back to [[their]3151-the others compartment]3042-their compartment , where [he]113-ron bought a large pile of Cauldron Cakes and Pumpkin Pasties . [Hermione]114-hermione was reading the Daily Prophet again , [Ginny]182-ginny was doing a quiz in [The Quibbler]3813-the quibbler , and [Neville]161-neville was stroking [his]161-neville Mimbulus mimbletonia , which had grown a great deal over the year and now made odd crooning noises when touched .

[Harry]112-harry and [Ron]113-ron whiled away most of the journey playing wizard chess while [Hermione]114-hermione read out snippets from the Prophet . It was now full of articles about how to repel [dementors]3100-dementors , attempts by [the Ministry]3-the ministry to track down [Death Eaters]137-death eaters , and hysterical letters claiming that [the writer]3045-the writer had seen [Lord Voldemort]3046-lord voldemort walking past [[their]3151-the others house]3047-their house that very morning ...

“ It has n’t really started yet , ”[114-hermione] sighed [Hermione]114-hermione gloomily , folding up the newspaper again . “ But it wo n’t be long now ... ”[114-hermione]

“ Hey , [Harry]112-harry , ”[113-ron] said [Ron]113-ron , nodding toward the glass window onto [the corridor]597-the corridor .

[Harry]112-harry looked around . [Cho]187-cho was passing , accompanied by [Marietta Edgecombe]190-marietta , who was wearing a balaclava . [His]3049-his and [Cho]187-cho ’s eyes met for a moment .
